 603  7A66                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 7A66              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 7A66                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 7A66 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 7A66 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 7A66 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 7A66 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 7A66 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 7A66 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 7A66 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 7A66 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 7A66 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 7A66 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 7A66 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 7A66 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 7A66 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 7A66 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 7A66 ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 7A66 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 7A66 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 7A66 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 7A66 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 7A66 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 7A66 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 7A66 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 7A66 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 7A66 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 7A66 ~                                    ret
  28+ 7A66                      ELSE
  29+ 7A66 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 7A68 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 7A6A 21 61 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7A6D 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7A6E 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7A6F 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7A70 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7A71 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7A72 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7A74 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7A76                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7A76 CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7A78 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7A7A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7A7B C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7A7C E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7A7D CD FD 94                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7A80 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7A81 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7A82 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7A83 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7A84                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7A84                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7A84 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7A86 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7A87 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7A88 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7A89 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7A8B C9                                   ret
  56+ 7A8C                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 604  7A8C
 605  7A8C                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7A8C              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7A8C              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7A8C              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7A8C              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7A8C
   6+ 7A8C              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7A8C              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7A8C
   9+ 7A8C EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7A8D CD 68 84                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7A90 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7A91 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7A93 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7A94 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7A96 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7A97 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7A98 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7A99 CD 68 84                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7A9C EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7A9D 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7A9E E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7AA0 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7AA1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7AA2 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7AA3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7AA4 CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  27+ 7AA7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7AA8 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7AAA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7AAB 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7AAC E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7AAE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7AAF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7AB0 CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  35+ 7AB3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7AB4 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7AB5 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7AB7 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7AB8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7AB9 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7ABA EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7ABB CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  43+ 7ABE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7ABF F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7AC1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 7AC2 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 7AC3 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 7AC5 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 7AC7 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7AC8 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 7AC9 C9                                   ret
  52+ 7ACA
  53+ 7ACA EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 7ACB CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  55+ 7ACE CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 7AD0 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 7AD2 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 7AD3 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 7AD5 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 7AD6 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 7AD8 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 7AD9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 7ADA EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 7ADB CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  65+ 7ADE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 7ADF 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 7AE0 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 7AE2 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 7AE3 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 7AE4 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 7AE5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 7AE6 CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  73+ 7AE9 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 7AEB CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 7AED EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 7AEE E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 7AF0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 7AF1 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 7AF2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 7AF4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 7AF5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 7AF6 CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  83+ 7AF9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 7AFA 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 7AFB E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 7AFD B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 7AFE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 7AFF 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 7B00 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 7B01 CD 68 84                             call    doRND
  91+ 7B04 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 7B05 F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 7B07 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 7B08 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 7B09 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 7B0B E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 7B0D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 7B0E 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 7B0F C9                                   ret
 100+ 7B10
 101+ 7B10              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102+ 7B10 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 7B12 21 F3 7F                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 7B15 CD 8C 7A     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 7B18 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 7B1A C9                                   ret
 107+ 7B1B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 108+ 7B1B 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 109+ 7B1D 21 F3 7F                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 7B20 CD CA 7A     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 7B23 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 112+ 7B25 C9                                   ret
 113+ 7B26              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 114+ 7B26 FD 21 F3 7F  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 7B2A DD 21 DD 7F                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 7B2E 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 7B30 FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 7B33 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 7B34 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 7B36                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 7B36 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 7B38 C2 41 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 7B3B C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 7B3D 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 7B3E C3 46 7B                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 7B41 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 7B42 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 7B44 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 7B45 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 7B46 FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 7B49 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 7B4A E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 7B4C                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 7B4C CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 7B4E C2 57 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 7B51 C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 7B53 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 7B54 C3 5C 7B                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 7B57 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 7B58 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 7B5A 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 7B5B 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 7B5C DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 7B5F DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 7B62 DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 7B64 DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 7B66 FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 7B69 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 7B6B ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 7B6D E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 7B70 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 7B72 C9                                   ret
 149+ 7B73
 150+ 7B73              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7B73 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7B75 FD 21 F3 7F                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7B79 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7B7A FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7B7D 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7B7E 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7B80 3A C7 7E                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7B83                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7B83 A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7B84 C2 88 7B    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7B87 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7B88 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7B89 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7B8B CD 89 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7B8E                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7B8E CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7B90 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7B92                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7B92 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7B94 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7B96 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7B97 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7B99 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7B9B FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7B9F 66 05
 169+ 7BA1 ED 5B C8 7E                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7BA5 CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7BA8                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7BA8 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7BAA C2 FF 7C    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7BAD FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7BB1 74 05
 173+ 7BB3 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7BB7 66 01
 174+ 7BB9 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7BBA E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7BBC 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7BBD DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7BBF ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7BC1 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7BC2 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7BC4 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7BC5 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7BC6 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7BC9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7BCA E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7BCC                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7BCC FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7BCE D2 FF 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7BD1 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7BD5 74 01
 188+ 7BD7 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7BDB 66 03
 189+ 7BDD 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7BDE E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7BE0 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7BE1 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7BE3 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7BE5 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7BE6 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7BE8 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7BE9 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7BEA CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7BED 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7BEE E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7BF0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7BF0 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7BF2 D2 FF 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7BF5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7BF6 E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7BF8 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7BFA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7BFB                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7BFB FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7BFD D2 FF 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7C00 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7C04 74 03
 208+ 7C06              ; Now roll
 209+ 7C06              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7C06 3A E7 7D     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7C09 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7C0B 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7C0D                                   ;   break
 214+ 7C0D 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7C0E 3A E9 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7C11 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7C13 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7C14 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7C15 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7C16 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7C17 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7C1A 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7C1B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7C1D 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7C1E 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7C1F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7C21 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7C22 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7C24 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7C25 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7C26 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7C27 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7C28 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7C2C 66 01
 234+ 7C2E CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7C31 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7C35 74 01
 236+ 7C37              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7C37              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7C37 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7C38 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7C39 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7C3A FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7C3D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7C3E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7C40 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7C41 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7C42 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7C44 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7C45 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7C47 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7C48 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7C49 B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7C4A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7C4B FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7C4F 66 03
 254+ 7C51 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7C54 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7C58 74 03
 256+ 7C5A 3A DB 7D     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7C5D FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7C5F 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7C61              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7C61 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7C62 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7C65 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7C66 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7C68 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7C69 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7C6B                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7C6B CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7C6D CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7C6F 3A DC 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7C72 B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7C73 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7C74 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7C78 66 03
 271+ 7C7A CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7C7D FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7C81 74 03
 273+ 7C83              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7C83              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7C83              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7C83              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7C83               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7C83                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7C83              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7C83 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7C86 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7C87 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7C89                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7C89 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7C8B C2 94 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7C8E C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7C90 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7C91 C3 99 7C                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7C94 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7C95 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7C97 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7C98 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7C99 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7C9C 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7C9D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7C9F                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7C9F CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7CA1 C2 AA 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7CA4 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7CA6 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7CA7 C3 AF 7C                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7CAA 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7CAB 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7CAD 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7CAE 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7CAF 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7CB1 C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7CB2              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7CB2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7CB6 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7CB9 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7CBC C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7CBD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7CBD FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7CBF D2 EF 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7CC2 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7CC4 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7CC5 C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7CC6                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7CC6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7CCA CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7CCD FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7CD0 C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7CD1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7CD1 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7CD3 D2 EF 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7CD6 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7CD8 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7CD9 C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7CDA                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7CDA ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7CDE CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7CE1 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7CE4 C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7CE5 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7CE7 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7CE8                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7CE8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7CEC CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7CEF C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7CF0 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7CF2 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7CF3 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7CF7 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7CF8 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7CFA 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7CFB C2 79 7B                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7CFE C9                                   ret
 337+ 7CFF C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7D00 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7D02 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7D03 CD 8C 7A                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7D06 C3 F0 7C                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7D09              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7D09 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7D0C FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7D0F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7D10 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7D12 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7D13 CD 14 95                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7D16 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7D17                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7D17 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7D19 C2 24 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7D1C              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7D1C 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7D1E 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7D20 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7D21 C3 2B 7D                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7D24              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7D24 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7D26 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7D28                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7D28 B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7D29 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7D2B              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7D2B 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7D2C 32 4B 80                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7D2F C9                                   ret
 365+ 7D30
 366+ 7D30 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7D33 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7D36 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7D37 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7D39 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7D3A CD 14 95                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7D3D 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7D3E                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7D3E CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7D40 C2 4B 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7D43                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7D43 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7D45                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7D45 B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7D46 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7D48 C3 50 7D                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7D4B              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7D4B 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7D4D 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7D4F 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7D50              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7D50 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7D51 32 4C 80                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7D54 C9                                   ret
 387+ 7D55
 388+ 7D55
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

 612  7D55                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7D55
   2+ 7D55 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7D56 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7D5A 7D
   4+ 7D5B 55 7D        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7D5D 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7D5F 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7D62 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7D64 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7D68              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7D68
  11+ 7D68              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7D68              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7D68              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7D68 32 55 7D     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7D6B              .set_target:
  16+ 7D6B 22 62 7D     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7D6E              .set_length:
  18+ 7D6E ED 53 5D 7D  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7D72              .write_dma:
  20+ 7D72 21 56 7D     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7D75 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7D77 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7D79 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7D7B C9           	ret
  25+ 7D7C
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 613  7D7C                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7D7C
   2+ 7D7C 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7D80 7D
   3+ 7D81 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7D83 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7D85 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7D88 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7D8A 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7D8E              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7D8E
  10+ 7D8E              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7D8E              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7D8E              .set_target:
  13+ 7D8E 22 88 7D     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7D91              .set_source:
  15+ 7D91 ED 53 81 7D  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7D95              .set_length:
  17+ 7D95 ED 43 83 7D  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7D99              .write_dma:
  19+ 7D99 21 7C 7D     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7D9C 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7D9E 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7DA0 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7DA2 C9           	ret
  24+ 7DA3
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 202+ 7DB2              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
 203+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
 204+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
 205+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
 206+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys

 210+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
 211+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
 212+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
 213+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
 214+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
 215+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
 216+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
 217+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
 218+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
 219+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
 220+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
 221+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate
 222+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 20 is #ADA  Adder
 223+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 21 is
 224+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 22 is
 225+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 23 is
 226+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 24 is #CYL2 Last strong pirate
 227+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 25 is #ASP  Asp Mk II
 228+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 26 is #FER  Fer de Lance
 229+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 27 is
 230+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 28 is	Last of three bounty hunters
 231+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 29 is #THG  Thargoid
 232+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 30 is #TGL  Thargon
 233+ 7DB2              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 31 is #CON  Constrictor
 234+ 7DB2              ;;;;	.E%	\ -> &563E \ Hull NEWB bits are escpod, cop, inno, ?, pirate, angry, hunter, trader.
 235+ 7DB2              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
 236+ 7DB2              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
 237+ 7DB2              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
 238+ 7DB2              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.
 239+ 7DB2              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.
 240+ 7DB2              ;;;;\ 8C			EQUB &8C    \ 1000 1100   19 Krait pirate has escape pod, is pirate and angry.

 350+ 80BF 00           CompassColor			DB	0				; 03C5
 351+ 80C0 00           SoundToggle				DB	0				; 03C6
 352+ 80C1 00           KeyboardRecenterToggle	DB	0				; 03C8
 353+ 80C2 00           PATGMask				DB	0				; &03C9    \ PATG	\ Mask to scan keyboard X-key, for misjump
 354+ 80C3 00           FlashToggle				DB  0				; 03CA \ FLH \ flash toggle
 355+ 80C4 00           ReverseJoystick			DB	0				; 03CB \ JSTGY \ Y reverse joystick Y channel
 356+ 80C5 00           JoystickToggle			DB	0				; 03CD  \ JSTK    \ K toggle keyboard/joystick
 357+ 80C6 00           DigitalJoystick			DB	0				; 03CE \ JDB   \ . = toggle between keyboard and bitpaddle
 358+ 80C7 00           DiskReadFailFlag		DB	0				; 03CF \ CATF \ Disk catalog fail flag
 359+ 80C8
 360+ 80C8              ; Working Data
 361+ 80C8
 362+ 80C8              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 363+ 80C8              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 364+ 80C8              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 365+ 80C8              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 366+ 80C8              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 367+ 80C8              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 368+ 80C8              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 369+ 80C8              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 370+ 80C8              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 371+ 80C8              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 372+ 80C8              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 373+ 80C8              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 374+ 80C8              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 375+ 80C8              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.
 376+ 80C8
 377+ 80C8
 378+ 80C8
 379+ 80C8              ; 0b00 is start address of data to save
 380+ 80C8              ; Now MissionData VarTP					DB	0				; 0358 TP? The Plan  \ mission uses lower 4 bits
 381+ 80C8              											; Bit mask XXXX10XX - Thargoid plan mission
 382+ 80C8
 383+ 80C8 00           MissionData				DB	0				; &0B00	  \ look at data, first byte is TP mission bits
 384+ 80C9
 385+ 80C9 00 00        FileNameStringPointer	DW	0				;0C00	   \ pointer to filename string
 386+ 80CB 00 00        CommanderLoadAddress	DW	0				;0C03
 387+ 80CD 00 00        LengthOfFile			DW	0				;0C0B
 388+ 80CF 00 00        SaveDataEndAddress		DW	0				;&0C0F	      \ &0C00 is end address of data to save
 389+ 80D1
 390+ 80D1 00 00 00...  EdgesBuffer				DS 50
 391+ 8103              EdgesBufferSP			equ	$				; Was $0CFF			; Heap pointer for edges buffer
 392+ 8103              ShipLinesBufferSP		equ EdgesBufferSP	; was $0CFF
 393+ 8103
 394+ 8103 00 00 00...  ShipLineStack			DS  70			; For now but will be in the page later
 395+ 8149              ShipLineStackTop		equ $ - ShipLineStack

 405+ 814A 00           CabinTemperature        DB  0

 410+ 814F 00           AftShield				DB	0				; .
 411+ 8150 00           PlayerEnergy			DB	0				; and in this order
 412+ 8151 00           CompassX				DB	0				; 03A8
 413+ 8152 00           CompassY				DB	0				; 03A9
 414+ 8153              ; Simplification of missile targetting
 415+ 8153              ; $FF no missile targettting enabled
 416+ 8153              ; $FE missile targetting, no target selected
 417+ 8153              ; bit 7 set then tagetting and lower nibble holds missile target and launching
 418+ 8153              ; bit 7 clear launch at selected target in lower nibble
 419+ 8153 00           MissileTargettingFlag   DB  0
 420+ 8154              ;;MissileTarget			DB  0				; 45
 421+ 8154              ;;MissileLaunchFlag       DB  0
 422+ 8154 00 00 00...  CommanderName           DS  15
 423+ 8163 00           CommanderName0			DB	0				; Sneaky little 0 to allow use of print name directly
 424+ 8164 00           BadnessStatus           DB  0
 425+ 8165              ;note rapidly changing views could reset these so need to consider it in an array
 426+ 8165              ; LaserType
 427+ 8165              ; LaserPulseRate                          ; how many pulses can be fired before long pause
 428+ 8165              ; LaserPulsePause                         ; time before next pulse - 0 = beam
 429+ 8165              ; LaserPulseRest                          ; time before pulse count resets to 0
 430+ 8165              ; LaserDamageOutput                       ; amount of damage for a laser hit
 431+ 8165              ; LaserEnergyDrain                        ; amount of energy drained by cycle
 432+ 8165              ; LaserHeat                               ; amount of heat generated
 433+ 8165              ; LaserDurability                         ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on unshielded will add random amount of damage
 434+ 8165              ; LaserDurabilityAmount                   ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
 435+ 8165              ; LaserInMarkets                          ; can this laser be purchased 0 = yes 1 = no
 436+ 8165              ; LaserTechLevel                          ; minimum tech level system to buy from
 437+ 8165              ; need to add copy table routines
 438+ 8165 00           CurrLaserType           DB  0               ; current view laser type, copied in from LaserType array
 439+ 8166 00           CurrLaserDamage         DB  0               ; copied in from LaserDamagedFlag array
 440+ 8167 00           CurrLaserPulseRate      DB  0               ; current view laser amount of pulses
 441+ 8168 00           CurrLaserPulseOnTime    DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on
 442+ 8169 00           CurrLaserPulseOffTime   DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on
 443+ 816A 00           CurrLaserPulseRest      DB  0               ; current view laser delay setup between pulses
 444+ 816B
 445+ 816B                  IFDEF LASER_V2
 446+ 816B 00           LaserBeamOn             DB  0
 447+ 816C 00           CurrLaserDuration       DB  0   ; == CurrLaserPulseOnTime
 448+ 816D 00           CurrentBurstPause       DB  0   ; == CurrLaserPulseOffTime
 449+ 816E 00           CurrentCooldown         DB  0   ; == CurrLaserPulseRest
 450+ 816F                  ENDIF

 461+ 8177 00           CurrLaserPulseOffCount  DB  0               ; how many cycles the laser is on timer

 138+ 8331              ; sets carry to true if target
 139+ 8331 3A 53 81     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 140+ 8334 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 141+ 8336 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 142+ 8338 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 143+ 833A CA 3F 83                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 144+ 833D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 144+ 833D B7          >                        or a

 146+ 8345 3C          >                        inc     a
 146+ 8346 CA 4C 83    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 146+ 8349 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later

 628  8467                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 8467              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 8467              doRND2:
   3+ 8467 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 8468              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 8468              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 8468              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 8468              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 8468 3A C2 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 846B CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 846D 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 846E 21 C4 7D     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 8471 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 8472 32 C2 7D     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 8475 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 8476 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 8477 32 C4 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 847A 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 847B 3A C3 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 847E 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 847F 21 C5 7D     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 8482 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 8483 32 C3 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 8486 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 8487 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 8488 32 C5 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 848B 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 848C                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 848C C9                                   ret
  29+ 848D
  30+ 848D 21 C2 7D     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 8490 11 C6 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 8493 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 8496 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 8498 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 849A ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 849C ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 849E C9                                   ret
  38+ 849F
  39+ 849F 21 C6 7D     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave

  43+ 84AA ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 84AC ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 84AE ED A0                                ldi

   4+ 84C1 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 84C3 ED A0                                ldi

  16+ 84D6 21 69 7F     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 84D9 11 5D 7F                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 84DC 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 84DE
  20+ 84DE 21 5D 7F     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 84E1 11 69 7F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 84E4 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed

  24+ 84E6 21 5D 7F     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 84E9 11 45 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 84EC 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 84EE
  28+ 84EE 21 45 7F     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 84F1 11 5D 7F                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 84F4 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 84F6
  32+ 84F6              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 84F6 CD F9 84     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 84F9              .NextStep:
  35+ 84F9 CD FC 84     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 84FC              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 84FC 3A 45 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 84FF B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 8500 21 47 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 8503 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 8504 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 8505 3A 46 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 8508 21 48 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 850B 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 850C 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 850D 3A 47 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 8510 32 45 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 8513 3A 48 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 8516 32 46 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 8519 3A 4A 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 851C 32 48 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 851F 3A 49 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 8522 32 47 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 8525 B7           		or		a
  55+ 8526 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 8527 21 47 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 852A 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 852B 32 49 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 852E 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 852F 21 48 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 8532 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 8533 32 4A 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 8536 C9           		ret
  64+ 8537
  65+ 8537              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 8537 CD 3A 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 853A              .NextStep:
  68+ 853A CD 3D 85     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 853D              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 853D              ; x = a + c
  71+ 853D 3A 5D 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 8540 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 8541 21 5F 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 8544 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 8545 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 8546              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 8546 3A 5E 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 8549 21 60 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 854C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 854D 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 854E 3A 5F 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 8551 32 5D 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 8554 3A 60 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 8557 32 5E 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 855A 3A 62 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 855D 32 60 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 8560 3A 61 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 8563 32 5F 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 8566 B7           		or		a
  90+ 8567 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 8568 21 5F 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 856B 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 856C 32 61 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 856F 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 8570 21 60 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 8573 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 8574 32 62 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 8577 C9           		ret

 101+ 8579 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 857A 00           current_distY	DB 0

 104+ 857B AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 857C 32 D2 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 857F 3A 46 7F     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 8582 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 8583 3A 70 7F     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 8586 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 8587 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 8588 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 8589 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 858B 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 858D ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 858F 32 7A 85     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 8592 ED 5B 78 85                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 8596 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 8597 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 8599 3A 48 7F     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 859C 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 859D 3A 6F 7F                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 85A0 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 85A1 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 85A2 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 85A3 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 85A5 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 85A7 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 85A9 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 85AA BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 85AB 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 85AD 3A 7A 85     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 85B0 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 85B1 ED 43 78 85                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 85B5 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 85B6 CD EE 84                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 85B9 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 85BA 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 85BB B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 85BC C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 85BD CD F6 84     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 85C0 3A D2 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 85C3 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 85C4 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 85C6 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 85C7 32 D2 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 85CA 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 85CC
 148+ 85CC              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 85CC 3A 5E 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 85CF E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 85D1 32 8A 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 85D4 3A 5F 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 85D7 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 85D9 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 85DB CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 85DD CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 85DF E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 85E1 32 8B 7F     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 85E4 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 85E6 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 85E8 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 85EA              .Fedual:
 163+ 85EA 3A 8A 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 85ED F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 85EF 32 8A 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 85F2              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 85F2 3A 8A 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 85F5 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 85F7 32 8C 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 85FA 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 85FB 3A 60 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 85FE E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 8600 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 8601 32 8C 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 8604 3A 8B 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 8607 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 8609 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 860A 3A 8C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 860D 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 860E 32 8C 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 8611 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 8613 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 8615 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 8616 3A 8A 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 8619 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 861A 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 861B 3A 8B 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 861E 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 861F 32 8D 7F     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 8622 3A 8A 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 8625 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 8627 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 8629 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 862A 3A 8B 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 862D C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 862F 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 8630 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 8632 3A 8D 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 8635 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 8636 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 8638 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 863A CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 863C CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 863E CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 8640 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 8642 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 8644 ED 53 8F 7F  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 8648              .DoRadius:
 209+ 8648 3A 60 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 864B 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 864C 3A 62 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 864F E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 8651 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 8653 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 8654 ED 43 93 7F  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 8658 C9           		ret
 217+ 8659
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  53+ 87B5              getTableText:
  54+ 87B5              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 87B5              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 87B5 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 87B6 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 87B8 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 87BA 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 87BB 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 87BC 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 87BD EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 87BE D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 87BF C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 87C0
  66+ 87C0
  67+ 87C0              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 87C0              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 87C0              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 87C0              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 87C0              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 87C0              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 87C0              getRankIndex:
  74+ 87C0              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 87C0              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 87C0 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 87C1 B3           	or		e
  78+ 87C2 FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 87C4 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 87C5 AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 87C6 21 FE 86     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 87C9              .testLoop:
  83+ 87C9 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 87CA 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 87CB 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 87CC E5           	push	hl
  87+ 87CD 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 87CE 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 87CF CD 73 98     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 87D2 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 87D4              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 87D4 E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 87D5 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 87D6 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 87D7 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 87D8 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 87DA              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 87DA E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 87DB C9           	ret
 100+ 87DC

 222+ 8DD8 80 8D 84 8D  TextTokens			DW  TextLargeCargoBay, TextEscapePod, TextFuelScoops				; 0 2
 222+ 8DDC 87 8D
 223+ 8DDE 8A 8D 8D 8D  					DW  TextECMSystem, TextEnergyBomb, TextEnergyUnit					; 3 5

 226+ 8DF4 B0 8D
 227+ 8DF6 B3 8D B6 8D  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 227+ 8DFA BC 8D B9 8D
 227+ 8DFE C5 8D BF 8D
 227+ 8E02 C2 8D C8 8D
 228+ 8E06 CB 8D        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23
 229+ 8E08 CE 8D D2 8D  					DW  Text0LightYears, TextMarketPrices
 230+ 8E0C D7 8D        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 231+ 8E0E 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 232+ 8E2F
 233+ 8E2F              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 234+ 8E2F              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 235+ 8E2F
 236+ 8E2F              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8E2F              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8E2F              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8E2F 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8E30 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8E31 FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8E33 C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8E34 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8E36 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8E38 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8E3A 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8E3C              .LowerCase:
 248+ 8E3C C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 8E3E 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8E3F 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 251+ 8E41
 252+ 8E41 21 28 8D     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 8E44 C3 4A 8E                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 8E47
 255+ 8E47 21 5A 8C     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 8E4A ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8E4C ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8E4E D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8E4F 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8E50 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8E51 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8E52 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8E53 D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 8E54 C9                                   ret
 265+ 8E55
 266+ 8E55
 267+ 8E55              expandTokenToString:
 268+ 8E55              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 269+ 8E55 21 D8 8D     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 270+ 8E58 CD B5 87     	call	getTableText
 271+ 8E5B 11 0E 8E     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8E5E              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8E5E 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8E5F FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8E61 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8E63 E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8E64 D5           	push	de
 278+ 8E65 21 5A 8C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8E68 CD B5 87     	call	getTableText
 280+ 8E6B D1           	pop		de
 281+ 8E6C              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8E6C 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8E6D FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8E6F 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8E71              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8E71 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8E72 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8E73 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8E74 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8E76              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8E76 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8E78 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8E79 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8E7A E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8E7B 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8E7C 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8E7E              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8E7E 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8E7F AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8E80 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8E81 C9           	ret
 302+ 8E82
# file closed: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

  12+ 8EFB              NamingLoop:
  13+ 8EFB 3A 62 7F     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ 8EFE E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ 8F00 FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ 8F02 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ 8F04 C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ 8F06 CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2

 194+ 8F1C              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ 8F1C              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0

 197+ 8F1C              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ 8F1C              ;60                      RTS
 199+ 8F1C              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ 8F1C              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ 8F1C              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ 8F1C              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ 8F1C              ;60                      RTS
 204+ 8F1C              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ 8F1C              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ 8F1C              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ 8F1C              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ 8F1C              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ 8F1C              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ 8F1C              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ 8F1C              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ 8F1C              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ 8F1C              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ 8F1C              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ 8F1C              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ 8F1C              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ 8F1C              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 8F1C              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 8F1C              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 8F1C              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 8F1C              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 8F1C              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 8F1C              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 8F1C              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 8F1C              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 8F1C              ;
 227+ 8F1C              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 8F1C              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 8F1C              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 8F1C              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 8F1C              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 8F1C              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 8F1C              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 8F1C              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 8F1C              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 8F1C              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 8F1C              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 8F1C              ;
 239+ 8F1C              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 8F1C              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 8F1C              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 8F1C              ;
 243+ 8F1C              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ 8F1C              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 8F1C              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 8F1C              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 8F1C              ;
 248+ 8F1C              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 8F1C              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 8F1C              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 8F1C              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 8F1C              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 8F1C              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 8F1C              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 8F1C              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 8F1C              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 8F1C              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 8F1C              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 8F1C              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 8F1C              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 8F1C              ;
 262+ 8F1C              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.

 264+ 8F1C              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160

 275+ 8F1C              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160

 279+ 8F1C              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256

 637  8F1C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"

   1+ 8F1C              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 8F1C 2A 2D 84     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 8F1F 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 8F20 22 2D 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 8F23 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 8F26 2A 2F 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 8F29 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 8F2B 22 2F 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 8F2E C9                                   ret
  10+ 8F2F
  11+ 8F2F 2A 2D 84     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 8F32 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 8F33 B5                                   or      l
  14+ 8F34 2A 2F 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 8F37 B4                                   or      h
  16+ 8F38 B5                                   or      l
  17+ 8F39 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 8F3A B7                                   or      a
  19+ 8F3B 2A 2D 84                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 8F3E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 8F40 22 2D 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 8F43 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 8F46 2A 2F 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 8F49 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 8F4B 22 2F 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 8F4E                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 8F4E CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 8F50 C2 54 8F    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 8F53 C9                                   ret
  28+ 8F54 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ 8F57 22 2D 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ 8F5A 22 2F 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ 8F5D C9                                   ret
