# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 8F5E              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 8F5E              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 8F5E 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 8F5F E5                                   push hl
   5+ 8F60 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 8F62 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 8F64 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 8F65 AF                                   xor a
   9+ 8F66 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 8F67 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 8F68 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 8F6A CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 8F6C ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 8F6E 17                                   rla
  15+ 8F6F B9                                   cp c
  16+ 8F70 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 8F72 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 8F74 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 8F76 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 8F77 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 8F79 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 8F7B 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 8F7C DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 8F7E E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 8F7F 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 8F80 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 8F81 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 8F83 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 8F84 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 8F85 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 8F87 D1                                   pop de
  32+ 8F88 C9                                   ret
  33+ 8F89
  34+ 8F89 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 8F8B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 8F8D CD 5E 8F                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 8F90 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 8F91 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 8F93 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 8F95 B1                                   or      c
  41+ 8F96 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 8F97 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 8F98 C9                                   ret
  44+ 8F99
  45+ 8F99                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 8F99 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 8F9B A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 8F9C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 8F9E FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 8FA0 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 8FA1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 8FA3 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 8FA4 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 8FA6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 8FA8 CD 5E 8F                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 8FAB FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 8FAD FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 8FAF 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 8FB0 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 8FB2 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 8FB3 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 8FB5 C9                                   ret
  63+ 8FB6
  64+ 8FB6              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 8FB6              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 8FB6              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 8FB6              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 8FB6 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 8FB7 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 8FB9 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 8FBB 3A CD 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 8FBE 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 8FBF 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 8FC2 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 8FC3 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 8FC5 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 8FC7 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 8FC8 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 8FCA ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 8FCC 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 8FCE 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 8FCF 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 8FD0 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 8FD2 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 8FD3 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 8FD6 C9                                   ret

   4+ 8FDD C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 8FDF 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 8FE2 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 8FE3                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 8FE3 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 8FE5 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 8FE7 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 8FE9 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 8FEB EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 8FEC 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 8FED EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 8FEE              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1

  13+ 8FF0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l

  17+ 8FF8 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 8FF9 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 8FFB C9                                   ret

  35+ 9005              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  36+ 9005 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  37+ 9005 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  38+ 9005 ~                                    ld      e,a
  39+ 9005 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  40+ 9005 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  41+ 9005 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  42+ 9005 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  43+ 9005 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 9005 ~                                    ld      d,a
  45+ 9005 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  46+ 9005 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  47+ 9005 ~                                    ld      e,a
  48+ 9005 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  49+ 9005 ~                                    ld      a,d
  50+ 9005 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  51+ 9005 ~                                    ld      d,a
  52+ 9005                                      ENDM

  73+ 9046 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  74+ 9047 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  75+ 9049 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  76+ 904A AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  77+ 904B                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  77+ 904B FA 63 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  78+ 904E 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  79+ 904F B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9050                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  80+ 9050 FA 55 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  81+ 9053 19                                   add     hl,de
  82+ 9054 C9                                   ret
  83+ 9055 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  84+ 9056 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  85+ 9058 67                                   ld      h,a
  86+ 9059 7A                                   ld      a,d
  87+ 905A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  88+ 905C 57                                   ld      d,a
  89+ 905D 19                                   add     hl,de
  90+ 905E 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  91+ 9060 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  92+ 9061 67                                   ld      h,a
  93+ 9062 C9                                   ret
  94+ 9063 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  95+ 9064 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  96+ 9066 67                                   ld      h,a
  97+ 9067 7A                                   ld      a,d
  98+ 9068 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  99+ 906A 57                                   ld      d,a
 100+ 906B B7                                   or      a
 101+ 906C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 102+ 906E 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 103+ 9070 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 104+ 9071 B4                                   or      h
 105+ 9072 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 106+ 9073 C9                                   ret
 107+ 9074              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 107+ 9074 AF          >                    xor a
 107+ 9075 95          >                    sub l
 107+ 9076 6F          >                    ld l,a
 107+ 9077 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 107+ 9078 94          >                    sub h
 107+ 9079 67          >                    ld h,a
 108+ 907A 78                                   ld      a,b
 109+ 907B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 110+ 907D B4                                   or      h
 111+ 907E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 112+ 907F C9                                   ret
 113+ 9080
 114+ 9080
 115+ 9080                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 116+ 9080                  ;
 117+ 9080                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 118+ 9080                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 119+ 9080                  ;
 120+ 9080                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 121+ 9080                  ;         carry reset
 122+ 9080                  ;
 123+ 9080                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 124+ 9080 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 125+ 9081 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 126+ 9082 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 127+ 9084 EB                                   ex de,hl
 128+ 9085 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 129+ 9087
 130+ 9087 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 131+ 9088 85                                   add a,l
 132+ 9089 57                                   ld  d,a
 133+ 908A EB                                   ex de,hl
 134+ 908B
 135+ 908B 7A                                   ld  a,d
 136+ 908C CE 00                                adc a,0
 137+ 908E C9                                   ret
 138+ 908F
 139+ 908F 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 140+ 9090 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 141+ 9091 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 142+ 9093 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 143+ 9094 C9                                   ret
 144+ 9095
 145+ 9095                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 146+ 9095                 ;
 147+ 9095                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 148+ 9095                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 149+ 9095                 ;
 150+ 9095                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 151+ 9095                 ;         carry reset
 152+ 9095                 ;
 153+ 9095                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 154+ 9095
 155+ 9095
 156+ 9095
 157+ 9095 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 158+ 9096 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 159+ 9097 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 160+ 9098 6A                                   ld l,d
 161+ 9099 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 162+ 909A 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 163+ 909B              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 164+ 909B ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 165+ 909D EB                                   ex de,hl
 166+ 909E ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 167+ 90A0
 168+ 90A0 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 169+ 90A1 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 170+ 90A2 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 171+ 90A3
 172+ 90A3 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 173+ 90A4 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 174+ 90A5 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 175+ 90A7
 176+ 90A7 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 177+ 90A8 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 178+ 90A9
 179+ 90A9 7A                                   ld a,d
 180+ 90AA 85                                   add a,l
 181+ 90AB 67                                   ld h,a
 182+ 90AC 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 183+ 90AD
 184+ 90AD D1                                   pop de
 185+ 90AE ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 186+ 90B0
 187+ 90B0 EB                                   ex de,hl
 188+ 90B1 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 189+ 90B3 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 190+ 90B4
 191+ 90B4 C9                                   ret
 192+ 90B5
 193+ 90B5              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 194+ 90B5              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 195+ 90B5              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 196+ 90B5              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 197+ 90B5              ;         carry reset
 198+ 90B5              ; maths is
 199+ 90B5              ;        hl = y , de= x
 200+ 90B5              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 201+ 90B5              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 202+ 90B5              ;
 203+ 90B5              ;
 204+ 90B5              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 205+ 90B5 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 206+ 90B6 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 207+ 90B7 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 208+ 90B8 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 209+ 90B9 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 210+ 90BA 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 211+ 90BB ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 212+ 90BD EB                                   ex de,hl
 213+ 90BE ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 214+ 90C0 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 215+ 90C1 59                                   ld e,c
 216+ 90C2 50                                   ld d,b
 217+ 90C3 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 218+ 90C5 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 219+ 90C6 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 220+ 90C7 67                                   ld h,a
 221+ 90C8 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 222+ 90C9                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 223+ 90C9 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 224+ 90CA C1                                   pop     bc
 225+ 90CB C9                                   ret
 226+ 90CC
 227+ 90CC
 228+ 90CC              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 229+ 90CC              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 230+ 90CC 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 231+ 90CD AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 232+ 90CE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 233+ 90D0 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 234+ 90D2 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 235+ 90D3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 236+ 90D5 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 237+ 90D6 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 238+ 90D7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 239+ 90D9              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 240+ 90D9 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 241+ 90DA 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 242+ 90DB ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 243+ 90DD 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 244+ 90DE 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 245+ 90DF 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 246+ 90E0 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 247+ 90E1 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 248+ 90E2 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 249+ 90E3 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 250+ 90E5 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 251+ 90E6 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 252+ 90E7 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 253+ 90E8 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 254+ 90E9 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 255+ 90EA 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 256+ 90EB 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 257+ 90EC ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 258+ 90EE 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 259+ 90EF 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 260+ 90F0 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 261+ 90F2 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 262+ 90F3 C9                                   ret
 263+ 90F4
 264+ 90F4              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 265+ 90F4              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 266+ 90F4              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 267+ 90F4              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 268+ 90F4              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 269+ 90F4              ;mult3
 270+ 90F4              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 271+ 90F4              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 272+ 90F4              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 273+ 90F4              ; Algorithm
 274+ 90F4              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 275+ 90F4              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 276+ 90F4              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 277+ 90F4              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 278+ 90F4              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 279+ 90F4              ;
 280+ 90F4              ;
 281+ 90F4 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 282+ 90F5 AC                                   xor     h
 283+ 90F6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 284+ 90F8 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 285+ 90FA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 286+ 90FB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ 90FD 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 288+ 90FF              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 288+ 90FF AF          >                    xor a
 288+ 9100 95          >                    sub l
 288+ 9101 6F          >                    ld l,a
 288+ 9102 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 288+ 9103 94          >                    sub h
 288+ 9104 67          >                    ld h,a
 289+ 9105 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 290+ 9106 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 291+ 9108 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 292+ 910A              .DENegative:            NegDE
 292+ 910A AF          >                    xor a
 292+ 910B 93          >                    sub e
 292+ 910C 5F          >                    ld e,a
 292+ 910D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 292+ 910E 92          >                    sub d
 292+ 910F 57          >                    ld d,a
 293+ 9110 CD B5 90     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 294+ 9113 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 295+ 9115 A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 296+ 9116 C8                                   ret     z
 297+ 9117
 298+ 9117
 299+ 9117
 300+ 9117 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 301+ 9118 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 302+ 9119 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 303+ 911B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 304+ 911D 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 305+ 911E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 306+ 9120 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 307+ 9121 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 308+ 9122 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 309+ 9124 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 310+ 9125 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 311+ 9126 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 312+ 9128 7C                                   ld      a,h
 313+ 9129 B5                                   or      l
 314+ 912A B3                                   or      e
 315+ 912B 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 316+ 912D              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 317+ 912D 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 318+ 912E ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 319+ 9130 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 320+ 9131 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 321+ 9133 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 322+ 9134 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 323+ 9135 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 324+ 9137 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 325+ 9139 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 326+ 913A 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 327+ 913B FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 328+ 913D 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 329+ 913E 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 330+ 913F ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 331+ 9141 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 332+ 9143 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 333+ 9144 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 334+ 9145 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 335+ 9146 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 336+ 9148 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 337+ 914A 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 338+ 914B C9                                   ret
 339+ 914C 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 340+ 914F                                      ZeroA
 340+ 914F AF          >                        xor a
 341+ 9150 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 9151 6F                                   ld      l,a
 343+ 9152 C9                                   ret
 344+ 9153
 345+ 9153              ;;;
 346+ 9153              ;;;
 347+ 9153              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 348+ 9153              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 349+ 9153              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 350+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 351+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 352+ 9153              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 353+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 354+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 355+ 9153              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 356+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 357+ 9153              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 358+ 9153              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 359+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 360+ 9153              ;;;                        or      l
 361+ 9153              ;;;                        or      e
 362+ 9153              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 363+ 9153              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 364+ 9153              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 365+ 9153              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 366+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 367+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 368+ 9153              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 369+ 9153              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 370+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 371+ 9153              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 372+ 9153              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 373+ 9153              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 374+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 375+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 376+ 9153              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 377+ 9153              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 378+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 379+ 9153              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 380+ 9153              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 381+ 9153              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 382+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 383+ 9153              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 384+ 9153              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 385+ 9153              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 386+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 387+ 9153              ;;;                        ret
 388+ 9153              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 389+ 9153              ;;;                        ZeroA
 390+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 391+ 9153              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 392+ 9153              ;;;                        ret
 393+ 9153
 394+ 9153              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 395+ 9153              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 396+ 9153              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 397+ 9153              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 398+ 9153              ;         carry reset
 399+ 9153              ;
 400+ 9153              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 401+ 9153 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 402+ 9154 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 403+ 9155 32 53 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 404+ 9158 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 405+ 9159 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 406+ 915C 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 407+ 915E E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 408+ 9160 57                                   ld      d,a
 409+ 9161 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 410+ 9163 32 53 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 411+ 9166 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 412+ 9167 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 413+ 916A 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 414+ 916C E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 415+ 916E 67                                   ld      h,a
 416+ 916F 3A 53 91                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 417+ 9172 EE 80                                xor     $80
 418+ 9174 32 53 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 419+ 9177 CD B5 90     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 420+ 917A 3A 53 91     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 421+ 917D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 422+ 9180 C8                                   ret     z
 423+ 9181 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 424+ 9182 95                                   sub 	l
 425+ 9183 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 426+ 9184 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 427+ 9185 94                                   sub 	h
 428+ 9186 67                                   ld 		h,a
 429+ 9187 C9                                   ret
 430+ 9188
 431+ 9188 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 432+ 9189 32 53 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 433+ 918C 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 434+ 918D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 435+ 9190 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 436+ 9192 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 437+ 9194 57                                   ld      d,a
 438+ 9195 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 439+ 9197 32 53 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 440+ 919A CD B5 90     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 441+ 919D 3A 53 91     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 442+ 91A0 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 443+ 91A3 C8                                   ret     z
 444+ 91A4 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 445+ 91A5 95                                   sub 	l
 446+ 91A6 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 447+ 91A7 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 448+ 91A8 94                                   sub 	h
 449+ 91A9 67                                   ld 		h,a
 450+ 91AA C9                                   ret
 451+ 91AB
 452+ 91AB
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 640  91AB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 91AB              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 91AB              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 91AB
   4+ 91AB              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 91AB ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 91AB ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 91AB ~            			mul
   8+ 91AB              			ENDM
   9+ 91AB
  10+ 91AB              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 91AB ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 91AB ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 91AB ~            			mul
  14+ 91AB ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 91AB              			ENDM
  16+ 91AB
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 641  91AB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sine.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sine.asm
   1+ 91AB              ;- MACROS
   2+ 91AB              LookupSineAMacro:       MACRO
   3+ 91AB ~                                    ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   4+ 91AB ~                                    add     hl, a
   5+ 91AB ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
   6+ 91AB                                      ENDM
   7+ 91AB
   8+ 91AB              ; Gets the sine of A from the lookup table into A
   9+ 91AB              LookupSineA:            LookupSineAMacro
   9+ 91AB 21 54 92    >                        ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   9+ 91AE ED 31       >                        add     hl, a
   9+ 91B0 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  10+ 91B1 C9                                   ret
  11+ 91B2

 642  91B2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 91B2              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 91B2              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 91B2              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 91B2              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 91B2              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 91B2              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 91B2 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 91B5 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 91B6 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 91B7              .sqrloop:
  11+ 91B7 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 91B9 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 91BB 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 91BC EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 91BD ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 91BF 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 91C1 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 91C2 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 91C3 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 91C5              .sqrbit:
  21+ 91C5 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 91C6 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 91C7 B7           	or a
  24+ 91C8 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 91CA              .sqrfi:
  26+ 91CA CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 91CC CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 91CE CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 91D0 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 91D2 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 91D4 C9           	ret
  32+ 91D5
  33+ 91D5
  34+ 91D5              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 91D5 3A CD 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 91D8 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 91D9 3A CE 7E     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 91DC 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 91DD CD B2 91     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 91E0 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 91E1 32 CD 7E     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 91E4 C9           	ret
  43+ 91E5
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 643  91E5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_arctan.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
   1+ 91E5              ;Calculate A = arctan(P / Q)
   2+ 91E5              ; This finds the angle in the right-angled triangle where the opposite side to angle A is length P and the adjacent side to angle A has
   3+ 91E5              ; length Q, so:  tan(A) = P / Q
   4+ 91E5              ;
   5+ 91E5              ; The result in A is an integer representing the angle in radians. The routine returns values in the range 0 to 128,  (or 0 to PI radians).
   6+ 91E5 3A CD 7D     ARCTAN:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set T1 = P EOR Q, which will have the sign of P * Q
   7+ 91E8 21 CD 7E                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; EOR Q
   8+ 91EB AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
   9+ 91EC 32 CA 7D                             ld      (varT1),a                   ; STA T1
  10+ 91EF 3A CD 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDA Q                  \ If Q = 0, jump to AR2 to return a right angle
  11+ 91F2 A7                                   and     a                           ; BEQ AR2
  12+ 91F3 CA 35 92                             jp      z, .AR2                     ; .
  13+ 91F6 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Set Q = |Q| * 2 (this is a quick way of clearing the
  14+ 91F8 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ sign bit, and we don't need to shift right again as we only ever use this value in the division with |P| * 2, which we set next)
  15+ 91FB 3A CD 7D                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set A = |P| * 2
  16+ 91FE CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A
  17+ 9200 32 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),a
  18+ 9203 21 CD 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
  19+ 9206 BE                                   cp      (hl)                        ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, i.e. |P| > |Q|, jump to AR1 to swap P
  20+ 9207 D2 19 92                             jp      nc, .AR1                    ; BCS AR1                \ and Q around, so we can still use the lookup table
  21+ 920A CD 41 92                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table:  A = arctan(A / Q)  = arctan(|P / Q|)
  22+ 920D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag so the SBC instruction in AR3 will be correct, should we jump there
  22+ 920D B7          >                        or a
  23+ 920E 4F           .AR4:                   ld      c,a                         ; as we have to use a we use c as a temp, we can't push af as we would loose flags on pop
  24+ 920F 3A CA 7D                             ld      a,(varT1)                   ; LDX T1                 \ If T1 is negative, i.e. P and Q have different signs,
  25+ 9212 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  26+ 9213 A7                                   and     a                           ; BMI AR3                \ jump down to AR3 to return arctan(-|P / Q|)
  27+ 9214 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; .                      \ we need to get a back before jump
  28+ 9215 FA 38 92                             jp      m, .AR3                     ; .
  29+ 9218 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Otherwise P and Q have the same sign, so our result is correct and we can return from the subroutine
  30+ 9219              ; We want to calculate arctan(t) where |t| > 1, so we can use the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 64 - arctan(1 / t)
  31+ 9219              ; In the 6502 verion it works with A already being P but we will fetch it
  32+ 9219 3A CD 7E     .AR1:                   ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDX Q                  \ Swap the values in Q and P, using the fact that we
  33+ 921C 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  34+ 921D 3A CD 7D                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; STA Q                  \ called AR1 with A = P
  35+ 9220 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
  36+ 9223 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; TXA                    \ This also sets A = P (which now contains the original argument |Q|)
  37+ 9224 32 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STX P                  \
  38+ 9227 CD 41 92                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table: A = arctan(A / Q) = arctan(|Q / P|) = arctan(1 / |P / Q|)
  39+ 922A 32 E9 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T                  \ Set T = 64 - T, we use B as T (its not really that)
  40+ 922D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; its actually t = a, a = 64-a
  41+ 922E 3E 40                                ld      a,64                        ; LDA #64 What is going on here is t = result
  42+ 9230                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                            a = 64- result
  42+ 9230 B7          >                        or a
  43+ 9231 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; .
  44+ 9232 C3 0E 92                             jp      .AR4                        ; BCS AR4                \ Jump to AR4 to continue the calculation (this BCS is effectively a JMP as the subtraction will never underflow, as ARS1 returns values in the range 0-31)
  45+ 9235              ; If we get here then Q = 0, so tan(A) = infinity and A is a right angle, or 0.25 of a circle. We allocate 255 to a full circle, so we should return 63 for a right angle
  46+ 9235 3E 3F        .AR2:                   ld      a,63                        ; LDA #63                \ Set A to 63, to represent a right angle
  47+ 9237 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  48+ 9238              ; A contains arctan(|P / Q|) but P and Q have different signs, so we need to return arctan(-|P / Q|), using the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 128 - A
  49+ 9238 32 E9 7E     .AR3:                   ld      (varT),a
  50+ 923B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; STA T                  \ Set A = 128 - A, we use b as T
  51+ 923C 3E 80                                ld      a,128                       ; LDA #128               \
  52+ 923E                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                  \ The subtraction will work because we did a SEC before calling AR3
  52+ 923E B7          >                        or a
  53+ 923F 98                                   sbc     a,b
  54+ 9240 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  55+ 9241              ; This routine fetches arctan(A / Q) from the ACT table, so A will be set to an integer in the range 0 to 31 that represents an angle from 0 to 45 degrees (or 0 to \ PI / 4 radians)
  56+ 9241 CD 6A A0     ARS1:                   call    LL28Amul256DivQ_6502        ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q
  57+ 9244 3A CE 7E                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set X = R / 8
  58+ 9247 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \       = 32 * A / Q
  59+ 9249 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \
  60+ 924B CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ so X has the value t * 32 where t = A / Q, which is
  61+ 924D 21 74 92                             ld      hl,ACT                      ; TAX                    \ what we need to look up values in the ACT table
  62+ 9250 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; LDA ACT,X              \ Fetch ACT+X from the ACT table into A, so now:
  63+ 9252 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                        \   A = value in ACT + X = value in ACT + (32 * A / Q)= arctan(A / Q)
  64+ 9253 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  65+ 9254
  66+ 9254              ;;;arctan:										; .ARCTAN	\ -> &2A3C  \ A=TAN-1(P/Q) \ A=arctan (P/Q)  called from block E
  67+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; a = var P
  68+ 9254              ;;;		ld		hl,varQ
  69+ 9254              ;;;		xor		(hl)						; a = var p XOR varQ
  70+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,(varT1)					; \ T1	 \ quadrant info
  71+ 9254              ;;;		ld		c,a							; c = copy of T1
  72+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; Q
  73+ 9254              ;;;		cp		0
  74+ 9254              ;;;		jr		z,.AR2						;  Q=0 so set angle to 63, pi/2
  75+ 9254              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; Q move to reg B?
  76+ 9254              ;;;		ld		d,a							; copy to reg d
  77+ 9254              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  78+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; P
  79+ 9254              ;;;		ld		e,a							; copy to reg e
  80+ 9254              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  81+ 9254              ;;;		cp		d							; compare with b (unsigned varQ * 2)
  82+ 9254              ;;;		jr		nc, .ars1					; if q >  p then adjust  swop A and Q as A >= Q
  83+ 9254              ;;;		call	ars1						; \ ARS1 \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
  84+ 9254              ;;;		scf									; set carry flag
  85+ 9254              ;;;.ar4:										; sub o.k
  86+ 9254              ;;;		bit 	7,c							; is T1 (also in c) negative?
  87+ 9254              ;;;		jr		nz,.ar3						;  -ve quadrant
  88+ 9254              ;;;		ret
  89+ 9254              ;;;.ar1:										; swop A and Q entering here d = q and e = P
  90+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,d							; a = varQ
  91+ 9254              ;;;		ld		d,e							; varQ = varP
  92+ 9254              ;;;		ld		e,a							; swap D and E around
  93+ 9254              ;;;		ld		(varP),a					; write to actual variables
  94+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,d
  95+ 9254              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; write to actual variables
  96+ 9254              ;;;		call	.ars1
  97+ 9254              ;;;		ld		(varT),b
  98+ 9254              ;;;		ld		b,a							; B = T = angle
  99+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,64						; next range of angle, pi/4 to pi/2
 100+ 9254              ;;;		sub		a,b							; a = 64 - T (or b)
 101+ 9254              ;;;		jr		nc,.ar4						;  sub o.k
 102+ 9254              ;;;.ar2:										; .AR2	\ set angle to 90 degrees
 103+ 9254              ;;;		ld 		a,&3F						;  #63
 104+ 9254              ;;;		ret
 105+ 9254              ;;;.ar3:										;.AR3	\ -ve quadrant
 106+ 9254              ;;;		ld		b,a							; b = T	= \ angle
 107+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,ConstPi					; a = Pi
 108+ 9254              ;;;		sub		b,a							; A = 128-T, so now covering range pi/2 to pi correctly
 109+ 9254              ;;;		ret
 110+ 9254              ;;;.ars1:										; .ARS1	\ -> &2A75  \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
 111+ 9254              ;;;		call	RequAmul256divQ				;  LL28 \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
 112+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,(regA)
 113+ 9254              ;;;		srl		a
 114+ 9254              ;;;		srl		a
 115+ 9254              ;;;		srl		a							;  31 max.
 116+ 9254              ;;;		ld		hl, ArcTanTable				; root of index into table at end of words data
 117+ 9254              ;;;		add		hl,a						; now at real data
 118+ 9254              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; a =  ACT[a]
 119+ 9254              ;;;.arsr:										; rts used by laser lines below (will not in later code)
 120+ 9254              ;;;		ret
 121+ 9254
 122+ 9254
 123+ 9254
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
 644  9254                  INCLUDE "./Maths/SineTable.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/SineTable.asm
   1+ 9254              ;; PRINT "SIN TABLE"
   2+ 9254              ;; FOR I% =  0 TO  31
   3+ 9254              ;; N = ABS(SIN((I%/64)*2*PI))
   4+ 9254              ;; IF N >= 1 THEN B% = 255  ELSE B% = INT(256 * N + 0.5)
   5+ 9254              ;; PRINT B%
   6+ 9254              ;; NEXT I%
   7+ 9254
   8+ 9254
   9+ 9254 00 19 32 4A  SNE:            DB 000, 025, 050, 074, 098, 121, 142, 162
   9+ 9258 62 79 8E A2
  10+ 925C B5 C6 D5 E2                  DB 181, 198, 213, 226, 237, 245, 251, 255
  10+ 9260 ED F5 FB FF
  11+ 9264 FF FF FB F5                  DB 255, 255, 251, 245, 237, 226, 213, 198

 645  9274                  INCLUDE "./Maths/ArcTanTable.asm"
