 646  9294                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 9294              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 9294              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 9294                      ; Input:
   4+ 9294                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 9294                      ; Output:
   6+ 9294                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 9294                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 9294                      ;       AF
   9+ 9294                      ;
  10+ 9294              negate16:
  11+ 9294 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 9295 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 9296 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 9297 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 9298 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 9299 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 929A C9                               ret
  18+ 929B
  19+ 929B AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 929C 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 929D 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 929E 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 929F 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 92A0 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 92A1 C9                               ret
  26+ 92A2
  27+ 92A2 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 92A3 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 92A4 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 92A5 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 92A6 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 92A7 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 92A8 C9                               ret
  34+ 92A9
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 647  92A9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 92A9              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 92A9              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 92A9
   4+ 92A9              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 92A9 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 92AD 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 92B0
   8+ 92B0                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 92B0              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 92B0              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 92B0
  12+ 92B0              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 92B0              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 92B0 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 92B2 DA C7 92                             jp      c,.LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 92B5                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 92B5 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 92B6                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 92B6 B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 92B7 DA BC 92    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 92BA                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 92BA 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 92BB                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 92BB B7          >                        or a
  21+ 92BC              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 92BC 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 92BD CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 92BF DA B0 92                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 92C2 78                                   ld      a,b
  25+ 92C3 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 92C6 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  27+ 92C7 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  28+ 92C8                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 92C8 37          >                        scf
  29+ 92C9 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  30+ 92CB DA B0 92                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  31+ 92CE 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  32+ 92CF 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 92D2 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 92D3 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 92D5 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 92D8 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 92D9                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 92D9 37          >                        scf
  38+ 92DA C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 92DB
  40+ 92DB
  41+ 92DB 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  42+ 92DC
  43+ 92DC 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
  44+ 92DD 32 AB 92                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
  45+ 92E0 7A                                   ld      a,d
  46+ 92E1 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  47+ 92E3 32 AA 92                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
  48+ 92E6 7A                                   ld      a,d
  49+ 92E7 E6 80                                and     $80
  50+ 92E9 32 A9 92                             ld      (varQRS),a
  51+ 92EC C3 F2 92                             jp      DVID3B
  52+ 92EF              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
  53+ 92EF              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
  54+ 92EF 32 CF 7D     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
  55+ 92F2                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
  56+ 92F2                                                                          ; STA Q
  57+ 92F2                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
  58+ 92F2                                                                          ; STA R
  59+ 92F2                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
  60+ 92F2                                                                          ; STA S
  61+ 92F2              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
  62+ 92F2 3A CD 7D     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
  63+ 92F5 F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
  64+ 92F7 32 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
  65+ 92FA              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
  66+ 92FA 3A CF 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
  67+ 92FD 21 CF 7E                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
  68+ 9300 AE                                   xor     (hl)
  69+ 9301 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
  70+ 9303 32 E9 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
  71+ 9306              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
  72+ 9306 3A CD 7E     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
  73+ 9309 21 CE 7E                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
  74+ 930C B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
  75+ 930D C2 15 93                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
  76+ 9310 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
  77+ 9312 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
  78+ 9315              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
  79+ 9315 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
  80+ 9317 3A CF 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
  81+ 931A E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
  82+ 931C              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
  83+ 931C              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
  84+ 931C                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
  85+ 931C              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
  86+ 931C FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
  87+ 931E D2 2F 93                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
  88+ 9321 21 CD 7D                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
  89+ 9324 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
  90+ 9326 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
  91+ 9327 CB 16                                rl      (hl)
  92+ 9329 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
  93+ 932B 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
  94+ 932C C3 1C 93                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
  95+ 932F              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
  96+ 932F 32 CF 7D     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
  97+ 9332 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
  98+ 9335 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
  99+ 9337                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 100+ 9337              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 101+ 9337              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 102+ 9337              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 103+ 9337              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 104+ 9337 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 105+ 9338 21 CD 7E                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 106+ 933B CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 107+ 933D 21 CE 7E                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 108+ 9340 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 109+ 9342 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 110+ 9344 F2 37 93                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 111+ 9347              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 112+ 9347              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 113+ 9347 32 CD 7E     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 114+ 934A 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 115+ 934B 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 116+ 934C 32 DB 92                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 117+ 934F              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 118+ 934F 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 119+ 9351 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 120+ 9354 3A CF 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 121+ 9357 CD B0 92                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 122+ 935A              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 123+ 935A                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 123+ 935A AF          >                        xor a
 124+ 935B 32 E1 7E                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 125+ 935E 32 E2 7E                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 126+ 9361 32 E3 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 127+ 9364 3A DB 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 128+ 9367 B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 129+ 9368 CA 93 93                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 130+ 936B F2 9E 93                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 131+ 936E              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 132+ 936E                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 133+ 936E 48                                   ld      c,b
 134+ 936F 3A DB 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 135+ 9372 47                                   ld      b,a
 136+ 9373 79                                   ld      a,c
 137+ 9374                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 138+ 9374 CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 139+ 9376 21 E1 7E                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 140+ 9379 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 141+ 937B 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 142+ 937C CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 143+ 937E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 144+ 937F CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 145+ 9381 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 146+ 9382 C2 74 93                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 147+ 9385 32 E0 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 148+ 9388 3A E3 7E                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 149+ 938B 21 E9 7E                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 150+ 938E B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 151+ 938F 32 E3 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 152+ 9392 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 153+ 9393              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 154+ 9393 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 155+ 9394 32 E0 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 156+ 9397 3A E9 7E                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 157+ 939A 32 E3 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 158+ 939D C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 159+ 939E              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 160+ 939E              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 161+ 939E              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 162+ 939E              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 163+ 939E                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 164+ 939E 48                                   ld      c,b
 165+ 939F 3A DB 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 166+ 93A2 47                                   ld      b,a
 167+ 93A3 79                                   ld      a,c
 168+ 93A4 CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 169+ 93A6 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 170+ 93A7 C2 A4 93                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 171+ 93AA 32 E0 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 172+ 93AD 3A E9 7E                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 173+ 93B0 32 E3 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 174+ 93B3 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 175+ 93B4              ;
 176+ 93B4              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 177+ 93B4              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 178+ 93B4              ;           if carry was 0
 179+ 93B4              ;               if a >= D
 180+ 93B4              ;                   A = A - D
 181+ 93B4              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 182+ 93B4              ;           else
 183+ 93B4
 184+ 93B4              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 185+ 93B4              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 186+ 93B4              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 187+ 93B4              ;
 188+ 93B4              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 189+ 93B4              ;
 190+ 93B4              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 191+ 93B4              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 192+ 93B4
 193+ 93B4 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 194+ 93B5 3A CD 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
 195+ 93B8 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 196+ 93B9 3A CD 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
 197+ 93BC 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 198+ 93BD                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 199+ 93BD 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 200+ 93BE B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 201+ 93BF 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 202+ 93C1 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 203+ 93C2 A7                                   and     a                       ;
 204+ 93C3 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 205+ 93C5 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 206+ 93C6 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 207+ 93C7 E6 80                                and     $80
 208+ 93C9 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 209+ 93CA 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 210+ 93CC 06 10                                ld      b,16
 211+ 93CE                                      ShiftDELeft1
 211+ 93CE CB 23       >			   sla e
 211+ 93D0 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 212+ 93D2 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 213+ 93D4 CB 39                                srl     c
 214+ 93D6 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 215+ 93D8                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 215+ 93D8 B9          >                        cp      c
 215+ 93D9 DA DF 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 216+ 93DC                                      ClearCarryFlag
 216+ 93DC B7          >                        or a
 217+ 93DD 99                                   sbc     c
 218+ 93DE                                      ClearCarryFlag
 218+ 93DE B7          >                        or a
 219+ 93DF 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 220+ 93E0 CB 13                                rl      e
 221+ 93E2 CB 12                                rl      d
 222+ 93E4 05                                   dec     b
 223+ 93E5 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 224+ 93E7 7B                                   ld      a,e
 225+ 93E8 B5                                   or      l
 226+ 93E9 42                                   ld      b,d
 227+ 93EA C9                                   ret
 228+ 93EB              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 228+ 93EB AF          >                        xor a
 229+ 93EC 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ 93ED C9                                   ret
 231+ 93EE 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 232+ 93F0 47                                   ld      b,a
 233+ 93F1 C9                                   ret
 234+ 93F2
 235+ 93F2 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 236+ 93F3 3A CD 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
 237+ 93F6 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 238+ 93F8 3A CD 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
 239+ 93FB 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 240+ 93FC                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 241+ 93FC 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 242+ 93FD B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 243+ 93FE 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 244+ 9400 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 245+ 9401 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 246+ 9402 E6 80                                and     $80
 247+ 9404 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 248+ 9405 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 249+ 9407 06 10                                ld      b,16
 250+ 9409                                      ShiftDELeft1
 250+ 9409 CB 23       >			   sla e
 250+ 940B CB 12       >			   rl  d
 251+ 940D CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 252+ 940F CB 39                                srl     c
 253+ 9411 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 254+ 9413                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 254+ 9413 B9          >                        cp      c
 254+ 9414 DA 1A 94    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 255+ 9417                                      ClearCarryFlag
 255+ 9417 B7          >                        or a
 256+ 9418 99                                   sbc     c
 257+ 9419                                      ClearCarryFlag
 257+ 9419 B7          >                        or a
 258+ 941A 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 259+ 941B CB 13                                rl      e
 260+ 941D CB 12                                rl      d
 261+ 941F 05                                   dec     b
 262+ 9420 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 263+ 9422 7B                                   ld      a,e
 264+ 9423 B5                                   or      l
 265+ 9424 42                                   ld      b,d
 266+ 9425 C9                                   ret
 267+ 9426              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 267+ 9426 AF          >                        xor a
 268+ 9427 47                                   ld      b,a
 269+ 9428 C9                                   ret
 270+ 9429
 271+ 9429 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 272+ 942A 15                                   dec     d
 273+ 942B 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 274+ 942D 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 275+ 942F 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 276+ 9431 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 277+ 9432 B3                                   or      e
 278+ 9433 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 279+ 9435 14                                   inc     d
 280+ 9436 15                                   dec     d
 281+ 9437 CD 89 95                             call    BC_Div_DE
 282+ 943A                                      ZeroA
 282+ 943A AF          >                        xor a
 283+ 943B EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 284+ 943C 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 285+ 943E 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 286+ 943F C9                                   ret
 287+ 9440 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 288+ 9441 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 289+ 9442 67                                   ld      h,a
 290+ 9443 6F                                   ld      l,a
 291+ 9444 C9                                   ret
 292+ 9445 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 293+ 9447 67                                   ld      h,a
 294+ 9448 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 9449                                      SetCarryFlag
 295+ 9449 37          >                        scf
 296+ 944A C9                                   ret
 297+ 944B
 298+ 944B              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 299+ 944B                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 300+ 944B ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 301+ 944B ~                                    sla		a							;
 302+ 944B ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 303+ 944B ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 304+ 944B ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 305+ 944B ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 306+ 944B ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 307+ 944B ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 308+ 944B ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 309+ 944B ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 310+ 944B ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 311+ 944B ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 312+ 944B ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 313+ 944B ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 314+ 944B ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 315+ 944B ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 316+ 944B ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 317+ 944B ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 318+ 944B ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 319+ 944B ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 320+ 944B ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 321+ 944B ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 322+ 944B ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 323+ 944B ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 324+ 944B ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 325+ 944B ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 326+ 944B ~                                    ret
 327+ 944B ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 328+ 944B ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 329+ 944B ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 330+ 944B ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 331+ 944B ~                                    ret
 332+ 944B ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 333+ 944B ~                                    ret
 334+ 944B                          ENDIF
 335+ 944B
 336+ 944B BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 337+ 944C 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 338+ 944E 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 339+ 9450 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 340+ 9452 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 341+ 9454 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 342+ 9456                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 342+ 9456 BA          >                        cp      d
 342+ 9457 DA 5C 94    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 343+ 945A 92                                   sub     d
 344+ 945B                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 344+ 945B B7          >                        or a
 345+ 945C              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 345+ 945C 3F          >                        ccf
 346+ 945D CB 13                                rl      e
 347+ 945F 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 348+ 9461 7B                                   ld      a,e
 349+ 9462 C9                                   ret
 350+ 9463 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 351+ 9464                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 351+ 9464 37          >                        scf
 352+ 9465 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 353+ 9467 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 354+ 9469 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 355+ 946A C9                                   ret
 356+ 946B 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 357+ 946D C9                                   ret
 358+ 946E 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 359+ 9470 C9                                   ret
 360+ 9471
 361+ 9471              ; Divide 8-bit values
 362+ 9471              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 363+ 9471              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 364+ 9471              ;
 365+ 9471              ;;;Div8:
 366+ 9471              ;;;    xor a
 367+ 9471              ;;;    ld b,8
 368+ 9471              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 369+ 9471              ;;;    rl e
 370+ 9471              ;;;    rla
 371+ 9471              ;;;    sub c
 372+ 9471              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 373+ 9471              ;;;    add a,c
 374+ 9471              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 375+ 9471              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 376+ 9471              ;;;    ld b,a0
 377+ 9471              ;;;    ld a,e
 378+ 9471              ;;;    rla
 379+ 9471              ;;;    cpl
 380+ 9471              ;;;    ret
 381+ 9471
 382+ 9471              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 383+ 9471              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 384+ 9471              ;;         A is a copy of E
 385+ 9471              ;;         HL is the remainder
 386+ 9471              ;;         BC is not changed
 387+ 9471              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 388+ 9471              ;140 bytes
 389+ 9471              ;145cc
 390+ 9471
 391+ 9471              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 392+ 9471 ~                                rla
 393+ 9471 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 394+ 9471 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 395+ 9471 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 396+ 9471 ~                                add     hl,bc
 397+ 9471                                  ENDM
 398+ 9471

 400+ 9472 ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 401+ 9474 7A                               ld a,d

 427+ 94FD              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 428+ 94FD              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 429+ 94FD              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 430+ 94FD              ; Our use
 431+ 94FD              ; BC = A0
 432+ 94FD              ; DE = 0C
 433+ 94FD              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 434+ 94FD              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 434+ 94FD B9          >                        cp     c
 434+ 94FE D2 29 95    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 435+ 9501 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ 9502 59                                   ld      e,c
 437+ 9503 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 438+ 9505 16 00                                ld      d,0
 439+ 9507 C3 14 95                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 440+ 950A 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 441+ 950B 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 442+ 950D 21 CD 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
 443+ 9510 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 444+ 9511 16 00                                ld      d,0
 445+ 9513 5F                                   ld      e,a
 446+ 9514              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 447+ 9514 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 448+ 9517 78                                   ld      a,b
 449+ 9518 06 10                                ld      b,16
 450+ 951A CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 451+ 951C 17                                   rla			; ...
 452+ 951D ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 453+ 951F ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 454+ 9521 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 455+ 9523 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 456+ 9524 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 457+ 9525 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 458+ 9527 47                                   ld   b,a
 459+ 9528 C9                                   ret
 460+ 9529 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 461+ 952C C9                                   ret
 462+ 952D              ; switch to logarithm version
 463+ 952D              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 464+ 952D 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 465+ 952F AF                                   xor a
 466+ 9530 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 467+ 9532 17                                   rla
 468+ 9533 BA                                   cp d
 469+ 9534 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 469+ 9536
 470+ 9536 0C                                   inc c
 471+ 9537 92                                   sub d
 472+ 9538 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 473+ 953A C9                                   ret
 474+ 953B              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 475+ 953B 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 476+ 953D AF                                   xor a
 477+ 953E CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 478+ 9540 CB 14                                rl	h
 479+ 9542              ;    add hl,hl
 480+ 9542 17                                   rla
 481+ 9543 B9                                   cp c
 482+ 9544 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 483+ 9546 2C                                   inc l
 484+ 9547 91                                   sub c
 485+ 9548 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 486+ 954A C9                                   ret
 487+ 954B              ;
 488+ 954B              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 489+ 954B              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 490+ 954B              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 491+ 954B              ;
 492+ 954B              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 493+ 954B ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 494+ 954B ~                                    rla				; ...
 495+ 954B ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 496+ 954B ~                                    jr	1F
 497+ 954B ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 498+ 954B ~            1:
 499+ 954B ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 500+ 954B                                      ENDM

 503+ 954B ~                                    rl  e

 509+ 954B                                      ENDM

 529+ 9589              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 530+ 9589 ~                                    rla
 531+ 9589 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 532+ 9589 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 533+ 9589 ~                                    jr	    c,1F

 538+ 9589
 539+ 9589              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 540+ 9589              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 541+ 9589              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 542+ 9589              ;min: 738cc
 543+ 9589              ;max: 898cc
 544+ 9589              ;avg: 818cc
 545+ 9589              ;144 bytes
 546+ 9589 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 547+ 958A 67                                   ld h,a
 548+ 958B 6F                                   ld l,a
 549+ 958C 93                                   sub e
 550+ 958D 5F                                   ld e,a
 551+ 958E 9F                                   sbc a,a
 552+ 958F 92                                   sub d
 553+ 9590 57                                   ld d,a
 554+ 9591 78                                   ld a,b
 555+ 9592                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 555+ 9592 17          >                        rla
 555+ 9593 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 555+ 9595 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 555+ 9596 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 555+ 9598 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 555+ 959A             >1:
 556+ 959A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 556+ 959D 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 556+ 959E 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 556+ 95A0 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 556+ 95A2             >1:

 577+ 9618              ; BC = BC / DE
 578+ 9618              ; HL = BC % DE
 579+ 9618              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 580+ 9618 7A           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,d
 581+ 9619 B3                                   or      e
 582+ 961A 28 22                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 583+ 961C D5                                   push    de
 584+ 961D CD 89 95     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 585+ 9620 D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 586+ 9621 CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 587+ 9623 C2 33 96                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 588+ 9626 7A                                   ld      a,d
 589+ 9627 B3                                   or      e
 590+ 9628 CA 33 96                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 591+ 962B CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 592+ 962D C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 593+ 962E 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 594+ 962F                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 594+ 962F B7          >                        or a
 595+ 9630 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 596+ 9632 C9                                   ret
 597+ 9633 CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 598+ 9635 C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 599+ 9636 7C                                   ld      a,h
 600+ 9637 B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 601+ 9638 C8                                   ret     z
 602+ 9639 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 603+ 963A                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 603+ 963A B7          >                        or a
 604+ 963B ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 605+ 963D C9                                   ret
 606+ 963E
 607+ 963E
 608+ 963E 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 609+ 9641 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 610+ 9644 C9                                   ret
 611+ 9645
 612+ 9645
 613+ 9645              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 614+ 9645 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 615+ 9645 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 616+ 9645 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 617+ 9645 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 618+ 9645 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 619+ 9645 ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 620+ 9645 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 621+ 9645 ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 622+ 9645 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 623+ 9645 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 624+ 9645 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 625+ 9645 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 626+ 9645 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 627+ 9645 ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 628+ 9645 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 629+ 9645 ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 630+ 9645                                      ENDM

 648+ 976E 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 649+ 9771              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 649+ 9771 CB 25       >			   sla l
 649+ 9773 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 650+ 9775 7C                                   ld      a,h
 651+ 9776 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 652+ 9778                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 652+ 9778 B9          >                        cp      c
 652+ 9779 DA 84 97    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 653+ 977C 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 654+ 977D 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 655+ 977E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 656+ 977F 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 657+ 9780 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 658+ 9782 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 659+ 9783 3F                                   ccf
 660+ 9784              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 660+ 9784 CB 13       >               rl  e
 660+ 9786 CB 12       >               rl  d
 661+ 9788 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 662+ 978A EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 663+ 978B C9                                   ret

 666+ 978C AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 667+ 978D 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 668+ 978F 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 669+ 9790 17                                   rla
 670+ 9791 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 671+ 9793 B9                                   cp	c
 672+ 9794 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 673+ 9796 91                                   sub	c
 674+ 9797 2C                                   inc	l
 675+ 9798 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 676+ 979A C9                                   ret
 677+ 979B              ;l_div, signed division
 678+ 979B              ; comes in with DE and HL
 679+ 979B              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 680+ 979B 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 681+ 979C 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 682+ 979D C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 683+ 979E 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 684+ 979F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 685+ 97A0 B7                                   or      a
 686+ 97A1 F2 AA 97                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 687+ 97A4              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 687+ 97A4 AF          >					xor 	a
 687+ 97A5 93          >                    sub 	e
 687+ 97A6 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 687+ 97A7 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 687+ 97A8 92          >                    sub 	d
 687+ 97A9 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 688+ 97AA 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 689+ 97AB B7                                   or      a
 690+ 97AC F2 B5 97                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 691+ 97AF                                      macronegate16bc
 691+ 97AF AF          >					xor 	a
 691+ 97B0 91          >                    sub 	c
 691+ 97B1 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 691+ 97B2 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 691+ 97B3 90          >                    sub 	b
 691+ 97B4 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 692+ 97B5 CD 45 96     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 693+ 97B8                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 694+ 97B8 C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 695+ 97B9 78                                   ld      a,b
 696+ 97BA A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 697+ 97BB F2 C4 97                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 698+ 97BE                                      macronegate16hl
 698+ 97BE AF          >					xor 	a
 698+ 97BF 95          >					sub 	l
 698+ 97C0 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 698+ 97C1 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 698+ 97C2 94          >					sub 	h
 698+ 97C3 67          >					ld 		h,a
 699+ 97C4 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 700+ 97C5 B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 701+ 97C6 F0                                   ret     p
 702+ 97C7                                      macronegate16de
 702+ 97C7 AF          >					xor 	a
 702+ 97C8 93          >                    sub 	e
 702+ 97C9 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 702+ 97CA 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 702+ 97CB 92          >                    sub 	d
 702+ 97CC 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 703+ 97CD C9                                   ret

 648  97CE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 97CE              asm_tis2:
   2+ 97CE              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 97CE              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 97CE F5           	push af
   5+ 97CF E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 97D1 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 97D2 3A CD 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 97D5 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 97D6 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 97D7 BB           	cp e
  11+ 97D8 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 97DA 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 97DC ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 97DE EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 97DF 3A CD 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 97E2 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 97E3 CD 3B 95     	call asm_div16
  18+ 97E6 F1           	pop af
  19+ 97E7 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 97E9 B5           	or l
  21+ 97EA C9           	ret
  22+ 97EB              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 97EB F1           	pop af
  24+ 97EC E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 97EE F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 97F0 C9           	ret
  27+ 97F1
  28+ 97F1
  29+ 97F1              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 97F1              squareregfx:
  31+ 97F1 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 97F4 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 97F5 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 97F6 ED 30        	mul
  35+ 97F8 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 97F9              squareregfy:
  37+ 97F9 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 97FC 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 97FD 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 97FE ED 30        	mul
  41+ 9800 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 9801              squareregfz:
  43+ 9801 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 9804 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 9805 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 9806 ED 30        	mul
  47+ 9808 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 9809 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 980A              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 980A CD B2 91     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 980D E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 980E E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 980F E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9810              normfx:
  55+ 9810 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 9813 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 9814 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 9815 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 9816 CD CE 97     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 9819 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 981C              normfy:
  62+ 981C 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 981F E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9820 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9821 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9822 CD CE 97     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 9825 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 9828              normfz:
  69+ 9828 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 982B E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 982C 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 982D 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 982E CD CE 97     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9831 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9834              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9834 C9           	ret
  77+ 9835
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 649  9835                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9835              ; Input:
   2+ 9835              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9835              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9835              ; Output:
   5+ 9835              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9835              ;
   7+ 9835              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9835              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9835              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9835              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9835              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9835              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9835              ;
  14+ 9835
  15+ 9835
  16+ 9835 E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 9836 A7                               and     a
  18+ 9837 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 9839 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 983B E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 983C C9                               ret
  22+ 983D
  23+ 983D E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 983E A7                               and     a
  25+ 983F 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 9841 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 9843 E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 9844 C9                               ret
  29+ 9845
  30+ 9845
  31+ 9845              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 9845              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 9845 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 9846 AA                               xor d
  35+ 9847 FA 51 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 984A ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 984C 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 984E 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 984F                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 984F 37          >                        scf
  40+ 9850 C9                               ret
  41+ 9851 CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 9853 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 9855              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 9855 B7          >                        or a
  44+ 9856 C9                               ret
  45+ 9857 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 9858                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 9858 B7          >                        or a
  47+ 9859 C9                               ret
  48+ 985A              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 985A 37          >                        scf
  49+ 985B C9                               ret
  50+ 985C
  51+ 985C              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 985C 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 985D BA                               cp  d
  54+ 985E C0                               ret nz
  55+ 985F 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 9860 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 9861 C9                               ret
  58+ 9862
  59+ 9862
  60+ 9862
  61+ 9862 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 9863 A8                               xor b
  63+ 9864 FA 6D 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 9867 ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 9869 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 986B              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 986B 37          >                        scf
  67+ 986C C9                               ret
  68+ 986D CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 986F 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 9871              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 9871 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9872 C9                               ret
  72+ 9873
  73+ 9873              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 9873 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 9874 A7                               and     a
  76+ 9875 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 9877 E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 9878 C9                               ret
  79+ 9879              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 9879 E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 987A A7                               and     a
  82+ 987B ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 987D E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 987E C9                               ret
  85+ 987F
  86+ 987F              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 987F              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 987F
  89+ 987F E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 9881 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 9882 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 9884 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 9885 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 9886 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 9888 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 9889 A7                               and     a
  97+ 988A ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 988C D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 988E C9                               ret
 100+ 988F
 101+ 988F
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 650  988F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 988F              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 988F
   3+ 988F
   4+ 988F DD 7E 00     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+0)	        ; XX15+0
   5+ 9892 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   6+ 9894              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   6+ 9894 5F          >			ld	e,a
   6+ 9895 57          >			ld  d,a
   6+ 9896 ED 30       >			mul
   7+ 9898 62 6B                                ld		hl,de		 		; h == varR d = varO e= varA
   8+ 989A DD 7E 01     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(ix+1)
   9+ 989D E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; = abs
  10+ 989F                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  10+ 989F 5F          >			ld	e,a
  10+ 98A0 57          >			ld  d,a
  10+ 98A1 ED 30       >			mul
  11+ 98A3 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  12+ 98A4 DD 7E 02     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(ix+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  13+ 98A7 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  14+ 98A9                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  14+ 98A9 5F          >			ld	e,a
  14+ 98AA 57          >			ld  d,a
  14+ 98AB ED 30       >			mul
  15+ 98AD 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  16+ 98AE EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  17+ 98AF CD B2 91     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  18+ 98B2 DD 7E 00     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+0)
  19+ 98B5 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  20+ 98B6 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  21+ 98B8 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  22+ 98B9 CD AC 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  23+ 98BC 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  24+ 98BD 79                                   ld      a,c
  25+ 98BE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  26+ 98C0 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  27+ 98C1 DD 77 00                             ld		(ix+0),a
  28+ 98C4 DD 7E 01     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  29+ 98C7 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  30+ 98C8 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  31+ 98CA 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  32+ 98CB CD AC 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  33+ 98CE 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  34+ 98CF 79                                   ld      a,c
  35+ 98D0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  36+ 98D2 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  37+ 98D3 DD 77 01                             ld		(ix+1),a
  38+ 98D6 DD 7E 02     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+2)
  39+ 98D9 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  40+ 98DA E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  41+ 98DC 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  42+ 98DD CD AC 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  43+ 98E0 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  44+ 98E1 79                                   ld      a,c
  45+ 98E2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  46+ 98E4 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  47+ 98E5 DD 77 02                             ld		(ix+2),a
  48+ 98E8 C9                                   ret
  49+ 98E9
  50+ 98E9              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  51+ 98E9 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  52+ 98EC DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  53+ 98EE E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  54+ 98F0              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  54+ 98F0 5F          >			ld	e,a
  54+ 98F1 57          >			ld  d,a
  54+ 98F2 ED 30       >			mul
  55+ 98F4 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  56+ 98F5 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  57+ 98F6 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  58+ 98F9 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  59+ 98FB E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  60+ 98FD                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  60+ 98FD 5F          >			ld	e,a
  60+ 98FE 57          >			ld  d,a
  60+ 98FF ED 30       >			mul
  61+ 9901 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  62+ 9902 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  63+ 9905 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  64+ 9907 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  65+ 9909                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  65+ 9909 5F          >			ld	e,a
  65+ 990A 57          >			ld  d,a
  65+ 990B ED 30       >			mul
  66+ 990D 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  67+ 990E EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  68+ 990F CD B2 91     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  69+ 9912 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9915 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  71+ 9917 4F                                   ld		c,a
  72+ 9918 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  73+ 9919 CD AC 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  74+ 991C 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  75+ 991D DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  76+ 991F E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  77+ 9921 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  78+ 9922 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  79+ 9925 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  80+ 9928 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  81+ 992A 4F                                   ld		c,a
  82+ 992B 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  83+ 992C CD AC 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  84+ 992F 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  85+ 9930 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  86+ 9932 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  87+ 9934 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  88+ 9935 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  89+ 9938 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  90+ 993B E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  91+ 993D 4F                                   ld		c,a
  92+ 993E 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  93+ 993F CD AC 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  94+ 9942 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  95+ 9943 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  96+ 9945 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  97+ 9947 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  98+ 9948 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  99+ 994B C9                                   ret
 100+ 994C
 101+ 994C              ; Normalise vector
 102+ 994C              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
 103+ 994C              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
 104+ 994C              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
 105+ 994C              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
 106+ 994C
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 651  994C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 994C              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 994C              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 994C              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 994C              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 994C              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 994C              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 994C              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 994C 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 994F CD 65 99     	call	Num1
  10+ 9952 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 9955 CD 65 99     	call	Num1
  12+ 9958 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 995B CD 65 99     	call	Num1
  14+ 995E 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9960 CD 65 99     	call	Num1
  16+ 9963 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9965              Num1:
  18+ 9965 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9967              .Num2:
  20+ 9967 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9968 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9969 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 996B ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 996D 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 996E 13           	inc	de
  26+ 996F C9           	ret
  27+ 9970
  28+ 9970              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9970 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 9972 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9973 C3 4C 99     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9976
  33+ 9976              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9976 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9978 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9979 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 997C CD 8C 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 997F 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9981 CD 65 99     	call	Num1
  40+ 9984 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9986                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 9986 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 9987 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 9988 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 998A 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 998C              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 998C 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 998E              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 998E 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 998F 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 9990 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 9992 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 9994 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 9996              .Blank:
  55+ 9996 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 9998              .DontBlank:
  57+ 9998 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 999A 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 999B 13           	inc	de
  60+ 999C C9           	ret
  61+ 999D
  62+ 999D              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 999D FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 999F 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 99A1 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 99A3 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 99A4 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 99A7 CD B3 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 99AA 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 99AC CD B3 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 99AF 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 99B1 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 99B3              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 99B3 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 99B5              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 99B5 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 99B6 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 99B7 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 99B9 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 99BB 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 99BD              .Blank:
  82+ 99BD 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 99BF              .DontBlank:
  84+ 99BF ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 99C1 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 99C2 13           	inc	de
  87+ 99C3 C9           	ret
  88+ 99C4              .NoStock:
  89+ 99C4 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 99C6 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 99C7 13           	inc	de
  92+ 99C8 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 99C9 13           	inc	de
  94+ 99CA 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 99CC 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 99CD 13           	inc de
  97+ 99CE C9           	ret
  98+ 99CF
  99+ 99CF
 100+ 99CF              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 99CF              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 99CF              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 99CF              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 104+ 99CF 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 104+ 99D3 0A 00 00 00
 104+ 99D7 64 00 00 00
 104+ 99DB E8 03 00 00
 104+ 99DF 10 27 00 00

 105+ 99E7 40 42 0F 00
 105+ 99EB 80 96 98 00
 105+ 99EF 00 E1 F5 05
 105+ 99F3 00 CA 9A 3B
 106+ 99F7 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4

 108+ 99FB              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 109+ 99FB CD 0A 9A     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 110+ 99FE FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 111+ 9A01 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a

 114+ 9A09 C9                                   ret

 126+ 9A26 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 127+ 9A28 22 F7 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 128+ 9A2B DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 129+ 9A2E DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 130+ 9A31 2A F9 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 131+ 9A34 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 132+ 9A36 22 F9 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl

 134+ 9A3B 0C                                   inc c
 135+ 9A3C 3C                                   inc a
 136+ 9A3D 18 DE                                jr .clcn322

 139+ 9A45 2A F7 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
