 141+ 9A49 22 F7 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 142+ 9A4C DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 143+ 9A4F DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 9A52 2A F9 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 145+ 9A55 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 146+ 9A57 22 F9 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 147+ 9A5A 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 148+ 9A5D DD 19                                add ix,de
 149+ 9A5F 0C                                   inc c
 150+ 9A60 0D                                   dec c
 151+ 9A61 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 152+ 9A63 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 153+ 9A66 FD 23                                inc iy
 154+ 9A68 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 155+ 9A6A 3A F7 99                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 156+ 9A6D C6 30                                add A,'0'
 157+ 9A6F FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 158+ 9A72 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 159+ 9A76 C9                                   ret
 160+ 9A77
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 652  9A77                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 9A77              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9A77 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9A78 D2 93 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9A7B 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9A7D CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9A7F                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9A7F BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9A80 DA 96 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9A83 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9A84 37                                   scf
   7+ 9A85 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9A87 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9A89 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9A8A CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9A8C CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9A8E 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9A8F CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9A91 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9A92 C9                                   ret
  16+ 9A93 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9A95 C9                                   ret
  18+ 9A96 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9A97 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9A99 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9A9B C3 89 9A                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9A9E
  23+ 9A9E
  24+ 9A9E              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9A9E              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9A9E              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9A9E CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9AA0 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9AA2 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9AA4 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 9AA6              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9AA6              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9AA6              TIS2:
  34+ 9AA6 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9AA7 3A CD 7E     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9AAA 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9AAB 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9AAC              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9AAC 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9AAD 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9AAE CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9AB0 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9AB2              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 9AB2 B7               or          a
  45+ 9AB3 CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 9AB5
  47+ 9AB5 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 9AB6 E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9AB8 CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9ABA 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9ABB 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9ABC E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9ABE B0               or          b
  54+ 9ABF C3 C3 9A         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 9AC2              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 9AC2 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 9AC3              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 9AC3 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 9AC4 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 9AC6              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 9AC6 BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9AC7 D2 E7 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9ACA 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9ACC              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9ACC CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9ACE              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9ACE BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9ACF DA ED 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 9AD2 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 9AD3 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 9AD4 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 9AD6 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9AD8              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9AD8 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9AD9 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9ADB CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9ADD 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9ADE CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9AE0 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 9AE1 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 9AE2 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 9AE3 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 9AE5 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 9AE6 C9           	ret
  81+ 9AE7              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9AE7              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9AE7 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9AE8 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9AEA F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9AEC C9           	ret
  87+ 9AED              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9AED              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9AED B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9AEE CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9AF0 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 9AF2 C3 D8 9A     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 9AF5
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 653  9AF5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 9AF5              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9AF5              fmltu:
   3+ 9AF5 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9AF6 3A CD 7E                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9AF9 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9AFA ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9AFC 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9AFD C9                                   ret
   9+ 9AFE
  10+ 9AFE 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9AFF ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9B01 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9B02 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9B03

 654  9B03                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9B03              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9B03              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9B03 21 79 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9B06 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9B08 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9B0A 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9B0B C3 17 9B     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9B0E              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9B0E 21 79 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9B11 3A B7 7D     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9B14 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9B16 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9B17              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9B17 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9B18 3A C7 7E     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9B1B              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9B1B 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9B1D CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9B1F 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9B20 AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9B21              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9B21 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9B23 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9B25 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9B26 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9B28              DV8:
  27+ 9B28 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9B29 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9B2A              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9B2A CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9B2C 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9B2E              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9B2E              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9B2E 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9B30 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9B31              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9B31 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9B33 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9B35 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9B36 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9B38              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9B38 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9B39              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9B39 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9B3B 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9B3D 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9B3E 32 CE 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9B41 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9B42 32 CD 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9B45 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9B46              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9B46 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9B47 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9B48 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9B4A 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9B4C 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9B4D 32 CE 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9B50 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9B51 32 CD 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9B54 C9           		ret
  61+ 9B55              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9B55 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9B57 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9B58 32 CE 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9B5B 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9B5C 32 CD 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9B5F C9           		ret
  68+ 9B60
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 655  9B60              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm" Moved to general multiply code
 656  9B60
 657  9B60                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9B60              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9B60              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9B60              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9B60 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9B62 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9B64 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9B65 3A CD 7E     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9B68 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9B69 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9B6B 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9B6D AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9B6E E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9B70 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9B71 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9B72 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9B74 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9B75 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9B76 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9B78 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9B79 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9B7B 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9B7C 32 CD 7D     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9B7F 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9B80 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9B81 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9B82 C9           	ret
  27+ 9B83              .mul0:
  28+ 9B83 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9B84 32 CD 7D     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9B87 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9B88 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9B89 C9           	ret
  33+ 9B8A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 658  9B8A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9B8A              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9B8A              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9B8A              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9B8A              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9B8A              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9B8A              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9B8A              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9B8A              LL38:
   9+ 9B8A              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9B8A              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9B8A              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9B8A              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9B8A              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9B8A              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9B8A              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9B8A              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9B8A              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9B8A              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9B8A              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9B8A              ;	ret
  21+ 9B8A              ; calculation table
  22+ 9B8A              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9B8A              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9B8A              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9B8A              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9B8A              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9B8A              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9B8A              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9B8A              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9B8A              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9B8A
  32+ 9B8A              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9B8A              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9B8A              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9B8A              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9B8A
  37+ 9B8A
  38+ 9B8A              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9B8A 21 CF 7E     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9B8D AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9B8E FA 99 9B     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9B91 3A CD 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9B94 21 CE 7E     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9B97 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9B98 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9B99              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9B99 3A CE 7E     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9B9C 21 CD 7E     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9B9F              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9B9F              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9B9F B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9BA0 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9BA1 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9BA3              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9BA3              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9BA3              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9BA3 C9           	ret
  57+ 9BA4              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9BA4 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9BA6 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9BA8 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9BAA 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9BAB 3A CF 7E     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9BAE EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9BB0 32 CF 7E     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9BB3 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9BB4                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9BB4 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9BB5 C9           	ret
  68+ 9BB6              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9BB6 32 CF 7E         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9BB9                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9BB9 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9BBA C9               ret
  72+ 9BBB              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9BBB              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9BBB              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9BBB              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9BBB              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9BBB              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9BBB              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9BBB              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9BBB              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9BBB              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9BBB              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9BBB              ;--	ret
  84+ 9BBB
  85+ 9BBB              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9BBB              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9BBB              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9BBB              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9BBB              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9BBB              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9BBB              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9BBB              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9BBB              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9BBB              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9BBB              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9BBB              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9BBB              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9BBB              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9BBB              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9BBB              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9BBB              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9BBB              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9BBB              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9BBB              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9BBB              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9BBB              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9BBB              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9BBB              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9BBB              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9BBB              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9BBB              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9BBB              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9BBB              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9BBB              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9BBB              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9BBB

 661  9BBB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 9BBB              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9BBB              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9BBB              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9BBB              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9BBB              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9BBB              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9BBB              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 9BBB              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 9BBB              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 9BBB              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 9BBB              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 9BBB              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 9BBB              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 9BBB              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9BBB              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9BBB              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9BBB              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9BBB              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 9BBB              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 9BBB              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 9BBB              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 9BBB              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 9BBB              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 9BBB              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 9BBB              ;;;	ret
  34+ 9BBB              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 9BBB              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 9BBB              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 9BBB              ;;;	ret
  39+ 9BBB
  40+ 9BBB              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9BBB 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9BBC 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9BBD 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9BBF              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9BBF 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9BC0 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9BC1 C8             ret z
  48+ 9BC2 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9BC5 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9BC7              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9BC7 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9BC9 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9BCA 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9BCC C9             ret
  55+ 9BCD
  56+ 9BCD              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9BCD              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9BCD              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9BCD              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9BCD 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9BCF AF                   xor a
  62+ 9BD0              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9BD0 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9BD1 17                   rla
  65+ 9BD2 B9                   cp c
  66+ 9BD3 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9BD5 91                   sub c
  68+ 9BD6 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9BD7              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9BD7 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9BD9 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9BDA 32 CE 7E             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9BDD C9                   ret
  74+ 9BDE
  75+ 9BDE
  76+ 9BDE
  77+ 9BDE              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9BDE              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9BDE              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9BDE F5           		push	af
  81+ 9BDF 3A CD 7E     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9BE2 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9BE3 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9BE4 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9BE6 CA FD 9B     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9BE9              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9BE9 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9BEB 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9BEC              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9BEC 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9BEE AF           		xor a
  92+ 9BEF              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9BEF 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9BF0 17           		rla
  95+ 9BF1 B9           		cp c
  96+ 9BF2 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9BF4 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9BF5 91           		sub c
  99+ 9BF6              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9BF6 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9BF8 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9BF9 32 CE 7E     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9BFC C9           		ret
 104+ 9BFD              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9BFD 32 CE 7E     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9C00 C9           		ret
 107+ 9C01              ;	push	af
 108+ 9C01              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9C01              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9C01              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9C01              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9C01              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9C01              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9C01              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9C01              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9C01              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9C01              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9C01              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9C01              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9C01              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9C01              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9C01              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9C01              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9C01              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9C01              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9C01              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9C01              ;	scf
 128+ 9C01              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9C01              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9C01              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9C01              ;LL2:
 132+ 9C01              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9C01              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9C01              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9C01              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9C01              ;	ret
 137+ 9C01
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 662  9C01                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9C01              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9C01              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9C01              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9C01 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9C02 3A CD 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9C05 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9C07 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9C09 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9C0A 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9C0C AF               xor a
  11+ 9C0D              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9C0D CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9C0F 17               rla
  14+ 9C10 BA               cp d
  15+ 9C11 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9C13 0C               inc c
  17+ 9C14 92               sub d
  18+ 9C15              LL64:
  19+ 9C15 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9C17 32 CC 7E     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9C1A 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9C1B 32 CE 7E     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9C1E C9               ret
  24+ 9C1F              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9C1F 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9C21 32 CE 7E     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9C24 32 CC 7E     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9C27 C9           	ret
  29+ 9C28
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   1+ 9C28              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9C28              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9C28              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9C28 CD 60 9B     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9C2B 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9C2C 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9C2D 32 CF 7E     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9C30 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9C31 32 CE 7E     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9C34 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9C35 C9           	ret

 667  9CC6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
   1+ 9CC6              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ 9CC6              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10
   3+ 9CC6              ;rotmat0yLo: DB	0				; INWK +11
   4+ 9CC6              ;rotmat0yHi: DB	0				; INWK +12
   5+ 9CC6              ;rotmat0zLo:	DB 	0				; INWK +13

  27+ 9CC6              ;inwkarray			equ		INWK+10
  28+ 9CC6
  29+ 9CC6
  30+ 9CC6
  31+ 9CC6
  32+ 9CC6              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ 9CC6
  34+ 9CC6              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ 9CC6              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ 9CC6              ; TESTED OK
  37+ 9CC6
  38+ 9CC6
  39+ 9CC6 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ 9CC9 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ 9CCC E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ 9CCE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ 9CD0 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ 9CD1 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9CD2 ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9CD4 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ 9CD6 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ 9CD7 E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9CD9 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ 9CDB 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ 9CDC 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ 9CDD ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ 9CDF EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ 9CE0 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ 9CE1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ 9CE3 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ 9CE5 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ 9CE6 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ 9CE7 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ 9CE9 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ 9CEA 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ 9CEB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ 9CEC CD B2 91                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ 9CEF 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ 9CF0 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ 9CF2 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ 9CF4 CD AC 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ 9CF7 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ 9CF8 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9CFB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ 9CFD B2                                   or      d
  72+ 9CFE 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ 9D01 DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ 9D03 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ 9D04 CD AC 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ 9D07 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 9D08 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ 9D0B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 9D0D B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9D0E 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ 9D11 FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ 9D13 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ 9D14 CD AC 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ 9D17 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ 9D18 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ 9D1B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ 9D1D B2                                   or      d
  88+ 9D1E 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ 9D21 C9                                   ret
  90+ 9D22
  91+ 9D22              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ 9D22 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ 9D22 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ 9D22 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ 9D22                                      ENDM
  96+ 9D22              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
  97+ 9D22 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
  98+ 9D22 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  99+ 9D22 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ 9D22                                      ENDM
 101+ 9D22
 102+ 9D22
 103+ 9D22              TidyUbnK:               ;break
 104+ 9D22                                      TidyNormaliseNoseV
 104+ 9D22 CD 36 9C    >                        call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 104+ 9D25 CD C6 9C    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 104+ 9D28 CD 6F 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 105+ 9D2B 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 106+ 9D2E E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 107+ 9D30 C2 C8 9D                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 108+ 9D33 3A 38 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 109+ 9D36 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 110+ 9D38 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 111+ 9D3A              ;...roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 112+ 9D3A 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 113+ 9D3D 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 114+ 9D40 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 115+ 9D43 CD 28 9C                             call	RSequQmulA
 116+ 9D46 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 117+ 9D49 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 118+ 9D4C 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 119+ 9D4F CD 27 90                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 120+ 9D52 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 121+ 9D53 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122+ 9D55 57                                   ld      d,a
 123+ 9D56 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 124+ 9D59 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 125+ 9D5C 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 126+ 9D5D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 127+ 9D5F B3                                   or      e
 128+ 9D60 FE 00                                cp      0
 129+ 9D62 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 130+ 9D64                                      ZeroA
 130+ 9D64 AF          >                        xor a
 131+ 9D65 C3 C2 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 132+ 9D68 FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 133+ 9D6A 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 134+ 9D6C 3E 60        .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 135+ 9D6E B2                                   or      d
 136+ 9D6F C3 C2 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 137+ 9D72 7B           .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 138+ 9D73 32 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 139+ 9D76 7A                                   ld      a,d
 140+ 9D77 CD B4 93                             call    DVIDT
 141+ 9D7A 78                                   ld      a,b
 142+ 9D7B 32 32 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 143+ 9D7E C3 0C 9E                             jp      .DoneRoof
 144+ 9D81              ;...roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 145+ 9D81 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 146+ 9D84 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 147+ 9D87 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 148+ 9D8A CD 28 9C                             call	RSequQmulA
 149+ 9D8D 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 150+ 9D90 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 151+ 9D93 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 152+ 9D96 CD 27 90                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 153+ 9D99 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 154+ 9D9A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 155+ 9D9C 57                                   ld      d,a
 156+ 9D9D 3A 3A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 157+ 9DA0 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 158+ 9DA3 7A           .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 159+ 9DA4 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 160+ 9DA6 B3                                   or      e
 161+ 9DA7 FE 00                                cp      0
 162+ 9DA9 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 163+ 9DAB                                      ZeroA
 163+ 9DAB AF          >                        xor a
 164+ 9DAC C3 C2 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 165+ 9DAF FE 00        .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 166+ 9DB1 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 167+ 9DB3 3E 60        .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 168+ 9DB5 B2                                   or      d
 169+ 9DB6 C3 C2 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 170+ 9DB9 7B           .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 171+ 9DBA 32 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 172+ 9DBD 7A                                   ld      a,d
 173+ 9DBE CD B4 93                             call    DVIDT
 174+ 9DC1 78                                   ld      a,b
 175+ 9DC2 32 34 C0     .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 176+ 9DC5 C3 0C 9E                             jp      .DoneRoof
 177+ 9DC8              ;...roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 178+ 9DC8 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 179+ 9DCB 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 180+ 9DCE 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; A = roofv Y
 181+ 9DD1 CD 28 9C                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; RS = NoseY & RoofY
 182+ 9DD4 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 183+ 9DD7 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 184+ 9DDA 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 185+ 9DDD CD 27 90                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 186+ 9DE0 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 187+ 9DE1 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 188+ 9DE3 57                                   ld      d,a
 189+ 9DE4 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 190+ 9DE7 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 191+ 9DEA 7A           .XTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 192+ 9DEB E6 7F                                and     $7F
 193+ 9DED B3                                   or      e
 194+ 9DEE FE 00                                cp      0
 195+ 9DF0 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 196+ 9DF2                                      ZeroA
 196+ 9DF2 AF          >                        xor a
 197+ 9DF3 C3 C2 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 198+ 9DF6 FE 00        .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 199+ 9DF8 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 200+ 9DFA 3E 60        .XDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 201+ 9DFC B2                                   or      d
 202+ 9DFD C3 09 9E                             jp      .SetRoofX
 203+ 9E00 7B           .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 204+ 9E01 32 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 205+ 9E04 7A                                   ld      a,d
 206+ 9E05 CD B4 93                             call    DVIDT
 207+ 9E08 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ 9E09 32 30 C0     .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 209+ 9E0C              .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 209+ 9E0C CD 49 9C    >                        call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 209+ 9E0F CD C6 9C    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 209+ 9E12 CD 8C 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ 9E15              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ 9E15 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 212+ 9E18 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ 9E1A 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 214+ 9E1D 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 215+ 9E20 CD 28 9C                             call	RSequQmulA
 216+ 9E23 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 217+ 9E26 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 218+ 9E29 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 219+ 9E2C CD 27 90                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 220+ 9E2F CD FC 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 221+ 9E32 78                                   ld      a,b
 222+ 9E33 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 223+ 9E36              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ 9E36 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 225+ 9E39 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 226+ 9E3B 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 227+ 9E3E 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 228+ 9E41 CD 28 9C                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 229+ 9E44 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 230+ 9E47 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 231+ 9E4A 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 232+ 9E4D CD 27 90                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 233+ 9E50 CD FC 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 234+ 9E53 78                                   ld      a,b
 235+ 9E54 32 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 236+ 9E57              ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 237+ 9E57 3A 38 C0     .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 238+ 9E5A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 239+ 9E5C 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 240+ 9E5F 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 241+ 9E62 CD 28 9C                             call	RSequQmulA
 242+ 9E65 3A 36 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)		; nosev z
 243+ 9E68 32 CD 7E                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 244+ 9E6B 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 245+ 9E6E CD 27 90                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 246+ 9E71 CD FC 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 247+ 9E74 78                                   ld      a,b
 248+ 9E75 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 249+ 9E78                                      ZeroA
 249+ 9E78 AF          >                        xor a
 250+ 9E79 32 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
 251+ 9E7C 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a
 252+ 9E7F 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a
 253+ 9E82 C9                                   ret
 254+ 9E83
 255+ 9E83
 256+ 9E83              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ 9E83              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ 9E83              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ 9E83 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ 9E84 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ 9E85 32 CD 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ 9E88 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ 9E89 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ 9E8B CD 05 90     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ 9E8E              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ 9E8E              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ 9E8E              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ 9E8E 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ 9E8F E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ 9E91 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ 9E92 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ 9E93 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ 9E95 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ 9E97              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ 9E97 CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ 9E99              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ 9E99 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ 9E9B DA A8 9E    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ 9E9E DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ 9EA0 37           		scf
 279+ 9EA1 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ 9EA3 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ 9EA5              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ 9EA5 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ 9EA6 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ 9EA7 C9           		ret
 285+ 9EA8              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ 9EA8 B7           	or			a
 287+ 9EA9 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ 9EAB 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ 9EAD C3 A5 9E     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ 9EB0
 291+ 9EB0              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ 9EB0              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
 293+ 9EB0

 303+ 9EB9              TidyRotXSmall:

 306+ 9EBB 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
 307+ 9EBE E6 60        		and		%01100000
 308+ 9EC0 CA B0 9E     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
 309+ 9EC3 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 310+ 9EC6 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 311+ 9EC7 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 312+ 9ECA CD 9F 9F     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z

 329+ 9EE4              .RotXIsBig:

 358+ 9F28 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags

 370+ 9F44 CD 83 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 371+ 9F47                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 371+ 9F47 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 371+ 9F48 CA 4D 9F    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 372+ 9F4B EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 373+ 9F4D              NormSideZNoNeg:
 374+ 9F4D 32 2C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 375+ 9F50              .ClearLoBytes:
 376+ 9F50 21 35 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 377+ 9F53 06 09        		ld		b,9
 378+ 9F55 AF                   xor     a
 379+ 9F56              .ClearLoLoop:
 380+ 9F56 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 381+ 9F57 23           		inc		hl
 382+ 9F58 23           		inc		hl
 383+ 9F59 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 384+ 9F5B CD 5C 9C     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ 9F5E CD E9 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 386+ 9F61              ;calc sidev x
 387+ 9F61 CD A9 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 388+ 9F64
 389+ 9F64 C9           		ret
 390+ 9F65
 391+ 9F65
 392+ 9F65              CalcRoofvX:
 393+ 9F65              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 394+ 9F65              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 394+ 9F65 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 394+ 9F68 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 395+ 9F6B 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 396+ 9F6E CD 28 9C     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 397+ 9F71              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 397+ 9F71 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 397+ 9F74 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 398+ 9F77 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 399+ 9F7A CD 05 90     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 400+ 9F7D 7A           		ld		a,d
 401+ 9F7E E6 80        		and 	$80
 402+ 9F80 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 403+ 9F82              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 404+ 9F82 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 405+ 9F85 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 406+ 9F86 E6 80        		and		$80
 407+ 9F88 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 408+ 9F8A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 409+ 9F8C 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 410+ 9F8D E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 411+ 9F8F 42           		ld		b,d
 412+ 9F90 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 413+ 9F91 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 414+ 9F92 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 415+ 9F94 CD 89 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 416+ 9F97 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 417+ 9F99 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 418+ 9F9B E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 419+ 9F9D B0           		or		b
 420+ 9F9E C9           		ret
 421+ 9F9F
 422+ 9F9F
 423+ 9F9F              CalcRoofvY:
 424+ 9F9F              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 425+ 9F9F              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 425+ 9F9F 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 425+ 9FA2 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 426+ 9FA5 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 427+ 9FA8 CD 28 9C     		call	RSequQmulA
 428+ 9FAB              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 428+ 9FAB 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 428+ 9FAE 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 429+ 9FB1 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 430+ 9FB4 CD 05 90     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 431+ 9FB7 7A           		ld		a,d
 432+ 9FB8 E6 80        		and 	$80
 433+ 9FBA FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 434+ 9FBC 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 435+ 9FBF 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 436+ 9FC0 E6 80        		and		$80
 437+ 9FC2 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 438+ 9FC4 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 439+ 9FC6 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 440+ 9FC7 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 441+ 9FC9 42           		ld		b,d
 442+ 9FCA 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 443+ 9FCB 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 444+ 9FCC 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 445+ 9FCE CD 89 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 446+ 9FD1 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 447+ 9FD3 EE 80        		xor		$80
 448+ 9FD5 E6 80        		and		$80
 449+ 9FD7 B0           		or		b
 450+ 9FD8 C9           		ret
 451+ 9FD9
 452+ 9FD9              CalcRoofvZ:
 453+ 9FD9              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 454+ 9FD9              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 454+ 9FD9 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 454+ 9FDC 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 455+ 9FDF 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 456+ 9FE2 CD 28 9C     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 457+ 9FE5              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 457+ 9FE5 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 457+ 9FE8 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 458+ 9FEB 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 459+ 9FEE CD 05 90     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 460+ 9FF1 7A           		ld		a,d
 461+ 9FF2 E6 80        		and 	$80
 462+ 9FF4 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 463+ 9FF6 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 464+ 9FF9 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 465+ 9FFA E6 80        		and		$80
 466+ 9FFC FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 467+ 9FFE FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 468+ A000 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 469+ A001 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 470+ A003 42           		ld		b,d
 471+ A004 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 472+ A005 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 473+ A006 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 474+ A008 CD 89 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 475+ A00B FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 476+ A00D EE 80        		xor		$80
 477+ A00F E6 80        		and		$80
 478+ A011 B0           		or		b
 479+ A012 C9           		ret
 480+ A013
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 668  A013                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ A013
   2+ A013              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ A013 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A014 D2 32 A0    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ A017 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ A019 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ A01B 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ A01D                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ A01D BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ A01E DA 23 A0    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ A021 92                                   sub     d
   8+ A022                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ A022 B7          >                        or a
   9+ A023 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ A024 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ A026 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ A028 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ A029 C9                                   ret
  14+ A02A 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ A02B 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ A02C CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ A02E 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ A030 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ A031 C9                                   ret
  20+ A032 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ A034 C9                                   ret
  22+ A035
  23+ A035              ;-- Name: LL28 Calculate R = 256 * A / Q
  24+ A035              ;-- LL28+4              Skips the A >= Q check and always returns with C flag cleared, so this can be called if we know the division will work
  25+ A035              ;-- LL31                Skips the A >= Q check and does not set the R counter, so this can be used for jumping straight into the division loop if R is already set to 254 and we know the division will work
  26+ A035              ;   Reg mapping 6502  Z80
  27+ A035              ;               a     a
  28+ A035              ;               b     x
  29+ A035              ;               c     q
  30+ A035              ;               d     r
  31+ A035              ;
  32+ A035 21 B2 F1     LL28Amul256DivD_6502:   ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  33+ A038 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  34+ A039 B9                                   cp      c
  35+ A03A                                      FlipCarryFlag
  35+ A03A 3F          >                        ccf
  36+ A03B DA 63 A0                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  37+ A03E 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  38+ A040 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  39+ A042 DA 57 A0                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  40+ A045                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  40+ A045 3F          >                        ccf
  41+ A046                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  41+ A046 B9          >                        cp      c
  41+ A047 DA 4C A0    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  42+ A04A                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  43+ A04A 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  44+ A04B                                      ClearCarryFlag
  44+ A04B B7          >                        or a
  45+ A04C              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  45+ A04C 3F          >                        ccf
  46+ A04D CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  47+ A04F DA 40 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  48+ A052 78                                   ld      a,b
  49+ A053 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a
  50+ A056 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  51+ A057 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  52+ A058                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  52+ A058 37          >                        scf
  53+ A059 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  54+ A05B DA 40 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  55+ A05E 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  56+ A05F 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  57+ A062 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  58+ A063 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  59+ A065 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  60+ A068                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  60+ A068 37          >                        scf
  61+ A069 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  62+ A06A
  63+ A06A
  64+ A06A 21 CD 7E     LL28Amul256DivQ_6502:   ld      hl,varQ                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  65+ A06D 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  66+ A06E B9                                   cp      c
  67+ A06F                                      FlipCarryFlag
  67+ A06F 3F          >                        ccf
  68+ A070 DA 98 A0                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  69+ A073 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  70+ A075 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  71+ A077 DA 8C A0                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  72+ A07A                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  72+ A07A 3F          >                        ccf
  73+ A07B                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  73+ A07B B9          >                        cp      c
  73+ A07C DA 81 A0    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  74+ A07F                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  75+ A07F 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  76+ A080                                      ClearCarryFlag
  76+ A080 B7          >                        or a
  77+ A081              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  77+ A081 3F          >                        ccf
  78+ A082 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  79+ A084 DA 75 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  80+ A087 78                                   ld      a,b
  81+ A088 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  82+ A08B C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  83+ A08C 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  84+ A08D                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  84+ A08D 37          >                        scf
  85+ A08E CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  86+ A090 DA 75 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  87+ A093 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  88+ A094 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; .
  89+ A097 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  90+ A098 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  91+ A09A 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  92+ A09D                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  92+ A09D 37          >                        scf
  93+ A09E C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  94+ A09F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 669  A09F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ A09F              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ A09F              TIS1:
   3+ A09F 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ A0A0 3A B6 7D     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ A0A3 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ A0A4 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ A0A5              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ A0A5 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ A0A6 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ A0A7 32 CD 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ A0AA 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ A0AB EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ A0AD CD 05 90     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ A0B0              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ A0B0              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ A0B0              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ A0B0 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ A0B1 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ A0B3 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ A0B4 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ A0B5 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ A0B7 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ A0B9 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ A0BA              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ A0BA CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ A0BC FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ A0BE 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ A0C0 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ A0C2              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ A0C2 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ A0C4 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ A0C6 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ A0C7 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ A0C8 C9           		ret
  35+ A0C9
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

  31+ A0DB 00 A1

  37+ A0DD              ; Main entry point to tactics. Every time it will do a a tidy and the do AI logic
  38+ A0DD              UpdateShip:             ;  call    DEBUGSETNODES ;       call    DEBUGSETPOS
  39+ A0DD 21 94 68                            ld      hl,TidyCounter
  40+ A0E0 35                                  dec     (hl)
  41+ A0E1                                     DISPLAY "TODO: SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE"
  42+ A0E1 CC 22 9D                            call     z,TidyUbnK  ;TODO SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE"
  43+ A0E4                                     ; This shoudl be a call nz to tidy *****ret     nz
  44+ A0E4 3E 10                               ld      a,16
  45+ A0E6 32 94 68                            ld      (TidyCounter),a
  46+ A0E9                                     ;call    TidyUbnK

  48+ A0E9 3A 0D C4                            ld       a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  49+ A0EC                                                 DISPLAY "TODO: capture duff jumps"
  50+ A0EC                                     ReturnIfAGTEusng ShipAiJumpTableMax              ; TODO capture duff jumps whilst debugging in case a new shjip type code is added
  50+ A0EC FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax
  50+ A0EE D0          >                        ret	 nc
  51+ A0EF 21 C9 A0                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  52+ A0F2 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  53+ A0F4 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  54+ A0F6 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  55+ A0F7 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  56+ A0F8 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  57+ A0F9 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;
  58+ A0FA E9                                  jp       hl                                      ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  59+ A0FB C9                                  ret                                              ; not needed as jp handles this
  60+ A0FC
  61+ A0FC
  62+ A0FC
  63+ A0FC              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
  64+ A0FC

  71+ A101              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ A101              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  73+ A101 ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  74+ A101                                      ENDIF
  75+ A101 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  76+ A104 47                                   ld      b,a
  77+ A105 E6 02                                and     %00000010
  78+ A107 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  79+ A109 78                                   ld      a,b
  80+ A10A E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  81+ A10C 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  82+ A10F B6                                   or      (hl)
  83+ A110 47                                   ld      b,a
  84+ A111 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  85+ A114 E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  86+ A116 B0                                   or      b
  87+ A117 47                                   ld      b,a
  88+ A118 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  89+ A11B                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  89+ A11B FE 40       >                        cp      64
  89+ A11D DA 24 A1    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  90+ A120 78                                   ld      a,b
  91+ A121 F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  92+ A123 47                                   ld      b,a
  93+ A124 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  94+ A125 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  95+ A128 C9                                   ret
  96+ A129 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  97+ A12B 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  98+ A12E C9                                   ret
  99+ A12F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 100+ A12F              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
 101+ A12F 3A 0E C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 102+ A132                                      ;break
 103+ A132                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 103+ A132 3A 0D C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 103+ A135 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 103+ A137 CA 56 A1    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile
 104+ A13A E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
