 106+ A13F 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
 107+ A142                                      ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr         ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
 107+ A142 CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
 107+ A144 C8          >                        ret		z
 108+ A145 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 109+ A146                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 109+ A146 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 109+ A148 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a

 111+ A14D 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .

 113+ A153 E6 80       >                        and     ShipCanAnger

   1++A2D7                                      DEFINE MISSILEDEBUG 1
   2++A2D7                                      DEFINE MISSILEDOHIT 1
   3++A2D7
   4++A2D7              MISSILEMAXACCEL         equ 3
   5++A2D7              MISSILEMAXDECEL         equ -3
   6++A2D7                                      ;DEFINE MISSILEBREAK
   7++A2D7              ;.. Thsi version uses new kind logic
   8++A2D7              ;... Now the tactics if current ship is the missile, when we enter this SelectedUniverseSlot holds slot of missile
   9++A2D7              MissileAIV3:            ;ld      a,(ShipAIEnabled)
  10++A2D7                                      ;ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr
  11++A2D7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
  12++A2D7                                          JumpIfMemTrue UBnKMissleHitToProcess, .ProcessMissileHit
  12++A2D7 3A 44 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKMissleHitToProcess)
  12++A2DA A7          >                        and     a
  12++A2DB CA 3D A4    >                        jp      z, .ProcessMissileHit
  13++A2DE                                      ENDIF
  14++A2DE              .CheckForECM:           JumpIfMemNotZero ECMCountDown,.ECMIsActive  ; If ECM is running then kill the missile
  14++A2DE 3A E2 7D    >                        ld  a,(ECMCountDown)
  14++A2E1 A7          >                        and a
  14++A2E2 C2 46 A4    >                        jp  nz,.ECMIsActive
  15++A2E5              .IsMissileHostile:      IsShipHostile                               ; is missle attacking us?
  15++A2E5 3A 0E C4    >                        ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  15++A2E8 E6 04       >                        and     ShipIsHostile
  16++A2EA                                      JumpIfZero .MissileTargetingShip            ; Missile is friendly then z is set else targetting us
  16++A2EA CA 10 A3    >                        jp	z,.MissileTargetingShip
  17++A2ED 2A 20 C0     .MissileTargetingPlayer:ld      hl, (UBnKxlo)                       ; check if missile in range of us
  18++A2F0 3A 3D C0                             ld      a,(UBnKMissileDetonateRange)
  19++A2F3 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; c holds detonation range
  20++A2F4 CD 0C A2                             call    MissileHitUsCheckPos
  21++A2F7 D2 00 A3     .MissileNotHitUsYet:    jp      nc, .UpdateTargetingUsPos
  22++A2FA CD 5B A1     .MissleHitUs:           call    PlayerHitByMissile
  23++A2FD C3 46 A4                             jp      .ECMIsActive                        ; we use ECM logic to destroy missile which eqneues is
  24++A300 CD 19 A9     .UpdateTargetingUsPos:  call    SetPlayerAsTarget
  25++A303 CD F4 A8                             call    CopyPosToVector
  26++A306 3A 92 80                             ld      a,(SelectedUniverseSlot)            ; we will use this quite a lot with next bank switching
  27++A309 C6 46                                add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  28++A30B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  29++A30D C3 1B A4                             jp      .NormaliseDirection
  30++A310              ;--- Missile is targeting other ship
  31++A310 3A 92 80     .MissileTargetingShip:  ld      a,(SelectedUniverseSlot)            ; we will use this quite a lot with next bank switching
  32++A313 C6 46        .SaveMissileBank:       add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  33++A315 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  34++A317                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  35++A317 32 3D A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileBank),a
  36++A31A                                      ENDIF
  37++A31A 3A 45 C0     .SaveTargetBank:        ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)               ; target will be used a lot too
  38++A31D C6 46                                add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  39++A31F FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                               ; save target
  40++A321                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  41++A321 32 3E A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetBank),a
  42++A324                                      ENDIF
  43++A324              .IsMissleTargetGone:    JumpIfSlotAEmpty    .ECMIsActive            ; if the target was blown up then detonate
  43++A324 21 A1 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  43++A327 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
  43++A329 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  43++A32A 3C          >                        inc     a
  43++A32B CA 46 A4    >                        jp      z,.ECMIsActive    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
  43++A32E 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  44++A32F              ;... Note we don't have to check for impact as we already have a loop doing that
  45++A32F              .SelectTargetShip:      SelectTargetBank
  45++A32F FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  45++A331             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  45++A331 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  46++A334 3A 54 C0     .IsShipExploding:       ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                    ; check exploding status
  47++A337 E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ; as if exploding then the missile will also explode
  48++A339 28 08                                jr      z,.UpdateTargetingShipX
  49++A33B              .ShipIsExploding:       SelectMissileBank                           ; get missile back into memory
  49++A33B FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  49++A33D             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  49++A33D ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  50++A340 C3 46 A4                             jp      .ECMIsActive
  51++A343              ;--- At this point we already have the target banked in ready for calculating vector
  52++A343              ; Tactics vector = missile - target
  53++A343 ED 5B 20 C0  .UpdateTargetingShipX:  ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get target ship X
  54++A347 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
  55++A34A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  56++A34A ED 53 70 A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetX),de
  57++A34E 32 72 A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetX+2),a
  58++A351                                      ENDIF
  59++A351                                      FlipSignBitA
  59++A351 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
  60++A353 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
  61++A354                                      SelectMissileBank
  61++A354 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  61++A356             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  61++A356 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  62++A359 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
  63++A35C 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
  64++A35F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  65++A35F 22 50 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileX),hl
  66++A362 32 52 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileX+2),a
  67++A365                                      ENDIF
  68++A365 47                                   ld      b,a
  69++A366 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
  70++A369 22 80 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
  71++A36C 32 82 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
  72++A36F              .UpdateTargetingShipY:  SelectTargetBank
  72++A36F FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  72++A371             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  72++A371 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  73++A374 ED 5B 23 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKylo)                        ; get target ship X
  74++A378 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  75++A37B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  76++A37B ED 53 73 A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetY),de
  77++A37F 32 75 A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetY+2),a
  78++A382                                      ENDIF
  79++A382                                      FlipSignBitA
  79++A382 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
  80++A384 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
  81++A385                                      SelectMissileBank
  81++A385 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  81++A387             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  81++A387 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  82++A38A 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
  83++A38D 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
  84++A390                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  85++A390 22 54 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileY),hl
  86++A393 32 56 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileY+2),a
  87++A396                                      ENDIF
  88++A396 47                                   ld      b,a
  89++A397 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
  90++A39A 22 84 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
  91++A39D 32 86 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
  92++A3A0              .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  SelectTargetBank
  92++A3A0 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  92++A3A2             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  92++A3A2 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  93++A3A5 ED 5B 26 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get target ship X
  94++A3A9 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  95++A3AC                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  96++A3AC ED 53 76 A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetZ),de
  97++A3B0 32 78 A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetZ+2),a
  98++A3B3                                      ENDIF
  99++A3B3                                      FlipSignBitA
  99++A3B3 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 100++A3B5 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 101++A3B6                                      SelectMissileBank
 101++A3B6 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 101++A3B8             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 101++A3B8 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 102++A3BB 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 103++A3BE 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 104++A3C1                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 105++A3C1 22 58 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ),hl
 106++A3C4 32 5A A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ+2),a
 107++A3C7                                      ENDIF
 108++A3C7
 109++A3C7 47                                   ld      b,a
 110++A3C8 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 111++A3CB 22 88 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 112++A3CE 32 8A A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 113++A3D1              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 114++A3D1              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 115++A3D1              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 116++A3D1 2A 81 A2                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 117++A3D4 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 118++A3D5 ED 5B 85 A2                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 119++A3D9 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 120++A3DA ED 4B 89 A2                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 121++A3DE B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 122++A3DF                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 122++A3DF E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 123++A3E1                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 123++A3E1 C2 F0 A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 124++A3E4 B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 125++A3E5 B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 126++A3E6 B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 127++A3E7                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 127++A3E7 C2 F0 A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 128++A3EA                                      ELSE
 129++A3EA ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 130++A3EA                                      ENDIF
 131++A3EA              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 132++A3EA 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 133++A3ED C3 83 A1                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 134++A3F0                          DISPLAY "TODO: far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0"
 135++A3F0              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 135++A3F0 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 135++A3F2             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 135++A3F2 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 136++A3F5                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 136++A3F5 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 136++A3F8 A7          >                        and     a
 136++A3F9 C2 16 A4    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 137++A3FC                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 137++A3FC 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 137++A3FF FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 137++A401 DA 16 A4    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 138++A404                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 138++A404 3A E2 7D    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 138++A407 A7          >                        and     a
 138++A408 C2 16 A4    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 139++A40B 3A C4 7D     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 140++A40E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 140++A40E FE 10       >                        cp     16
 140++A410 D2 16 A4    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 141++A413              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 142++A413 C3 42 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 143++A416              ;                       implicit ret
 144++A416              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 145++A416              .NoECM:
 146++A416                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 147++A416                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 148++A416              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 149++A416              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 150++A416                                      SelectMissileBank
 150++A416 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 150++A418             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 150++A418 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 151++A41B                                      ;break
 152++A41B                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 153++A41B              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 154++A41B ~                                        break
 155++A41B                                      ENDIF
 156++A41B CD 7A A9                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 157++A41E                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 158++A41E CD 41 A8                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 159++A421                                      ENDIF
 160++A421              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 160++A421 3A 82 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 160++A424 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 160++A426 32 82 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 161++A429                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 161++A429 3A 86 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 161++A42C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 161++A42E 32 86 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 162++A431                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 162++A431 3A 8A A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 162++A434 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 162++A436 32 8A A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 163++A439 CD 50 A4                             call    SeekingLogic
 164++A43C C9                                   ret
 165++A43D 3A 9F 80     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 166++A440                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 166++A440 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 166++A442 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 167++A443 C3 A8 A1     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 168++A446                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 169++A446 CD 61 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 170++A449                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 170++A449 AF          >                        xor     a
 170++A44A 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 171++A44D C3 3D A4                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 172++A450                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 173++A450
 174++A450 CD 86 A8     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 175++A453 32 43 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 176++A456 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 177++A459 32 47 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 178++A45C CD DC A8     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 179++A45F 32 46 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 180++A462 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 181++A465 32 47 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 182++A468 CD 72 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 183++A46B CD 96 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 184++A46E CD C4 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 185++A471 C9                                   ret
 186++A472
 187++A472              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 188++A472 2A 46 A2                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 189++A475 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 190++A476 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 191++A478 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 192++A47A 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 193++A47B 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 194++A47C CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 195++A47E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 195++A47E FE 10       >                        cp     16
 195++A480 D2 8C A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 196++A483                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 196++A483 AF          >                        xor a
 197++A484 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 198++A485 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 199++A488                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 200++A488 32 D3 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 201++A48B                                      ENDIF
 202++A48B C9                                   ret
 203++A48C 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 204++A48E B4                                   or      h
 205++A48F 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 206++A492                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 207++A492 32 D3 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 208++A495                                      ENDIF
 209++A495 C9                                   ret
 210++A496
 211++A496              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 212++A496              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 213++A496              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 214++A496              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 215++A496              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 216++A496              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 217++A496              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 218++A496              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 219++A496              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 220++A496              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 221++A496
 222++A496
 223++A496
 224++A496              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 225++A496                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 226++A496                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 227++A496 CD E2 A8                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 228++A499 32 49 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 229++A49C 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 230++A49D 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 231++A4A0 32 4A A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 232++A4A3 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 233++A4A4 3A 47 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 234++A4A7                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 235++A4A7                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 236++A4A7                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 237++A4A7                                      ;xor $80
 238++A4A7 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 239++A4A8 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 240++A4A9 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 241++A4AB                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 241++A4AB FE 10       >                        cp     16
 241++A4AD D2 B9 A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 242++A4B0                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 242++A4B0 AF          >                        xor a
 243++A4B1 B0                                   or      b
 244++A4B2 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 245++A4B5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A4B5 32 D1 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 247++A4B8                                      ENDIF
 248++A4B8 C9                                   ret
 249++A4B9 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 250++A4BB B4                                   or      h
 251++A4BC A8                                   xor     b
 252++A4BD 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 253++A4C0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 254++A4C0 32 D1 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 255++A4C3                                      ENDIF
 256++A4C3 C9                                   ret
 257++A4C4
 258++A4C4 2A 43 A2     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 259++A4C7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 260++A4C8 A7                                   and     a
 261++A4C9 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 262++A4CB ED 5B 46 A2                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 263++A4CF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 264++A4D0                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 264++A4D0 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 264++A4D2 DA DE A4    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 265++A4D5 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 266++A4D7 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 267++A4DA                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 268++A4DA 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 269++A4DD                                      ENDIF
 270++A4DD C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 271++A4DE              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 271++A4DE FE 12       >                        cp      18
 271++A4E0 DA EC A4    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 272++A4E3 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 273++A4E5 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 274++A4E8                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++A4E8 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 276++A4EB                                      ENDIF
 277++A4EB C9                                   ret
 278++A4EC              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 278++A4EC AF          >                        xor a
 279++A4ED 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 280++A4F0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 281++A4F0 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 282++A4F3                                      ENDIF
 283++A4F3 C9                                   ret
 284++A4F4
 285++A4F4
 286++A4F4 CD 33 A5     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 287++A4F7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 288++A4F8 A7                                   and     a
 289++A4F9 06 16                                ld      b,22
 290++A4FB 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 291++A4FD 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 292++A4FE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 292++A4FE FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 292++A500 D2 05 A5    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 293++A503 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 294++A505 2A 43 A2     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 295++A508 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 296++A509 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 297++A50B C2 1C A5                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 298++A50E 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 299++A50F                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 299++A50F B8          >                        cp      b
 299++A510 DA 1C A5    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 300++A513 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 301++A515 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 302++A518                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 303++A518 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 304++A51B                                      ENDIF
 305++A51B C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 306++A51C 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 307++A51D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 307++A51D FE 12       >                        cp     18
 307++A51F D2 2A A5    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 308++A522              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 308++A522 AF          >                        xor a
 309++A523 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 310++A526                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 311++A526 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 312++A529                                      ENDIF
 313++A529 C9                                   ret
 314++A52A 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2

 165++A701 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A703 32 86 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a

 170++A715                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++A715 C9                                   ret
 172++A716
 173++A716 CD 86 A8     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A719 32 43 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A71C 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A71F 32 47 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A722 CD DC A8     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A725 32 46 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A728 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A72B 32 47 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A72E CD 38 A7                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++A731 CD 5C A7                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++A734 CD 8A A7                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++A737 C9                                   ret
 185++A738
 186++A738 2A 46 A2     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++A73B 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++A73C EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++A73E E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++A740 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++A741 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++A742 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++A744                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++A744 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++A746 D2 52 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++A749                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++A749 AF          >                        xor a
 195++A74A B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++A74B 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++A74E                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++A74E 32 D3 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++A751                                      ENDIF
 200++A751 C9                                   ret
 201++A752 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++A754 B4                                   or      h
 203++A755 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++A758                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++A758 32 D3 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++A75B                                      ENDIF
 207++A75B C9                                   ret
 208++A75C
 209++A75C CD E2 A8     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++A75F 32 49 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++A762 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++A763 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++A766 32 4A A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++A769 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++A76A 3A 47 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++A76D 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++A76E 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++A76F CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++A771                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++A771 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++A773 D2 7F A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++A776                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++A776 AF          >                        xor a
 221++A777 B0                                   or      b
 222++A778 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++A77B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++A77B 32 D1 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++A77E                                      ENDIF
 226++A77E C9                                   ret
 227++A77F 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++A781 B4                                   or      h
 229++A782 A8                                   xor     b
 230++A783 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++A786                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++A786 32 D1 A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++A789                                      ENDIF
 234++A789 C9                                   ret
 235++A78A
 236++A78A 2A 43 A2     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++A78D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++A78E A7                                   and     a
 239++A78F 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++A791 ED 5B 46 A2                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++A795 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++A796                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++A796 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++A798 DA A4 A7    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++A79B 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++A79D 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++A7A0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A7A0 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++A7A3                                      ENDIF
 248++A7A3 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++A7A4              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++A7A4 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++A7A6 DA B2 A7    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++A7A9 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++A7AB 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A7AE                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A7AE 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A7B1                                      ENDIF
 255++A7B1 C9                                   ret
 256++A7B2              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++A7B2 AF          >                        xor a
 257++A7B3 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++A7B6                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++A7B6 32 D5 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++A7B9                                      ENDIF
 261++A7B9 C9                                   ret
 262++A7BA              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break
 263++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 264++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++A7BA              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++A7BA              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++A7BA              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 270++A7BA              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 271++A7BA              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 272++A7BA              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 273++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 274++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 276++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 277++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 278++A7BA              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,3
 279++A7BA              ;;;                        or      h
 280++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 281++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 282++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 283++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 284++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 285++A7BA
 286++A7BA
 287++A7BA              ;;;ShipRollv2:             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 288++A7BA              ;;;                        and     $7F
 289++A7BA              ;;;                        cp      16
 290++A7BA              ;;;                        ret     z
 291++A7BA              ;;;                        call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 292++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 293++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 294++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 295++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 296++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 297++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 298++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 299++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 300++A7BA              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 301++A7BA              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 302++A7BA              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 303++A7BA              ;;;                        or      b
 304++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 305++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 306++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 307++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 308++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 309++A7BA              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,3
 310++A7BA              ;;;                        or      h
 311++A7BA              ;;;                        xor     b
 312++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 313++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 315++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 316++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 317++A7BA              ;;;
 318++A7BA              ;;;ShipSpeedv2:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 319++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 320++A7BA              ;;;                        and     a
 321++A7BA              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 322++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 323++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 324++A7BA              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 325++A7BA              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,2                                 ; else
 326++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 327++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 328++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 329++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 330++A7BA              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 331++A7BA              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 332++A7BA              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 333++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 334++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 335++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 336++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 337++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 338++A7BA              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 339++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 340++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 341++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 342++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 343++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 344++A7BA              ;;;
 345++A7BA              ;;;
 346++A7BA              ;;;
 347++A7BA              ;;;RAT2 equ    4           ; roll pitch threshold
 348++A7BA              ;;;RAT  equ    3           ; magnitude of counter
 349++A7BA              ;;;CNT2 equ    22          ; angle for ship slowdown
 350++A7BA              ;;;
 351++A7BA              ;;;
 352++A7BA              ;;;ShipPitch:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 353++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 354++A7BA              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 355++A7BA              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 356++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 357++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 358++A7BA              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 359++A7BA              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 360++A7BA              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 361++A7BA              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 362++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 363++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 364++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 365++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 366++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 367++A7BA              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,l
 368++A7BA              ;;;                        or      h
 369++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 370++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 371++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 372++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 373++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 374++A7BA              ;;;
 375++A7BA              ;;;
 376++A7BA              ;;;                        ;
 377++A7BA              ;;;ShipRoll:               call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 378++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 379++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 380++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 381++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 382++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 383++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 384++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 385++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 386++A7BA              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 387++A7BA              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2,.skipRollZero           ;
 388++A7BA              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 389++A7BA              ;;;                        or      b
 390++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 391++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 392++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 393++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 394++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 395++A7BA              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,1
 396++A7BA              ;;;                        or      h
 397++A7BA              ;;;                        xor     b
 398++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 399++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 400++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 401++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 403++A7BA              ;;;
 404++A7BA              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 405++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 406++A7BA              ;;;                        and     a
 407++A7BA              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 408++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 409++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 410++A7BA              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 411++A7BA              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 412++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 413++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 414++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 415++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 416++A7BA              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 417++A7BA              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 418++A7BA              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 419++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 420++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 421++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 422++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 423++A7BA              ;;;                        ret
 424++A7BA              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 425++A7BA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 426++A7BA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 427++A7BA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 428++A7BA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 429++A7BA              ;;;                        ret

 276+ A7BA
 277+ A7BA              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 278+ A7BA              ; on exit a == new roll
 279+ A7BA EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 280+ A7BC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 281+ A7BE 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 282+ A7BF F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 283+ A7C1 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 284+ A7C4 C9                                   ret
 285+ A7C5
 286+ A7C5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 287+ A7C7 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 288+ A7C8 3A 46 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 289+ A7CB                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 289+ A7CB FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 289+ A7CD DA DA A7    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 290+ A7D0 78                                   ld      a,b
 291+ A7D1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 292+ A7D3                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 293+ A7D3                                     ; ld      a,
 294+ A7D3 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 295+ A7D5 B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 296+ A7D6 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 297+ A7D9 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 298+ A7DA B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 299+ A7DB 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 300+ A7DE C9                                   ret                                     ;
 301+ A7DF
 302+ A7DF 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 303+ A7E2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 304+ A7E4 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 305+ A7E6 F6 05                                or      5
 306+ A7E8 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 307+ A7EB C9                                   ret
 308+ A7EC
 309+ A7EC 4F                                   ld      c,a
 310+ A7ED F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 311+ A7EF 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 312+ A7F2 C9                                   ret
 313+ A7F3
 314+ A7F3
 315+ A7F3
 316+ A7F3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 317+ A7F5 47                                   ld      b,a
 318+ A7F6 3A 46 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 319+ A7F9                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 319+ A7F9 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 319+ A7FB DA 05 A8    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 320+ A7FE 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 321+ A800 B1                                   or      c
 322+ A801 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 323+ A804 C9                                   ret
 324+ A805 B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 325+ A806 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 326+ A809 C9                                   ret

 329+ A80A 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 330+ A80D C3 19 A8                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 331+ A810
 332+ A810 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 333+ A813 C3 19 A8                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 334+ A816
 335+ A816 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 336+ A819              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 337+ A819 11 64 A2     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 338+ A81C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 339+ A81D 47                                   ld      b,a
 340+ A81E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 341+ A820 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 342+ A821 13                                   inc     de
 343+ A822 78                                   ld      a,b
 344+ A823 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 345+ A825 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 346+ A826 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 347+ A827 23                                   inc     hl
 348+ A828 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 349+ A829 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 350+ A82A 47                                   ld      b,a
 351+ A82B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 352+ A82D 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 353+ A82E 13                                   inc     de
 354+ A82F 78                                   ld      a,b
 355+ A830 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 356+ A832 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 357+ A833 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 358+ A834 23                                   inc     hl
 359+ A835 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 360+ A836 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 361+ A837 47                                   ld      b,a
 362+ A838 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 363+ A83A 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 364+ A83B 13                                   inc     de
 365+ A83C 78                                   ld      a,b
 366+ A83D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 367+ A83F 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 368+ A840 C9                                   ret
 369+ A841
 370+ A841                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 371+ A841              DebugTacticsCopy:
 372+ A841 2A 29 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 373+ A844 ED 5B 2B C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 374+ A848 ED 4B 2D C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 375+ A84C 22 A0 A2                             ld      (TacticsSideX),hl
 376+ A84F ED 53 A4 A2                          ld      (TacticsSideY),de
 377+ A853 ED 43 A8 A2                          ld      (TacticsSideZ),bc
 378+ A857
 379+ A857 2A 2F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 380+ A85A ED 5B 31 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 381+ A85E ED 4B 33 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 382+ A862 22 B0 A2                             ld      (TacticsRoofX),hl
 383+ A865 ED 53 B4 A2                          ld      (TacticsRoofY),de
 384+ A869 ED 43 B8 A2                          ld      (TacticsRoofZ),bc

 387+ A870 ED 5B 37 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 388+ A874 ED 4B 39 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 389+ A878 22 C0 A2                             ld      (TacticsNoseX),hl
 390+ A87B ED 53 C4 A2                          ld      (TacticsNoseY),de
 391+ A87F ED 43 C8 A2                          ld      (TacticsNoseZ),bc
 392+ A883

 395+ A884
 396+ A884 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 397+ A886 CD 10 A8     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 398+ A889 21 64 A2     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 399+ A88C 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 400+ A88D 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 401+ A88E 3A 80 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 402+ A891 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 403+ A892 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 404+ A894 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 405+ A895 32 CF 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 406+ A898 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 407+ A899 3A 82 A2     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 408+ A89C AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 409+ A89D 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 410+ A89E 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 411+ A89F 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 412+ A8A0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 413+ A8A1 3A 84 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 414+ A8A4 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 415+ A8A5 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 416+ A8A7 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 417+ A8A8 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 418+ A8AA 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 419+ A8AB 3A 86 A2     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 420+ A8AE AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 421+ A8AF 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 422+ A8B0 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 423+ A8B1 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 424+ A8B2 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 425+ A8B5 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 426+ A8B7 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 427+ A8B8 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 428+ A8BB 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 429+ A8BC 22 84 A8                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 430+ A8BF E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 431+ A8C0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 432+ A8C1 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 433+ A8C2 3A 88 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 434+ A8C5 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 435+ A8C6 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 436+ A8C8 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 437+ A8C9 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 438+ A8CB 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 439+ A8CC 3A 8A A2     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 440+ A8CF AE                                   xor     (hl)
 441+ A8D0 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 442+ A8D1 2A 84 A8                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 443+ A8D4 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 444+ A8D7 32 CF 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 445+ A8DA 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 446+ A8DB C9                                   ret
 447+ A8DC
 448+ A8DC CD 16 A8     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 449+ A8DF C3 89 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 450+ A8E2
 451+ A8E2 CD 0A A8     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 452+ A8E5 C3 89 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 453+ A8E8
 454+ A8E8 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 455+ A8EB 11 70 A2                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 456+ A8EE 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 457+ A8F1 ED B0                                ldir
 458+ A8F3 C9                                   ret
