 460+ A8F4              ; Copies 24 bit XYZ Vector to tactics vectors
 461+ A8F4 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 462+ A8F7 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 463+ A8FA                                      ;xor     $80
 464+ A8FA 22 80 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 465+ A8FD 32 82 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 466+ A900
 467+ A900 2A 23 C0     .CopyY24Bit:            ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 468+ A903 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 469+ A906                                      ;xor     $80
 470+ A906 22 84 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 471+ A909 32 86 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 472+ A90C
 473+ A90C 2A 26 C0     .CopyZ24Bit:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 474+ A90F 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 475+ A912                                      ;xor     $80
 476+ A912 22 88 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 477+ A915 32 8A A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 478+ A918 C9                                   ret
 479+ A919
 480+ A919              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 480+ A919 AF          >                        xor a
 481+ A91A 21 70 A2                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 482+ A91D 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 483+ A91F 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 484+ A920 23                                   inc     hl
 485+ A921 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 486+ A923 C9                                   ret
 487+ A924
 488+ A924 CD 19 A9     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 489+ A927 CD F4 A8                             call    CopyPosToVector
 490+ A92A                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 491+ A92A                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 492+ A92A                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 493+ A92A                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 494+ A92A C9                                   ret
 495+ A92B
 496+ A92B ED 5B 70 A2  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 497+ A92F 3A 72 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 498+ A932                                      FlipSignBitA
 498+ A932 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 499+ A934 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 500+ A935 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 501+ A938 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 502+ A93B 47                                   ld      b,a
 503+ A93C CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 504+ A93F 22 80 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 505+ A942 32 82 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 506+ A945 ED 5B 73 A2  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 507+ A949 3A 75 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 508+ A94C                                      FlipSignBitA
 508+ A94C EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 509+ A94E 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 510+ A94F 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 511+ A952 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 512+ A955 47                                   ld      b,a
 513+ A956 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 514+ A959 22 84 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 515+ A95C 32 86 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 516+ A95F ED 5B 76 A2  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 517+ A963 3A 78 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 518+ A966                                      FlipSignBitA
 518+ A966 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 519+ A968 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 520+ A969 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 521+ A96C 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 522+ A96F 47                                   ld      b,a
 523+ A970 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 524+ A973 22 88 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 525+ A976 32 8A A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 526+ A979 C9                                   ret
 527+ A97A
 528+ A97A              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 529+ A97A              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 530+ A97A              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 531+ A97A 2A 80 A2     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 532+ A97D ED 5B 84 A2                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 533+ A981 ED 4B 88 A2                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 534+ A985 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 535+ A986 B2                                   or      d
 536+ A987 B0                                   or      b
 537+ A988 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 538+ A98A                                      ShiftHLRight1
 538+ A98A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 538+ A98C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 539+ A98E                                      ShiftDERight1
 539+ A98E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 539+ A990 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 540+ A992                                      ShiftBCRight1
 540+ A992 CB 38       >			   srl b
 540+ A994 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 541+ A996 C3 85 A9                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 542+ A999              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 542+ A999 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 542+ A99B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 543+ A99D                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 543+ A99D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 543+ A99F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 544+ A9A1                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 544+ A9A1 CB 38       >			   srl b
 544+ A9A3 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 545+ A9A5 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 546+ A9A8 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 547+ A9A9 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 548+ A9AB EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 549+ A9AC 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 550+ A9AD ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 551+ A9AF 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 552+ A9B0 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 553+ A9B1 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 554+ A9B2 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 555+ A9B4 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 556+ A9B5 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 557+ A9B6 CD B2 91                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 558+ A9B9                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 559+ A9B9 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 560+ A9BA FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 561+ A9BC 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 562+ A9BD C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 563+ A9BE 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 564+ A9BF CD AC 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 565+ A9C2 32 88 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 566+ A9C5 D1                                   pop     de
 567+ A9C6 7B                                   ld      a,e
 568+ A9C7 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 569+ A9C9 CD AC 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 570+ A9CC 32 84 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 571+ A9CF E1                                   pop     hl
 572+ A9D0 7D                                   ld      a,l
 573+ A9D1 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 574+ A9D3 CD AC 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 575+ A9D6 32 80 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 576+ A9D9                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 577+ A9D9                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 578+ A9D9                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 578+ A9D9 AF          >                        xor a
 579+ A9DA 32 81 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 580+ A9DD 32 85 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 581+ A9E0 32 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 582+ A9E3                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 582+ A9E3 3A 82 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 582+ A9E6 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 582+ A9E8 32 82 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 583+ A9EB                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 583+ A9EB 3A 86 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 583+ A9EE E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 583+ A9F0 32 86 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 584+ A9F3                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 584+ A9F3 3A 8A A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 584+ A9F6 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 584+ A9F8 32 8A A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 585+ A9FB C9                                   ret

 732+ A9FC              ; .PART 3

 736+ A9FC              ;         if ship has > 50% energy jump to part 6
 737+ A9FC              ;         if ship > 1/8th energy jump to part 5

 750+ A9FC              ;                         end if

 753+ A9FC              ;         end if

 755+ A9FC              ;         if ship is not pointing at us from dot product ( < 160 , also > -32)
 756+ A9FC              ;            then jump to part 7

 758+ A9FC              ;                    then fire laser at us (which reduces energy)
 759+ A9FC              ;                         cause laser damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 760+ A9FC              ;                         decellerate by half as ship has lock on

 763+ A9FC              ;                 end if

 766+ A9FC              ;        if ship is a msile targetting us

 769+ A9FC              ;                    then do random wiht bit 7 set

 772+ A9FC              ;                            else   ship turns away from us

 777+ A9FC
 778+ A9FC
 779+ A9FC              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 780+ A9FC              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 781+ A9FC              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 782+ A9FC              ; .PART 8 - new
 783+ A9FC              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 784+ A9FC              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 785+ A9FC              ;              if chance 25%
 786+ A9FC              ;                 then fire ECM
 787+ A9FC              ;
 788+ A9FC
 789+ A9FC
 790+ A9FC
 791+ A9FC
 792+ A9FC 2A 80 A2     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 793+ A9FF ED 5B 84 A2                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 794+ AA03 ED 4B 88 A2                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 795+ AA07 3A 82 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 796+ AA0A FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 797+ AA0C 3A 86 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 798+ AA0F FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 799+ AA11 3A 8A A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 800+ AA14 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 801+ AA16 FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 802+ AA18 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 803+ AA1A                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 803+ AA1A E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 804+ AA1C 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 805+ AA1E FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 806+ AA20 CB 2F                            sra     a
 807+ AA22 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 808+ AA24 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 809+ AA26 CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 810+ AA28 FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 811+ AA2A CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 812+ AA2C FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 813+ AA2E CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 814+ AA30 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 815+ AA32 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 816+ AA34 CB 2F                            sra     a
 817+ AA36 DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 818+ AA38 CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 819+ AA3A CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 820+ AA3C C3 16 AA                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 821+ AA3F 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 822+ AA40 B2                               or      d
 823+ AA41 B0                               or      b
 824+ AA42                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 824+ AA42 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 825+ AA44 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 826+ AA46              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 826+ AA46 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 826+ AA48 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 827+ AA4A                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 827+ AA4A CB 3A       >			   srl d
 827+ AA4C CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 828+ AA4E                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 828+ AA4E CB 38       >			   srl b
 828+ AA50 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 829+ AA52 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 830+ AA53 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 831+ AA55 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 832+ AA56 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 833+ AA57 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 834+ AA59 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 835+ AA5A 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 836+ AA5B DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 837+ AA5D 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 838+ AA5E 22 90 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 839+ AA61 22 94 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 840+ AA64 22 98 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 841+ AA67 C9                               ret
 842+ AA68                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 843+ AA68

  21+ AA68              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  22+ AA68              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  23+ AA68 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  23+ AA6C DD E5
  24+ AA6E AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  25+ AA6F CF                                   rst	    $08
  26+ AA70 89                                   db	    M_GETSETDRV
  27+ AA71 32 06 AB                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  28+ AA74 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  28+ AA78 C1 F1
  29+ AA7A C9                                   ret

  78+ AA89              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ AA89              ;	Function	refills the buffer map with card addresses for the file
  80+ AA89              ;	In:		a  = file handle (if calling fRefill_mapA)
  81+ AA89              ;           ix = address of filemap_buffer (if calling fRefill_mapA)
  82+ AA89              ;           de = filemap size (which should equal 4 in our case)
  83+ AA89              ;			bc  = amount to read
  84+ AA89              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  85+ AA89              ;               zero set  = no data loaded so still error
  86+ AA89              ;   you can use fRefill_map to pull default valuess
  87+ AA89              ; *******************************************************************************************************

  95+ AA89              ;                        ld      de,FilemapBuffer

  97+ AA89              ;                        ld      a,$ff

  99+ AA89              ;
 100+ AA89              ;read_stream_block:      ld      hl,(FilemapBufferPointer)
 101+ AA89              ;                        ldBCDEatHL                              ; load the disk address
 102+ AA89              ;                        push    bc                              ; into IXDE
 103+ AA89              ;                        pop     ix                              ; now IXDE = card address
 104+ AA89              ;                        ldBCatHL                                ; bc = number of blocks to be read
 105+ AA89              ;                        ld      (FilemapBlockCount),bc
 106+ AA89              ;                        ret
 107+ AA89              ; Start up stream of data
 108+ AA89              ; If successful, the call returns with:
 109+ AA89              ; B=protocol: 0=SD/MMC, 1=IDE,  C=data port
 110+ AA89              ; NOTE: On the Next, these values will always be: B=0 C=$EB

 189+ AA89              ;.FileStreamError:       jp      .FileStreamError
 190+ AA89              ;
 191+ AA89              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ AA89              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ AA89              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ AA89              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ AA89              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ AA89              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ AA89 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ AA8A C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ AA8B E5                                   push    hl
 200+ AA8C DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ AA8F CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ AA90 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ AA91 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ AA92 C9                                   ret
 205+ AA93
 206+ AA93              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ AA93              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ AA93              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ AA93              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ AA93              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ AA93              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ AA93 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ AA94 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ AA95 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ AA96 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ AA99 CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ AA9A 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ AA9B E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ AA9C C9                                   ret
 220+ AA9D
 221+ AA9D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ AA9D              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ AA9D              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ AA9D              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ AA9D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ AA9D B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ AA9E C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ AA9F CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ AAA0 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ AAA1 C9                                   ret

 247+ AAA2
 248+ AAA2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 249+ AAA2              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 250+ AAA2              ;	In:		a   = file handle
 251+ AAA2              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
 252+ AAA2              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
 253+ AAA2              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
 254+ AAA2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 255+ AAA2 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
 256+ AAA5 CF                                   rst	    $08
 257+ AAA6 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK

 260+ AAAB
 261+ AAAB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ AAAB              ; Init the file system
 263+ AAAB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ AAAB CD 68 AA     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ AAAE C9                                   ret
 266+ AAAF
 267+ AAAF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ AAAF              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ AAAF              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ AAAF              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ AAAF              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ AAAF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ AAAF CD 68 AA     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ AAB2 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ AAB5                                      ; get file size
 276+ AAB5 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ AAB8 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ AABB 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ AABD CD 7B AA                             call    fOpen
 280+ AAC0 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ AAC2 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ AAC4 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ AAC6 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ AAC9 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ AACA CD 89 AA                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AACD 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AACF F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AAD0 CD 9D AA                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AAD3 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AAD5 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AAD8 C9                                   ret
 292+ AAD9              ;
 293+ AAD9              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AAD9              ;
 295+ AAD9 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AADB C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AADC
 298+ AADC              .error_closing:
 299+ AADC C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AADD D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AADE C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AADF C9                                   ret
 303+ AAE0
 304+ AAE0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AAE0              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AAE0              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AAE0              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AAE0              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AAE0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AAE0 CD 68 AA     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AAE3 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AAE6 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AAE9 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AAEB CD 7B AA                             call    fOpen
 315+ AAEE 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AAF0 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AAF2 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AAF4 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AAF7 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AAF8 CD 93 AA                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AAFB 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AAFD F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AAFE CD 9D AA                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AB01 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AB02              ;
 326+ AB02              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AB02              ;
 328+ AB02 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AB05 C9                                   ret

  60+ AE81              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			hl
  61+ AE81              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			bc
  62+ AE81              ;:DEFUNCT 	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ AE81              ;:DEFUNCT 	ret
  64+ AE81
  65+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCTGetFuelLevel:           INCLUDE "Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm"
  66+ AE81
  67+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCTGetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT                        ex      de,hl

  70+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT                        call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT.ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT.UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"

  77+ AE81              ;;DEFUNCT                        ret		z

 692  B104 60 00        IR_COUNT        dw  $0060
 693  B106
 694  B106 00           LAST_DELTA      db  0
 695  B107 00           SavedMMU6       db  0
 696  B108 00           SavedMMU7       db  0
 697  B109              SoundInterrupt      EQU IM2Sound
 698  B109              DanubeInterrupt     EQU IM2PlayDanube
 699  B109              AttractInterrrupt   EQU IM2AttractMode
 700  B109
 701  B109
 702  B109              StartOfInterruptHandler:
 703  B109                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
 704  B109
 705  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
 706  B109                              org $B1B1
 707  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
 708  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
 709  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
 710  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
 711  B1B1 ~                                            DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Enabled"
 712  B1B1 ~                                            ei
 713  B1B1 ~                                            reti
 714  B1B1                                      ELSE
 715  B1B1                                              DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Disabled"
 716  B1B1                                      ENDIF
 717  B1B1 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 717  B1B5 DD E5 FD E5
 718  B1B9 08                                   ex      af,af'
 719  B1BA D9                                   exx
 720  B1BB F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 721  B1BF 21 CB 7E                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
 722  B1C2 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
 723  B1C3                                      ;break
 724  B1C3 CD D7 B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
 725  B1C6 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 726  B1CA 08                                   ex      af,af'
 727  B1CB D9                                   exx
 728  B1CC FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 728  B1D0 E1 D1 C1 F1
 729  B1D4 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
 730  B1D5 ED 4D                                reti
 731  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Ends at",$
 732  B1D7              EndOfNonBanked:
 733  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked
 734  B1D7
 735  B1D7
 736  B1D7              SaveMMU6:               MACRO
 737  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 738  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 739  B1D7                                      ENDM
 740  B1D7
 741  B1D7              RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
 742  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 743  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 744  B1D7                                      ENDM
 745  B1D7
 746  B1D7              SaveMMU7:               MACRO
 747  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 748  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 749  B1D7                                      ENDM
 750  B1D7
 751  B1D7              RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
 752  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 753  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 754  B1D7                                      ENDM
 755  B1D7
 756  B1D7              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
 756  B1D7             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 756  B1D7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 756  B1DA 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 756  B1DC ED 79       >            out (c),a
 756  B1DE 04          >            inc b
 756  B1DF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 756  B1E1 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 757  B1E4                                      MMUSelectSound
 757  B1E4 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 758  B1E8                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 759  B1E8                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 760  B1E8                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 761  B1E8 CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
 762  B1EB              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 762  B1EB 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 762  B1EE ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 763  B1F1 C9                                   ret
 764  B1F2
 765  B1F2
 766  B1F2              IM2PlayDanube:          SaveMMU7
 766  B1F2             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 766  B1F2 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 766  B1F5 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 766  B1F7 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 766  B1F9 04          >            inc b
 766  B1FA ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 766  B1FC 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 767  B1FF                                      MMUSelectSound
 767  B1FF ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 768  B203                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 769  B203                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 770  B203                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 771  B203 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work
 772  B206              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 772  B206 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 772  B209 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 773  B20C C9                                   ret
 774  B20D
 775  B20D              IM2AttractMode:         ;break
 776  B20D                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTMUSIC
 777  B20D ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode Music disabled"
 778  B20D                                  ELSE
 779  B20D                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode Music enabled"
 780  B20D CD F2 B1                             call    IM2PlayDanube
 781  B210                                  ENDIF
 782  B210                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTGRAPHICS
 783  B210 ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics disabled"
 784  B210                                  ELSE
 785  B210                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics enabled"
 786  B210                                      SaveMMU6
 786  B210             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 786  B210 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 786  B213 3E 56       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 786  B215 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 786  B217 04          >            inc b
 786  B218 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 786  B21A 32 07 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 787  B21D                                      SaveMMU7
 787  B21D             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 787  B21D 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 787  B220 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 787  B222 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 787  B224 04          >            inc b
 787  B225 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 787  B227 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 788  B22A                                      ;break
 789  B22A CD 40 78                             call    AttractModeUpdate
 790  B22D                                      RestoreMMU6
 790  B22D 3A 07 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 790  B230 ED 92 56    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 791  B233                                      RestoreMMU7
 791  B233 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 791  B236 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 792  B239                                  ENDIF
 793  B239 C9                                   ret

  32+ C0C2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  33+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C0D1                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0D5 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0D8 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0D9 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0DA 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0DC C9                                   ret
  23++C0DD
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  34+ C0DD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35+ C0DD              SRM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair:
  36+ C0DD ED 4B 6F 7F                          ld		bc,(PresentSystemX)				; bc = present system
  37+ C0E1 01 80 60                             ld		bc,src_xy_centre					; must be ordered x y in data
  38+ C0E4                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
  38+ C0E4 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
  39+ C0E8 CD F5 E0                             call	sprite_local_cursor
  40+ C0EB 3A 31 84                             ld		a,(Fuel)
  41+ C0EE 57                                   ld		d,a
  42+ C0EF 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
  43+ C0F1                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  43+ C0F1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  44+ C0F5 CD C6 EB                             call	l2_draw_circle
  45+ C0F8 C9                                   ret

  47+ C0F9              ; TODO MOVE CURSOR CODE
  48+ C0F9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  49+ C0F9              SRM_draw_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  50+ C0F9 ED 4B 71 7F                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  51+ C0FD ED 5B 6F 7F                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  52+ C101 0E 80                                ld		c,src_x_centre
  53+ C103 06 60                                ld		b,src_y_centre
  54+ C105                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
  54+ C105 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
  55+ C109 CD FD E0                             call	sprite_local_hyper_cursor
  56+ C10C C9                                   ret
  57+ C10D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  58+ C10D 3A 5C 7F     src_get_name:           ld      a,(Galaxy)
  59+ C110                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
  59+ C110 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
  60+ C113 ED 4B 71 7F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
  61+ C117 ED 43 5B E8                          ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc
  62+ C11B CD 64 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor
  63+ C11E FE 00                                cp      0
  64+ C120 C8                                   ret     z
  65+ C121 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
  66+ C124 21 DA 8E                             ld		hl,name_expanded
  67+ C127 CD 2F 8E                             call	CapitaliseString
  68+ C12A 21 DA 8E                             ld		hl, name_expanded
  69+ C12D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  70+ C12F C9                                   ret
  71+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  73+ C130 ED 4B 71 7F                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  74+ C134 ED 5B 6F 7F                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  75+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  76+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  77+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  78+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  79+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  80+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  81+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  82+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  83+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  84+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  85+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  86+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  87+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  88+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  89+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  90+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  91+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  92+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  93+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  94+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  95+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  96+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  97+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  98+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  99+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
 100+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
 101+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 102+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 103+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank

 104+ C16C CD D0 E0                             call	sprite_lhc_move

 108+ C173 26 08        src_clear_name_area:    ld      h,8

 150+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ C1CD 3A 5C 7F     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 152+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 152+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 153+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 154+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 155+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 159+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 160+ C1E3 ED 4B 6F 7F                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 161+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 162+ C1EB ED 4B 71 7F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 163+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 164+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 165+ C1F6 DD 2A 91 7F                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 166+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 167+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 168+ C201 CD 0A 9A                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 169+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 170+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 171+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 172+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 173+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 174+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 175+ C20F CD 73 98                             call    compare16HLDE
 176+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 177+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 178+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 179+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 180+ C219 CD 73 98                             call    compare16HLDE
 181+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 182+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 183+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 184+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 185+ C223 CD 73 98                             call    compare16HLDE
 186+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 187+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 188+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 189+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 190+ C22D
 191+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 192+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 193+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 194+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 195+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 196+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 198+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 199+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 200+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 201+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 202+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 203+ C236 83                                   add     e
 204+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 205+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 206+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 207+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 209+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 210+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 211+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 212+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 213+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 214+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 215+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 216+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 217+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 218+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 219+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 220+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 221+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 222+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 223+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 223+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 223+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 224+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 225+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 225+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 225+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 226+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 227+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 228+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 228+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 228+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 229+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 230+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 230+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 230+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 231+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 232+ C284 C9                                   ret
 233+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 234+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 236+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 237+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 238+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 239+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 240+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 241+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 242+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 243+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 244+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 245+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 246+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 247+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 248+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 249+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 250+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 251+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 252+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 253+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 254+ C2B3
 255+ C2B3 CD EE 84     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working

 462+ C478 3A 72 7F     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 463+ C47B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 463+ C47B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 463+ C47C CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 464+ C47F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 465+ C480 3A 70 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 466+ C483 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 467+ C484 FA 8C C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 468+ C487                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 468+ C487 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 468+ C489 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 469+ C48C 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 470+ C48D 3D                                   dec     a
 471+ C48E 32 72 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 472+ C491 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 473+ C494 C9                                   ret
 474+ C495              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 475+ C495 3A 70 7F     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 476+ C498 47                                   ld      b,a
 477+ C499 3A 72 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 478+ C49C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 479+ C49D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 479+ C49D FE 80       >                        cp     128
 479+ C49F CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 480+ C4A2 90                                   sub     b
 481+ C4A3 FA AB C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 482+ C4A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4A6 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 482+ C4A8 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 483+ C4AB 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 484+ C4AC 3C                                   inc    a
 485+ C4AD 32 72 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 486+ C4B0 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 487+ C4B3 C9                                   ret
 488+ C4B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 489+ C4B4 3A 71 7F     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 490+ C4B7                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 490+ C4B7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 490+ C4B8 CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 491+ C4BB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 492+ C4BC 3A 6F 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 493+ C4BF 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 494+ C4C0 FA C8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 495+ C4C3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 495+ C4C3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 495+ C4C5 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 496+ C4C8 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 497+ C4C9 3D                                   dec     a
 498+ C4CA 32 71 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 499+ C4CD CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 500+ C4D0 C9                                   ret
 501+ C4D1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 502+ C4D1 3A 6F 7F     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 503+ C4D4 47                                   ld      b,a
 504+ C4D5 3A 71 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 505+ C4D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 506+ C4D9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 506+ C4D9 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 506+ C4DB CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 507+ C4DE 90                                   sub     b
 508+ C4DF FA E7 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 509+ C4E2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 509+ C4E2 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 509+ C4E4 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 510+ C4E7 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 511+ C4E8 3C                                   inc    a
 512+ C4E9 32 71 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 513+ C4EC CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 514+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 515+ C4F0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 516+ C4F0 2A 6F 7F     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 517+ C4F3 22 71 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 518+ C4F6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 519+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 520+ C4FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 521+ C4FA 3A 5C 7F     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 522+ C4FD                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 522+ C4FD ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 523+ C500 ED 4B 71 7F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 524+ C504 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 525+ C507 ED 43 71 7F                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 526+ C50B CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 527+ C50E C9                                   ret
 528+ C50F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 529+ C50F AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 530+ C510 C9                                   ret
 531+ C511
# file closed: ./Menus/short_range_chart_menu.asm

  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C08F 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C090 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C091 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C092 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C093 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C094 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C095 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C096 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C097 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C098 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C099 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C09B C5                                   push		bc
  16++C09C D1                                   pop			de
  17++C09D                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0A1 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0A4 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0A5 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0A6 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0A8 C9                                   ret
  23++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 199+ C27C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 200+ C27C              ; The main loop handles the find key
 201+ C27C              loop_gc_menu:           JumpIfMemTrue TextInputMode,AlreadyInInputMode  ;if we are in input mode then go directly there
 201+ C27C 3A BB 80    >                        ld      a,(TextInputMode)
 201+ C27F A7          >                        and     a
 201+ C280 CA A1 C2    >                        jp      z, AlreadyInInputMode
 202+ C283              .StartFindCheck:        MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 202+ C283 3E 4E       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find
 202+ C285             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 202+ C285 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 202+ C289 CD A2 E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 203+ C28C C0                                   ret     nz                                      ;the main loop handles find key
 204+ C28D                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 204+ C28D ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 205+ C291 CD 9C E2                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 206+ C294                                      SetMemTrue TextInputMode                        ;Set input mode to true
 206+ C294 AF          >                        xor     a
 206+ C295 32 BB 80    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 207+ C298                                      SetMemToN gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal             ; set up blink
 207+ C298 3E 10       >                        ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 207+ C29A 32 D9 C1    >                        ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 208+ C29D CD 20 C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text                    ; now prep the boiler plate input text
 209+ C2A0 C9                                   ret                                             ; and exit so next interation handles new input as we have to rescan keyboard
 210+ C2A1              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 211+ C2A1              AlreadyInInputMode:     MMUSelectKeyboard
 211+ C2A1 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 212+ C2A5 CD C3 E2                             call    InputName                               ; Call input routine to parse a key
 213+ C2A8                                      JumpIfMemFalse InputChanged, .blinkNoDelay      ; no key they bypass rest of input
 213+ C2A8 3A 3B E2    >                        ld      a,(InputChanged)
 213+ C2AB A7          >                        and     a
 213+ C2AC C2 B9 C2    >                        jp      nz, .blinkNoDelay
 214+ C2AF              .WasItEnter:            JumpIfMemTrue EnterPressed, .FindEnterPressed   ; if enter was pressed then find
 214+ C2AF 3A 3A E2    >                        ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 214+ C2B2 A7          >                        and     a
 214+ C2B3 CA C5 C2    >                        jp      z, .FindEnterPressed
 215+ C2B6 CD 2E C2                             call    gc_display_find_string                  ; update string
 216+ C2B9 CD 5C C2     .blinkNoDelay:          call    blink_cursor
 217+ C2BC                                      CallIfMemEqNusng    gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal, gc_display_find_string ; on blink we get a double update but we can live with that
 217+ C2BC 3A D9 C1    >                        ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 217+ C2BF FE 10       >                        cp      gcBlinkVal
 217+ C2C1 CC 2E C2    >                        call    z,gc_display_find_string
 218+ C2C4 C9                                   ret
 219+ C2C5              .FindEnterPressed:      SetMemFalse EnterPressed                        ; reset enter
 219+ C2C5 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 219+ C2C7 32 3A E2    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 220+ C2CA                                      SetMemFalse TextInputMode                       ; leave input mode
 220+ C2CA 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 220+ C2CC 32 BB 80    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 221+ C2CF 3A 5C 7F                             ld      a,(Galaxy)                              ; Fetch correct galaxy seed bank into memory
 222+ C2D2                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 222+ C2D2 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 223+ C2D5 21 19 E2                             ld      hl,InputString
 224+ C2D8 11 5E E8                             ld      de,GalaxySearchString
 225+ C2DB CD D0 F6                             call    GalaxyCopyLoop
 226+ C2DE CD 39 FB                             call    find_system_by_name
 227+ C2E1 FE FF                                cp      $FF                                     ; 0 denotes found FF, failure
 228+ C2E3 28 1D                                jr      z,.FindNoMatch
 229+ C2E5 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 230+ C2E8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 231+ C2E9 3A F9 E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 232+ C2EC 47                                   ld      b,a
 233+ C2ED ED 43 71 7F                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 234+ C2F1 CD 94 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 235+ C2F4 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position               ; Wipe input area on screen
 236+ C2F7 21 73 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_match
 237+ C2FA                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 237+ C2FA ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 238+ C2FE CD D7 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 239+ C301 C9                                   ret
 240+ C302              .FindNoMatch:           ; if not found display "Not found"
 241+ C302                                      ; move curor if found
 242+ C302 11 08 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 243+ C305 21 58 C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_no_match
 244+ C308                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 244+ C308 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 245+ C30C CD D7 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 246+ C30F C9                                   ret; DOSTUFFHERE
 247+ C310              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 248+ C310              galctic_chart_cursors:  ReturnIfMemTrue TextInputMode
 248+ C310 3A BB 80    >                        ld      a,(TextInputMode)
 248+ C313 A7          >                        and     a
 248+ C314 C8          >                        ret     z
 249+ C315 3A BC 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 250+ C318                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 250+ C318 A7          >                        and     a
 250+ C319 C8          >                        ret     z
 251+ C31A 17                                   rla
 252+ C31B DC 33 C3                             call   c,gc_UpPressed
 253+ C31E 17                                   rla
 254+ C31F DC 43 C3                             call   c,gc_DownPressed
 255+ C322 17                                   rla
 256+ C323 DC 53 C3                             call   c,gc_LeftPressed
 257+ C326 17                                   rla
 258+ C327 DC 63 C3                             call   c,gc_RightPressed
 259+ C32A 17                                   rla
 260+ C32B DC 73 C3                             call   c,gc_HomePressed
 261+ C32E 17                                   rla
 262+ C32F DC 7D C3                             call   c,gc_RecenterPressed
 263+ C332 C9                                   ret
 264+ C333              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 265+ C333 3A 72 7F     gc_UpPressed:           ld     a,(TargetSystemX+1)
 266+ C336                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 1,gc_BoundsLimit
 266+ C336 FE 01       >                        cp     1
 266+ C338 CA 92 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 267+ C33B 3D                                   dec     a
 268+ C33C 32 72 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX+1),a
 269+ C33F CD 94 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 270+ C342 C9                                   ret
 271+ C343              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 272+ C343 3A 72 7F     gc_DownPressed:         ld     a,(TargetSystemX+1)
 273+ C346                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,gc_BoundsLimit
 273+ C346 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 273+ C348 CA 92 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 274+ C34B 3C                                   inc    a
 275+ C34C 32 72 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX+1),a
 276+ C34F CD 94 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 277+ C352 C9                                   ret
 278+ C353              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 279+ C353 3A 71 7F     gc_LeftPressed:         ld     a,(TargetSystemX)
 280+ C356                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 2,gc_BoundsLimit
 280+ C356 FE 02       >                        cp     2
 280+ C358 CA 92 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 281+ C35B 3D                                   dec    a
 282+ C35C 32 71 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 283+ C35F CD 94 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 284+ C362 C9                                   ret
 285+ C363              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 286+ C363 3A 71 7F     gc_RightPressed:        ld     a,(TargetSystemX)
 287+ C366                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 253,gc_BoundsLimit
 287+ C366 FE FD       >                        cp     253
 287+ C368 CA 92 C3    >                        jp      z,gc_BoundsLimit
 288+ C36B 3C                                   inc    a
 289+ C36C 32 71 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 290+ C36F CD 94 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 291+ C372 C9                                   ret
 292+ C373              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 293+ C373 2A 6F 7F     gc_HomePressed:         ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 294+ C376 22 71 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 295+ C379 CD 94 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 296+ C37C C9                                   ret
 297+ C37D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 298+ C37D 3A 5C 7F     gc_RecenterPressed:     ld      a,(Galaxy)       ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 299+ C380                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 299+ C380 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 300+ C383 ED 4B 71 7F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 301+ C387 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 302+ C38A ED 43 71 7F                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 303+ C38E CD 94 C3                             call    UpdateGalacticCursor
 304+ C391 C9                                   ret
 305+ C392              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 306+ C392 AF           gc_BoundsLimit          xor     a
 307+ C393 C9                                   ret
 308+ C394
 309+ C394              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 310+ C394 ED 4B 71 7F  UpdateGalacticCursor:   ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
 311+ C398              OnGalacticChart:        MMUSelectSpriteBank
 311+ C398 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 312+ C39C CD A9 E0                             call	sprite_ghc_move

 314+ C3A2                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

 318+ C3B0 FE 00                                cp      0
 319+ C3B2 C8                                   ret     z
 320+ C3B3              ; just fall into gc_name_if_possible
 321+ C3B3 CD 82 F6     gc_name_if_possible:    call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 322+ C3B6 CD E1 C3                             call    gc_clear_name_area
 323+ C3B9 21 DA 8E                             ld		hl,name_expanded

 333+ C3D7 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 334+ C3D9                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 334+ C3D9 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 335+ C3DD CD BE E3                             call	l2_print_7at
 336+ C3E0 C9                                   ret
 337+ C3E1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 338+ C3E1 26 08        gc_clear_name_area:     ld      h,8
 339+ C3E3 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 340+ C3E6 01 0A A0                             ld      bc,$A00A
 341+ C3E9 E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 342+ C3EA D5                                   push    de
 343+ C3EB C5                                   push    bc
 344+ C3EC                                      MMUSelectLayer2
