 695++CCF1 ~            ;                       if Y1 hi <> 0 or Y1 low >= 128 then y coordinate is good
 696++CCF1 ~            .DoneXCalc:             ld      a,b
 697++CCF1 ~                                    and     a
 698++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockY1Test
 699++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,c
 700++CCF1 ~                                    and     $80
 701++CCF1 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                  ; speculative clear of carry in case its good
 702++CCF1 ~                                    ret     z
 703++CCF1 ~            ;                       if Y1 hi bit 7 is set
 704++CCF1 ~            .X1NoClipNeeded:
 705++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockY1Test:       ld      a,b
 706++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80
 707++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPos       ; if Y is positive jump forward
 708++CCF1 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = abs(Y1) / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 709++CCF1 ~                                    break
 710++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 711++CCF1 ~                                    test    16
 712++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockYNegMulGrad
 713++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYNegDivGrad:  macronegate16bc
 714++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 715++CCF1 ~                                    push    hl
 716++CCF1 ~                                    ld      h,c                     ; move offset into high byte of h
 717++CCF1 ~                                    ld      l,0
 718++CCF1 ~                                    ld      c,a
 719++CCF1 ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC;div_hl_c
 720++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 721++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 722++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY1
 723++CCF1 ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = abs(Y1) * Gradient
 724++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYNegMulGrad:  macronegate16bc
 725++CCF1 ~                                    push    hl
 726++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 727++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 728++CCF1 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 729++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 730++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 731++CCF1 ~            ;                       x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 732++CCF1 ~            ;                       y1 = 0
 733++CCF1 ~            ;                       ret
 734++CCF1 ~            ;                       now we have done the adjustment, if y or x are off screen then the line spans screen in only 1 dimension so doesn't get drawn
 735++CCF1 ~            .DoneBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 736++CCF1 ~                                    test    4
 737++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.Y1SkipNegate
 738++CCF1 ~                                    macronegate16de
 739++CCF1 ~            .Y1SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 740++CCF1 ~                                    ld      bc,0
 741++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 742++CCF1 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = Y1 lo / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 743++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYPos:         ld      a,iyh
 744++CCF1 ~                                    test    16
 745++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPosMulGrad
 746++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYPosDivGrad:  ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 747++CCF1 ~                                    push    hl
 748++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 749++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,127
 750++CCF1 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 751++CCF1 ~                                    ld      h,l
 752++CCF1 ~                                    ld      l,0
 753++CCF1 ~                                    ld      c,a
 754++CCF1 ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC
 755++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 756++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 757++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY2
 758++CCF1 ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = Y1 lo * Gradient
 759++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYPosMulGrad:  push    hl
 760++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 761++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,127
 762++CCF1 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 763++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 764++CCF1 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 765++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 766++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 767++CCF1 ~            ;                x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 768++CCF1 ~            ;                y1 = 127
 769++CCF1 ~            .DoneBlockY2:           ld      a,iyh
 770++CCF1 ~                                    test    4
 771++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.Y2SkipNegate
 772++CCF1 ~                                    macronegate16de
 773++CCF1 ~            .Y2SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 774++CCF1 ~                                    ld      bc,127
 775++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 776++CCF1                      ELSE
 777++CCF1 C9                       ret
 778++CCF2                      ENDIF
 779++CCF2              ; old code for on screen test
 780++CCF2              ;;;;;;; if y1 > 127 and y2 > 127 then same sing and exit
 781++CCF2              ;;;;;;
 782++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1hi y2hi are <> 0 and both same sign exit
 783++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ; y1 and y2 high tests
 784++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh
 785++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jp      .CheckYLow
 786++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld
 787++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ; if either is zero then we can check for > 127
 788++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.YHighNegativeCheck               ;
 789++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ;
 790++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ;
 791++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 792++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1h bit 7 and y2h bit 7 set then exit as both -ve
 793++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 794++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 795++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 796++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 797++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1h > 0 and y2h > 0 then exit as both are +ve high
 798++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 799++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 800++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 801++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1h or y2h is not 0 then proceed to clip
 802++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b
 803++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        or      ixh
 804++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.StartProcessing
 805++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if (y1l bit 7 is set and y1h is clear ) or (y2l bit 7 is set and y2h is clear) the proceed to clip
 806++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c
 807++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        or      ixl
 808++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 809++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 810++CCF2              ;;;;;;
 811++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ;
 812++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 813++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y1HighIsZero                     ;
 814++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ; if we get here Y1 high <> 0
 815++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 816++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y2HighIsZero                     ; if they are both non zero we can do a sign check
 817++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckYSameSign:        ld      a,b                                 ; if we get here Y1 high and Y2 high are not zero
 818++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        xor     ixh                                 ; so same sign then bail out if they are
 819++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 820++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 821++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if we get here either y1hi or y2 hi are 0, now check and y1 low > 127 & y2 low > 127, exit
 822++CCF2              ;;;;;;.Y1HighIsZero:          ld      a,ixh                               ; as y1h is zero, if y2h is zero we do y1 y2 test
 823++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 824++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.Startprocessing                 ;
 825++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c                                 ; so by here y1h and y2h must be zero
 826++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixl
 827++CCF2              ;;;;;;
 828++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        .CheckY2Lo                        ;
 829++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckY1Lo:             ld      a,c
 830++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 831++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 832++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckY2Lo:             ld      a,ixl
 833++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 834++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz
 835++CCF2              ;;;;;;;clip = 0
# file closed: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm
 734+ CCF2              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 735+ CCF2                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
   1++CCF2              ; Set TransMatTo
   2++CCF2              ; XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)   = sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z XX16(13,12) (15 14) (17 16)
   3++CCF2              ; XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10) = roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10)
   4++CCF2              ; XX16(13 12) (15 14) (17 16) = nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)
   5++CCF2              ; This moves Side XYZ to position 0, Roof XYZ to position 1 annd nose XYZ to position 2 as a copy of each batch of 6 bytes
   6++CCF2              ; 18 byte fast copy
   7++CCF2
   8++CCF2              ; Fast copy using the stack                                                         ; T states
   9++CCF2 DD 21 00 00  CopyRotmatToTransMat:   ld      ix,0                                                ; 14
  10++CCF6 DD 39                                add     ix,sp                                               ; 15
  11++CCF8 31 29 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatSidevX ; Source                        ; 10
  12++CCFB E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  13++CCFC D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  14++CCFD C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  15++CCFE D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  16++CCFF E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvX              ; 10
  17++CD00 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvY              ; 10
  18++CD01 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvZ              ; 10
  19++CD02 31 6D C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatRoofvZ+2 ; Target + 2 reversed       ; 10
  20++CD05 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  21++CD06 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  22++CD07 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  23++CD08 D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  24++CD09 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  25++CD0A D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  26++CD0B E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  27++CD0C 31 35 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  28++CD0F E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  29++CD10 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  30++CD11 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  31++CD12 31 73 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  32++CD15 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  33++CD16 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  34++CD17 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  35++CD18 DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  36++CD1A C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  37++CD1B
  38++CD1B
  39++CD1B
  40++CD1B              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  41++CD1B              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  42++CD1B              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  43++CD1B              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  44++CD1B              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  45++CD1B              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  46++CD1B              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  47++CD1B              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  48++CD1B              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  49++CD1B              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  50++CD1B              ;                        ret
  51++CD1B
  52++CD1B              CopyRotToTransMacro:    MACRO
  53++CD1B ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  54++CD1B ~                                    ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  55++CD1B ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  56++CD1B ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  57++CD1B ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  58++CD1B                                      ENDM
  59++CD1B
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
 736+ CD1B                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CD1B              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CD1B 2A AC C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CD1E 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CD1F E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CD21 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CD22                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CD22 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CD23 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CD25 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CD26                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CD26 ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CD2A 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CD2D E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CD2F 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CD30 CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CD33 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CD34 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CD35 22 A6 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CD38              ; ..................................
  20++CD38 2A AE C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CD3B 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CD3C E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CD3E 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CD3F                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CD3F 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CD40 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CD42 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CD43                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CD43 ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CD47 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CD4A E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CD4C 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CD4D CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CD50 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CD51 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CD52 22 A8 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CD55              ; ..................................
  38++CD55 2A B0 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CD58 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CD59 E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CD5B 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CD5C                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CD5C 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CD5D E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CD5F 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CD60                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CD60 ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CD64 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CD67 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CD69 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CD6A CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CD6D B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CD6E 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CD6F CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CD71 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CD73 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CD75 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CD77 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CD78              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CD78 FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CD7A DA 89 CD    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CD7D              NoClampZto4:
  61++CD7D 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CD80 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CD81 32 E9 7E             ld      (varT),a
  64++CD84 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CD85 32 CC 7E             ld      (varU),a
  66++CD88 C9           		ret
  67++CD89              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CD89 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CD8C 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CD8F 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CD90 32 E9 7E             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CD93 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CD94 32 CC 7E             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CD97 C9           		ret
  75++CD98
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 737+ CD98                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CD98              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CD98 ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CD9C 2A A6 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CD9F ED 5B A8 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CDA3              SetABSbc:
   6++CDA3 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CDA4 DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CDA6 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CDA8 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CDA9              SetABShl:
  11++CDA9 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CDAA DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CDAC E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CDAE 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CDAF              SetABSde:
  16++CDAF 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CDB0 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CDB2 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CDB4 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CDB5              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CDB5 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CDB6 B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CDB7 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CDB8 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CDBA                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CDBA CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CDBC CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CDBE                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CDBE CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CDC0 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CDC2              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CDC2 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CDC4 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CDC6 C3 B5 CD         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CDC9              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CDC9 DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CDCB E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CDCD B0           	or			b
  33++CDCE 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CDCF              SignforHL:
  35++CDCF DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CDD1 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CDD3 B4           	or			h
  38++CDD4 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CDD5              SignforDE:
  40++CDD5 FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CDD7 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CDD9 B2           	or			d
  43++CDDA 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CDDB              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CDDB ED 43 AA C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CDDF 22 A6 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CDE2 ED 53 A8 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CDE6 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CDE7 32 CC 7E     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CDEA 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CDEB 32 E9 7E     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CDEE C9           	ret
  53++CDEF
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 740+ CDEF 21 D2 C0     SetFaceAVisible:        ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 741+ CDF2 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 742+ CDF4 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 743+ CDF6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 744+ CDF7 C9                                   ret
 745+ CDF8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 746+ CDF8 21 D2 C0     SetFaceAHidden:         ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 747+ CDFB ED 31                                add     hl,a
 748+ CDFD AF                                   xor     a
 749+ CDFE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 750+ CDFF C9                                   ret

 752+ CE00 3A 03 C4     SetAllFacesVisible:     ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+FaceCtX4Addr                                 ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 753+ CE03 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 754+ CE05 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 755+ CE07 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 756+ CE08 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 757+ CE0B 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 758+ CE0D              SetAllFacesVisibleLoop:
 759+ CE0D 77           EE30:                   ld      (hl),a
 760+ CE0E 23                                   inc     hl
 761+ CE0F 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesVisibleLoop
 762+ CE11 C9                                   ret
 763+ CE12              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 764+ CE12 3A 03 C4     SetAllFacesHidden:      ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+ShipHullFacesCount                           ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 765+ CE15 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 766+ CE17 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 767+ CE19 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 768+ CE1A 06 10                                ld      b,16
 769+ CE1C 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 770+ CE1F 3E 00                                ld      a,$00
 771+ CE21 77           SetAllFacesHiddenLoop:  ld      (hl),a
 772+ CE22 23                                   inc     hl
 773+ CE23 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesHiddenLoop
 774+ CE25 C9                                   ret

 779+ CE26              ;;;; if ztemp hi <> 0                                   ::Scale Object Distance
 780+ CE26              ;;;;  Loop                                              ::LL90

 782+ CE26              ;;;;     divide X, Y & ZtempHiLo by 2

 788+ CE26                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CE26              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CE26 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CE27 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CE29 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CE2B 3A CD 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CE2E 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CE2F              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CE2F              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CE2F 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CE32 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CE33 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CE35 CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CE37 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CE38 ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CE3A ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CE3C 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CE3E 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CE3F 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CE40 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CE42 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CE43 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CE46 C9                                   ret
  23++CE47
  24++CE47 FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CE49                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CE49 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CE4B CD 26 CE                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CE4E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CE50                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CE50 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CE52 B1                                   or      c
  30++CE53 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CE56 C9                                   ret
  32++CE57
  33++CE57              ; Tested OK
  34++CE57              ;LL21
  35++CE57              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CE57                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CE57 ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CE57 ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CE57 ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CE57 ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CE57 ~                            dec     hl
  42++CE57 ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CE57 ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CE57 ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CE57 ~                            push	hl
  46++CE57 ~                            push	bc
  47++CE57 ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CE57 ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CE57 ~                            pop		bc
  50++CE57 ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CE57 ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CE57 ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CE57 ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CE57 ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CE57 ~                            ret
  56++CE57                      ELSE
  57++CE57 21 72 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CE5A 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CE5C 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CE5D 32 CD 7E                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CE60 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CE62 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CE63 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CE64 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CE65                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CE65 CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CE67 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CE69 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CE6A E5                           push	hl
  68++CE6B C5                           push	bc
  69++CE6C CD 26 CE                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CE6F                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CE6F 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CE70 C1                           pop		bc
  73++CE71 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CE72 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CE73 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CE74 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CE76 C9                           ret
  78++CE77                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm

  21++CE77
  22++CE77              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CE77              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CE77              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CE77              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CE77              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CE77              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CE77              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CE77              ; OUTPUT
  30++CE77              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CE77              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CE77              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CE77              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CE77 2A 61 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CE7A ED 5B 67 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CE7E ED 4B 6D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CE82 22 79 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CE85 ED 53 7B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CE89 ED 43 7D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CE8D 2A 63 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CE90 ED 5B 69 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CE94 ED 4B 6F C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CE98 22 81 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CE9B ED 53 83 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CE9F ED 43 85 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CEA3 2A 65 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CEA6 ED 5B 6B C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CEAA ED 4B 71 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CEAE 22 89 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CEB1 ED 53 8B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CEB5 ED 43 8D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CEB9 C9                   ret
  53++CEBA
  54++CEBA
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 799+ CEBA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 800+ CEBA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 801+ CEBA              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 802+ CEBA              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 803+ CEBA              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 804+ CEBA              ; Returns
 805+ CEBA              ;
 806+ CEBA              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 807+ CEBA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 808+ CEBA              ;
 809+ CEBA              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 810+ CEBA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 811+ CEBA              ;
 812+ CEBA              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 813+ CEBA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 814+ CEBA              ; TESTEDOK
 815+ CEBA              XX12DotOneRow:
 816+ CEBA              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 816+ CEBA 3A A6 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 816+ CEBD 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 816+ CEBE 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 816+ CEBF 57          >                        ld      d,a
 816+ CEC0 ED 30       >                        mul
 816+ CEC2 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 816+ CEC3 32 E9 7E    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 817+ CEC6 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 818+ CEC7              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 818+ CEC7 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 818+ CECA AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 819+ CECB 32 CF 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 820+ CECE 23                                   inc     hl
 821+ CECF              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 821+ CECF 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 821+ CED2 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 821+ CED3 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 821+ CED4 57          >                        ld      d,a
 821+ CED5 ED 30       >                        mul
 821+ CED7 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 821+ CED8 32 CD 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 822+ CEDB                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 822+ CEDB 3A E9 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 822+ CEDE 32 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 823+ CEE1 23                                   inc     hl
 824+ CEE2                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 824+ CEE2 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 824+ CEE5 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 825+ CEE6              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 826+ CEE6 E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 827+ CEE7 CD 8A 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 828+ CEEA E1                                   pop     hl
 829+ CEEB 32 E9 7E                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 830+ CEEE 23                                   inc     hl
 831+ CEEF              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 831+ CEEF 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 831+ CEF2 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 831+ CEF3 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 831+ CEF4 57          >                        ld      d,a
 831+ CEF5 ED 30       >                        mul
 831+ CEF7 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 831+ CEF8 32 CD 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 832+ CEFB                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 832+ CEFB 3A E9 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 832+ CEFE 32 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 833+ CF01 23                                   inc     hl
 834+ CF02                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 834+ CF02 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 834+ CF05 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 835+ CF06              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 836+ CF06 CD 8A 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 837+ CF09              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 838+ CF09 C9                                   ret
 839+ CF0A
 840+ CF0A
 841+ CF0A                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 842+ CF0A
 843+ CF0A              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 844+ CF0A              ;TESTED OK
 845+ CF0A              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 846+ CF0A              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 847+ CF0A 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 848+ CF0D 21 61 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 849+ CF10 CD BA CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 850+ CF13 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 851+ CF16 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 852+ CF19 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 853+ CF1C 21 67 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 854+ CF1F CD BA CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 855+ CF22 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 856+ CF25 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 857+ CF28 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 858+ CF2B 21 6D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 859+ CF2E CD BA CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 860+ CF31 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 861+ CF34 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 862+ CF37 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 863+ CF3A C9                                   ret
 864+ CF3B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 865+ CF3B                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++CF3B              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
   2++CF3B              CopyResultToDrawCam:
   3++CF3B                      ldCopyByte XX12         ,XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++CF3B 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12)
   3++CF3E 32 9A C0    >                        ld       (XX18),a
   4++CF41                      ldCopyByte XX12+1       ,XX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++CF41 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+1)
   4++CF44 32 9C C0    >                        ld       (XX18+2),a
   5++CF47                      ldCopyByte XX12+2       ,XX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++CF47 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)

   6++CF4D                      ldCopyByte XX12+3       ,XX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++CF4D 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+3)
   6++CF50 32 9F C0    >                        ld       (XX18+5),a
   7++CF53                      ldCopyByte XX12+4       ,XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++CF53 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   7++CF56 32 A0 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+6),a
   8++CF59                      ldCopyByte XX12+5       ,XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++CF59 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+5)
   8++CF5C 32 A2 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+8),a
   9++CF5F C9                   ret

  63++CFFB 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;

 111++D053 C9                   ret

# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX18ScaledToXX15.asm
 869+ D054                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D054              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D054              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D054                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D054 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D057 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D05A                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D05A 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D05D 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D060                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D060 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D063 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D066 C9                   ret
   7++D067
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 870+ D067              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 871+ D067                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D067              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D067              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D067              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D067              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D067              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D067              ;;; R = T
   7++D067              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D067              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D067              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D067              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D067              ;;; R = T
  12++D067              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D067
  14++D067
  15++D067
  16++D067
  17++D067
  18++D067              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D067 ~            						mul
  20++D067 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D067              						ENDM
  22++D067              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D067 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D06A                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D06A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D06B CA 88 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D06E 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D06F 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D072 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D073                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D073 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D074 CA 88 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D077 ED 30        		mul
  30++D079 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D07A 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D07D 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D080 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D081 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D083 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D085 C3 8C D0             jp          dotmuly
  37++D088              dotxskipzero:
  38++D088 AF                   xor         a
  39++D089 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D08A FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D08C              dotmuly:
  42++D08C              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D08C 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D08F                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D08F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D090 CA AF D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D093 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D094 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D097                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D097 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D098 CA AF D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D09B 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D09C ED 30                mul
  50++D09E 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D09F DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D0A1 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D0A4 21 A9 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D0A7 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D0A8 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D0AA DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D0AC C3 B3 D0             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D0AF              dotyskipzero:
  59++D0AF AF                   xor         a
  60++D0B0 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D0B1 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D0B3              dotaddxy:
  63++D0B3              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D0B3 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D0B5 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D0B6 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D0B8 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D0B9 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D0BB 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D0BC CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D0BF 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D0C0 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D0C3                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D0C3 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D0C4 CA E9 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D0C7 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D0C8 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D0CB                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D0CB A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D0CC CA E9 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D0CF 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D0D0 ED 30                mul
  79++D0D2 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D0D3 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D0D6 21 B1 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D0D9 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D0DA E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D0DC 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D0DD E1                   pop         hl
  86++D0DE 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D0DF 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D0E1 CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D0E4 32 CF 7E             ld          (varS),a
  90++D0E7 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D0E8 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D0E9              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D0E9 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D0EA 32 CF 7E             ld          (varS),a
  95++D0ED 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D0EE C9                   ret
  97++D0EF              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D0EF              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D0EF              ;;;;		mul
 104++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D0EF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D0EF              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D0EF              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D0EF              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D0EF              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D0EF              ;;;;       mul
 117++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D0EF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D0EF              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D0EF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D0EF              ;;;;       mul
 132++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D0EF              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D0EF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D0EF              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D0EF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D0EF              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D0EF
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 872+ D0EF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 873+ D0EF              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 874+ D0EF              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 875+ D0EF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 876+ D0EF                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D0EF              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D0EF              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D0EF 3A 09 C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D0F2 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D0F3              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D0F3 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D0F6 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D0F7                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D0F7 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D0F8 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D0F9              LL90Loop:
  10++D0F9              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D0F9 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D0FA                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D0FA 2A 9D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D0FD CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D0FF CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D101 22 9D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D104                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D104 2A 9A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D107 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D109 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D10B 22 9A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D10E                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D10E 2A A0 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D111 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D113 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D115 22 A0 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D118 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D119                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D119 A7          >                        and     a
  16++D11A C2 F9 D0    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D11D C9                   ret
  18++D11E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 877+ D11E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 879+ D11E              ; Backface cull
 880+ D11E              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 881+ D11E              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 882+ D11E              ;
 883+ D11E                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D11E 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D11F 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D120 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D122 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D125 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D126 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D128 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D129 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D12B 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D12E 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D12F CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D131 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D133 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D136 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D137 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D138 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D13B 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D13C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;

  22++D142 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D145 C9                                   ret

 884+ D146                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D146 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D147 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D148 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D14A 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D14D 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D14E CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D150 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D151 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D153 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D156 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D157 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D159 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D15B 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D15E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D15F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D160 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D163 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D164 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;

# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 885+ D16E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 886+ D16E              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 887+ D16E              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 888+ D16E              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 889+ D16E              ; return if no faces
 890+ D16E              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 891+ D16E              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 892+ D16E              ; While Z hi <> 0
 893+ D16E              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 894+ D16E              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 895+ D16E              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 896+ D16E              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 897+ D16E              ; Loop
 898+ D16E              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 899+ D16E              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 900+ D16E              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 901+ D16E              ; For each face
 902+ D16E              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 903+ D16E              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 904+ D16E              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 905+ D16E              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 906+ D16E              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 907+ D16E              ;        else
 908+ D16E              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 909+ D16E              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 910+ D16E              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 911+ D16E              ;           While X >= 0
 912+ D16E              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 913+ D16E              ;              if  x >= 0
 914+ D16E              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 915+ D16E              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 916+ D16E              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 917+ D16E              ;           loop
 918+ D16E              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 919+ D16E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 920+ D16E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 921+ D16E              ;               X = 1
 922+ D16E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 923+ D16E              ;           else
 924+ D16E              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 925+ D16E              ;           endif
 926+ D16E              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 927+ D16E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 928+ D16E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 929+ D16E              ;               X = 1
 930+ D16E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 931+ D16E              ;           else
 932+ D16E              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 933+ D16E              ;           endif
 934+ D16E              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 935+ D16E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 936+ D16E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 937+ D16E              ;               X = 1
 938+ D16E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 939+ D16E              ;           else
 940+ D16E              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 941+ D16E              ;           endif
 942+ D16E              ;        endif
 943+ D16E              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 944+ D16E              ;        if dot product < 0
 945+ D16E              ;           set face visible
 946+ D16E              ;        else
 947+ D16E              ;           set face invisible
 948+ D16E              ;        end if
 949+ D16E              ;     else
 950+ D16E              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 951+ D16E              ;     end if
 952+ D16E              ; Next Face
 953+ D16E
 954+ D16E              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 955+ D16E
 956+ D16E              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 957+ D16E              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 958+ D16E              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 959+ D16E              ;
 960+ D16E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 961+ D16E              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 962+ D16E              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 963+ D16E              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 964+ D16E              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 965+ D16E                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D16E              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D16E                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D16E               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D16E 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D16F              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D16F              ; EE29:
   7++D16F
   8++D16F              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D16F              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D16F              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D16F              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D16F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D16F              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D16F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D16F              ;
  16++D16F              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D16F              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D16F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D16F              ;
  22++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D16F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D16F              ;
  26++D16F              ; so
  27++D16F              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D16F              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D16F              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D16F              ;
  31++D16F              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D16F              ;
  33++D16F              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D16F              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D16F              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D16F              ;
  37++D16F
  38++D16F
  39++D16F
  40++D16F 3A A1 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D172                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D172 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D173 CA 9F D1    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++D176 2A 9A C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++D179 ED 5B 9D C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++D17D ED 4B A0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++D181 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++D183                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D183 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D185 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++D187                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++D187 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++D189 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++D18B                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++D18B CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++D18D CB 19       >			   rr  c
  49++D18F 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  50++D190                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++D190 A7          >                        and     a
  50++D191 C2 81 D1    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  51++D194 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  52++D197 ED 53 9D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  53++D19B ED 43 A0 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  54++D19F FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  55++D1A1 32 D4 7E                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  56++D1A4 C9                                   ret
  57++D1A5
  58++D1A5 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++D1A8 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
  60++D1AA 20 31                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
  61++D1AC 2A 26 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
  62++D1AF 7C                                   ld      a,h
  63++D1B0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
  63++D1B0 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
  63++D1B2 D2 DD D1    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
  64++D1B5 ED 5B 20 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
  65++D1B9 CD 73 98                             call    compare16HLDE
  66++D1BC 38 1F                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  67++D1BE ED 5B 23 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
  68++D1C2 CD 73 98                             call    compare16HLDE
  69++D1C5 38 16                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  70++D1C7                                      IFDEF   CHECKDOTSHIPDATA
  71++D1C7 3A 04 C4     .CheckDotV2:                ld      a,(DotAddr)
