  72++D1CA                                          JumpIfAGTENusng h, .DrawFull
  72++D1CA BC          >                        cp     h
  72++D1CB D2 D1 D1    >                        jp		nc,.DrawFull
  73++D1CE C3 E3 D1                                 jp      .ShipIsADot
  74++D1D1 3A 54 C0     .DrawFull:                  ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  75++D1D4 F6 40                                    or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  76++D1D6 E6 F7                                    and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  77++D1D8 32 54 C0                                 ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  78++D1DB                                          ClearCarryFlag
  78++D1DB B7          >                        or a
  79++D1DC C9                                       ret
  80++D1DD                                      ELSE
  81++D1DD ~            .CalculateXX4:              ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
  82++D1DD ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  83++D1DD ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  84++D1DD ~                                        ld      a,h
  85++D1DD ~                                        srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
  86++D1DD ~            .DrawAsDotCheck:            JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
  87++D1DD ~                                        ; Check visbility distance
  88++D1DD ~            .SetXX4Dist:                ;break
  89++D1DD ~                                        ld      a,l
  90++D1DD ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  91++D1DD ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  92++D1DD ~                                        srl     a
  93++D1DD ~                                        srl     a
  94++D1DD ~                                        ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
  95++D1DD ~                                        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  96++D1DD ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  97++D1DD ~                                        and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  98++D1DD ~                                        ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  99++D1DD ~                                        ClearCarryFlag
 100++D1DD ~                                        ret
 101++D1DD                                      ENDIF
 102++D1DD              .ShipNoDraw:            ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 102++D1DD 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 102++D1E0 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 103++D1E2 C9                                   ret
 104++D1E3 3A 54 C0     .ShipIsADot:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 105++D1E6                                      IFDEF DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE
 106++D1E6 ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible   ;
 107++D1E6                                      ELSE
 108++D1E6 F6 48                                    or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot   ;
 109++D1E8                                      ENDIF
 110++D1E8 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 111++D1EB C9                                   ret
 112++D1EC
 113++D1EC                                                  DISPLAY "TODO:remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done"
 114++D1EC              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 114++D1EC 3A 03 C4    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 114++D1EF A7          >                        and a
 114++D1F0 C8          >                        ret    z
 115++D1F1                                     ; break
 116++D1F1 CD F2 CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 117++D1F4 CD 66 7A                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 118++D1F7 CD AA CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 119++D1FA                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 120++D1FA 3A 09 C4     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 121++D1FD FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 122++D1FF              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 123++D1FF CD 6F D1                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 124++D202 CD CE CF                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 125++D205 CD F9 79     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 126++D208 CD 3B CF                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 127++D20B 21 C9 C5     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 128++D20E 22 D3 7D                             ld      (varV),hl
 129++D211 3A 03 C4                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 130++D214 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 131++D216 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 132++D218 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 133++D219 AF                                   xor     a
 134++D21A 32 6E D1                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 135++D21D E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 136++D21E C5                                   push    bc
 137++D21F 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 138++D220 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 139++D222 E5                                   push    hl
 140++D223 21 52 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 141++D226 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 142++D227 E1                                   pop     hl
 143++D228                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW
 144++D228 ~                                        jp      .FaceVisible
 145++D228                                      ELSE
 146++D228 DA 6D D3                                 jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 147++D22B                                      ENDIF
 148++D22B              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 149++D22B CD 46 D1     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 150++D22E 3A D4 7E                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 151++D231 47                                   ld      b,a
 152++D232                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 152++D232 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 152++D234 DA 6F D2    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 153++D237 CD 85 CF     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 154++D23A C3 FE D2                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 155++D23D 3A 9A C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 156++D240 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 157++D242 32 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 158++D245 3A A0 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 159++D248 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 160++D24A 32 A0 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 161++D24D 3A 9D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 162++D250 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 163++D252 32 9D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 164++D255 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 165++D257                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 165++D257 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 165++D25A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 165++D25C 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 166++D25F                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 166++D25F 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 166++D262 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 166++D264 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 167++D267                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 167++D267 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 167++D26A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 167++D26C 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 168++D26F              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 169++D26F              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 170++D26F CD 60 CF                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 171++D272 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 172++D273 FA 92 D2                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 173++D276              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 173++D276 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 173++D279 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 173++D27B 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 174++D27E                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 174++D27E 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 174++D281 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 174++D283 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 175++D286                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 175++D286 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 175++D289 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 175++D28B 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 176++D28E 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 177++D28F F2 76 D2                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 178++D292              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 179++D292              ; Add normal to XX15
 180++D292              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 181++D292              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 182++D292              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 183++D292              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 184++D292              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 184++D292 3A AA C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 184++D295 32 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 185++D298                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 185++D298 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 185++D29B 32 CF 7E    >                        ld       (varS),a
 186++D29E                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 186++D29E 3A A0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 186++D2A1 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 187++D2A4 3A A2 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 188++D2A7 CD 8A 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 189++D2AA DA 3D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 190++D2AD 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 191++D2B0                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 191++D2B0 3A CF 7E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 191++D2B3 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 192++D2B6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 192++D2B6 3A A6 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 192++D2B9 32 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 193++D2BC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 193++D2BC 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 193++D2BF 32 CF 7E    >                        ld       (varS),a
 194++D2C2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 194++D2C2 3A 9A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 194++D2C5 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 195++D2C8 3A 9C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 196++D2CB CD 8A 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 197++D2CE DA 3D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 198++D2D1 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 199++D2D4                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 199++D2D4 3A CF 7E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 199++D2D7 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 200++D2DA                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 200++D2DA 3A A8 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 200++D2DD 32 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 201++D2E0                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 201++D2E0 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 201++D2E3 32 CF 7E    >                        ld       (varS),a
 202++D2E6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 202++D2E6 3A 9D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 202++D2E9 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 203++D2EC 3A 9F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 204++D2EF CD 8A 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 205++D2F2 DA 3D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 206++D2F5 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 207++D2F8                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 207++D2F8 3A CF 7E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 207++D2FB 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 208++D2FE              ; calculate dot product LL89
 209++D2FE              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 209++D2FE 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 209++D301 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D304 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 211++D307 CD F5 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 212++D30A 32 E9 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D30D 3A AD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 214++D310 21 A7 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 215++D313 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 216++D314 32 CF 7E                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 217++D317                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 217++D317 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 217++D31A 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 218++D31D 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 219++D320 CD F5 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 220++D323 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 221++D326                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 221++D326 3A E9 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 221++D329 32 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 222++D32C 3A AF C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 223++D32F 21 A9 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 224++D332 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 225++D333 CD 8A 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 226++D336 32 E9 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 227++D339                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 227++D339 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 227++D33C 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 228++D33F 3A AA C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 229++D342 CD F5 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 230++D345 32 CD 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 231++D348                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 231++D348 3A E9 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 231++D34B 32 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 232++D34E 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 233++D351 21 B1 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 234++D354 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 235++D355 CD 8A 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 236++D358 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 237++D35A 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 238++D35C 3A CF 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 239++D35F ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 240++D362 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 241++D364 3A 6E D1     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 242++D367 CD F8 CD                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 243++D36A C3 73 D3                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 244++D36D 3A 6E D1     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 245++D370 CD EF CD                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 246++D373 21 6E D1     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 247++D376 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 248++D377 C1                                   pop         bc
 249++D378 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 250++D379 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 251++D37B ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 252++D37D 22 D3 7D                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 253++D380 05                                   dec         b
 254++D381 C2 1D D2                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 255++D384 C9                                   ret
 256++D385
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
 966+ D385              ;--LL52 to LL55-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 967+ D385
 968+ D385              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
 969+ D385                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 969+ D385 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
 969+ D388 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
 970+ D38B ED 4B AC C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 971+ D38F A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 972+ D390 FA A6 D3             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 973+ D393              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 974+ D393              NodeXPositiveX:
 975+ D393 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 976+ D394 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 977+ D396 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 978+ D399 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 979+ D39B 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 980+ D39C 22 A6 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 981+ D39F AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 982+ D3A0 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 983+ D3A3 C3 C2 D3             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
 984+ D3A6              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 985+ D3A6              NodeNegativeX:
 986+ D3A6              LL52X:                                                 ;
 987+ D3A6 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord
 988+ D3A9 ED 4B AC C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; XX12
 989+ D3AD 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 990+ D3AF ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 991+ D3B1 F2 BF D3             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 992+ D3B4              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 993+ D3B4              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 994+ D3B4 CD 94 92             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 995+ D3B7 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 996+ D3BA EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 997+ D3BC 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 998+ D3BF              SetAndMopX:
 999+ D3BF 22 20 C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1000+ D3C2              FinishedThisNodeX:
1001+ D3C2
1002+ D3C2              LL53:
1003+ D3C2
1004+ D3C2                      ldCopyByte  UBnKysgn,UbnkYPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
1004+ D3C2 3A 25 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKysgn)
1004+ D3C5 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UbnkYPointSign),a
1005+ D3C8 ED 4B AE C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1006+ D3CC A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
1007+ D3CD FA E3 D3             jp          m,NodeNegativeY                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
1008+ D3D0              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1009+ D3D0              NodeXPositiveY:
1010+ D3D0 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1011+ D3D1 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1012+ D3D3 2A 23 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
1013+ D3D6 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
1014+ D3D8 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1015+ D3D9 22 A9 C0             ld          (UbnkYPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1016+ D3DC AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1017+ D3DD 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1018+ D3E0 C3 FF D3             jp          FinishedThisNodeY
1019+ D3E3              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1020+ D3E3              NodeNegativeY:
1021+ D3E3              LL52Y:                                                 ;
1022+ D3E3 2A 23 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; Coord
1023+ D3E6 ED 4B AE C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; XX12
1024+ D3EA 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1025+ D3EC ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1026+ D3EE F2 FC D3             jp          p,SetAndMopY                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1027+ D3F1              NodeXNegSignChangeY:
1028+ D3F1              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1029+ D3F1 CD 94 92             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1030+ D3F4 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1031+ D3F7 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1032+ D3F9 32 AB C0             ld          (UbnkYPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1033+ D3FC              SetAndMopY:
1034+ D3FC 22 23 C0             ld          (UBnKylo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1035+ D3FF              FinishedThisNodeY:
1036+ D3FF
1037+ D3FF                  DISPLAY "Tracing 5", $
1038+ D3FF
1039+ D3FF              TransposeZ:
1040+ D3FF              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;
1041+ D3FF 3A B1 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zSign)                   ; XX12+5    \ rotated znode hi                                              ;;;
1042+ D402                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;
1042+ D402 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1042+ D404 C2 18 D4    >                        jp      nz,NegativeNodeZ
1043+ D407 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)                     ; XX12+4 \ rotated znode lo                                                 ;;;
1044+ D40A 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;
1045+ D40D ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; hl = INWKZ + XX12z                                                        ;;;
1046+ D40F 7D                   ld          a,l
1047+ D410 32 E9 7E             ld          (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
1048+ D413 7C                   ld          a,h
1049+ D414 32 CC 7E             ld          (varU),a                            ; now z = hl or U(hi).T(lo)                                                 ;;;
1050+ D417 C9                   ret                                             ; LL57  \ Node additions done, z = U.T                                      ;;;
1051+ D418              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
1052+ D418              NegativeNodeZ:
1053+ D418              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
1054+ D418 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
1055+ D41B ED 4B B0 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
1056+ D41F 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; upper byte will be garbage
1057+ D421                      ClearCarryFlag
1057+ D421 B7          >                        or a
1058+ D422 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1059+ D424 7D                   ld          a,l
1060+ D425 32 E9 7E             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
1061+ D428 7C                   ld          a,h
1062+ D429 32 CC 7E             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
1063+ D42C E2 39 D4             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
1064+ D42F              LL56Overflow:
1065+ D42F FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1066+ D431 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1067+ D433 3A E9 7E             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1068+ D436                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
1068+ D436 FE 04       >                        cp    4
1068+ D438 D0          >                        ret	 nc
1069+ D439              MakeNodeClose:
1070+ D439              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1071+ D439 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1072+ D43A 32 CC 7E             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1073+ D43D 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
1074+ D43F 32 E9 7E             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1075+ D442 C9                   ret
1076+ D443              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1077+ D443              ProcessVisibleNode:
1078+ D443              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1079+ D443 CD 0A CF             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
1080+ D446              LL52LL53LL54LL55
1081+ D446              TransposeNode:
1082+ D446 CD 85 D3             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
1083+ D449
1084+ D449              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
1085+ D449              NodeAdditionsDone:
1086+ D449              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1087+ D449              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1088+ D449 3A CC 7E             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1089+ D44C 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1090+ D44F B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1091+ D450 21 AA C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1092+ D453 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1093+ D454              AreXYZHiAllZero:
1094+ D454 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
1095+ D456              DivideXYZBy2:
1096+ D456                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1096+ D456 2A A6 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1096+ D459 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1096+ D45B CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1096+ D45D 22 A6 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1097+ D460                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1097+ D460 2A A9 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1097+ D463 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1097+ D465 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1097+ D467 22 A9 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1098+ D46A 3A CC 7E             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1099+ D46D 67                   ld          h,a
1100+ D46E 3A E9 7E             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1101+ D471 6F                   ld          l,a
1102+ D472                      ShiftHLRight1
1102+ D472 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1102+ D474 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1103+ D476 7C                   ld          a,h
1104+ D477 32 CC 7E             ld          (varU),a
1105+ D47A 7D                   ld          a,l
1106+ D47B 32 E9 7E             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1107+ D47E C3 49 D4             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1108+ D481              NodeScalingDone:
1109+ D481              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1110+ D481              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1111+ D481                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1111+ D481 3A E9 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1111+ D484 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1112+ D487 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1113+ D48A 21 CD 7E             ld          hl,varQ
1114+ D48D BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1115+ D48E                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1115+ D48E DA 97 D4    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1116+ D491 CD 01 9C             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1117+ D494 C3 9F D4             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1118+ D497              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1119+ D497              LL69:
1120+ D497              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1121+ D497              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1122+ D497              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1123+ D497 47                   ld      b,a
1124+ D498 CD 14 95             call    DIV16UNDOC
1125+ D49B 79                   ld      a,c
1126+ D49C 32 CE 7E             ld      (varR),a
1127+ D49F               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1128+ D49F              SkipSmallAngle:
1129+ D49F              ScaleX:
1130+ D49F              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1131+ D49F 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1132+ D4A2                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1132+ D4A2 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1132+ D4A4 C2 B7 D4    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1133+ D4A7              ; ......................................................
1134+ D4A7              PositiveXPoint:
1135+ D4A7 3A CE 7E             ld          a,(varR)
1136+ D4AA 6F                   ld          l,a
1137+ D4AB 3A CC 7E             ld          a,(varU)
1138+ D4AE 67                   ld          h,a
1139+ D4AF 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1140+ D4B1 ED 31                add         hl,a
1141+ D4B3 EB                   ex          de,hl
1142+ D4B4 C3 C7 D4             jp          StoreXPoint
1143+ D4B7              NegativeXPoint:
1144+ D4B7              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1145+ D4B7 3A CE 7E             ld          a,(varR)
1146+ D4BA 6F                   ld          l,a
1147+ D4BB 3A CC 7E             ld          a,(varU)
1148+ D4BE 67                   ld          h,a
1149+ D4BF 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1150+ D4C1 06 00                ld          b,0
1151+ D4C3                      ClearCarryFlag
1151+ D4C3 B7          >                        or a
1152+ D4C4 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1153+ D4C6 EB                   ex          de,hl
1154+ D4C7              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1155+ D4C7 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1156+ D4CA FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1157+ D4CD FD 23                inc         iy
1158+ D4CF FD 23                inc         iy
1159+ D4D1              ; ......................................................
1160+ D4D1              LL66:
1161+ D4D1              ProcessYPoint:
1162+ D4D1 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1163+ D4D2 32 CC 7E             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1164+ D4D5                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1164+ D4D5 3A E9 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1164+ D4D8 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1165+ D4DB 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1166+ D4DE 21 CD 7E             ld          hl,varQ
1167+ D4E1 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1168+ D4E2                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1168+ D4E2 DA EB D4    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1169+ D4E5              SmallYPoint:
1170+ D4E5 CD 01 9C             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1171+ D4E8 C3 EE D4             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1172+ D4EB              SmallYHop:
1173+ D4EB              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1174+ D4EB CD DE 9B             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1175+ D4EE              SkipYScale:
1176+ D4EE              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1177+ D4EE 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1178+ D4F1 CB 7F                bit         7,a
1179+ D4F3 C2 06 D5             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1180+ D4F6              PositiveYPoint:
1181+ D4F6 3A CE 7E             ld          a,(varR)
1182+ D4F9 6F                   ld          l,a
1183+ D4FA 3A CC 7E             ld          a,(varU)
1184+ D4FD 67                   ld          h,a
1185+ D4FE 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1186+ D500 ED 31                add         hl,a
1187+ D502 EB                   ex          de,hl
1188+ D503 C3 16 D5             jp          LL50
1189+ D506              NegativeYPoint:
1190+ D506              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1191+ D506 3A CE 7E             ld          a,(varR)
1192+ D509 6F                   ld          l,a
1193+ D50A 3A CC 7E             ld          a,(varU)
1194+ D50D 67                   ld          h,a
1195+ D50E 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1196+ D510 06 00                ld          b,0
1197+ D512                      ClearCarryFlag
1197+ D512 B7          >                        or a
1198+ D513 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1199+ D515 EB                   ex          de,hl
1200+ D516              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1201+ D516 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1202+ D519 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1203+ D51C FD 23                inc         iy
1204+ D51E FD 23                inc         iy
1205+ D520 C9                   ret
1206+ D521              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1207+ D521              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1208+ D521              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1209+ D521              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1210+ D521              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1211+ D521              CopyNodeToXX15:
1212+ D521                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1212+ D521 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1212+ D522 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1213+ D525 23                   inc         hl
1214+ D526                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1214+ D526 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1214+ D527 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1215+ D52A 23                   inc         hl
1216+ D52B                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1216+ D52B 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1216+ D52C 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1217+ D52F 23                   inc         hl
1218+ D530              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1219+ D530              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1220+ D530 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1221+ D531 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1222+ D532 47                   ld          b,a
1223+ D533 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1224+ D535 32 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1225+ D538 78                   ld          a,b
1226+ D539 E6 40                and         $40
1227+ D53B CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1228+ D53D 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1229+ D540 78                   ld          a,b
1230+ D541 E6 20                and         $20
1231+ D543 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1232+ D545 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1233+ D547 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1234+ D54A 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1235+ D54B E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1236+ D54D 32 E9 7E             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1237+ D550 C9                   ret
1238+ D551
1239+ D551              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1240+ D551              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1241+ D551              ;..............................................................................................................................
1242+ D551              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1243+ D551              LL48GetScale:
1244+ D551 3A BE 7D             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1245+ D554 5F                   ld          e,a
1246+ D555 CD 21 D5             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1247+ D558              LL48GetVertices:
1248+ D558              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1249+ D558                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1249+ D558 BB          >                        cp      e
1249+ D559 DA 96 D5    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1250+ D55C              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1251+ D55C                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1251+ D55C 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1251+ D55D 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1251+ D55E 32 CD 7D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1252+ D561 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1253+ D562 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1254+ D564 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1255+ D565                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1255+ D565 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1255+ D568 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1255+ D56A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1256+ D56B E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1257+ D56C                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1257+ D56C A7          >                        and     a
1257+ D56D C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1258+ D570              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1259+ D570 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1260+ D571 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1261+ D573 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1262+ D575                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1262+ D575 A7          >                        and     a
1262+ D576 C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1263+ D579              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1264+ D579                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1264+ D579 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1264+ D57A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1264+ D57B 32 CD 7D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1265+ D57E 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1266+ D57F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1267+ D581 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1268+ D582                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1268+ D582 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1268+ D585 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1268+ D587 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1269+ D588 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1270+ D589                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1270+ D589 A7          >                        and     a
1270+ D58A C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1271+ D58D              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1272+ D58D 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1273+ D58E ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1274+ D590 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1275+ D592                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1275+ D592 A7          >                        and     a
1275+ D593 C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1276+ D596              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1277+ D596 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1278+ D599 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1279+ D59B                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1280+ D59B C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1281+ D59C              NodeIsVisible:
1282+ D59C              LL49:
1283+ D59C CD 43 D4             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1284+ D59F C9                   ret
1285+ D5A0
1286+ D5A0                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
1287+ D5A0
1288+ D5A0              ProjectNodeToEye:
1289+ D5A0 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1290+ D5A4 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1291+ D5A5 32 CD 7E         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
1292+ D5A8 3A A6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
1293+ D5AB CD FD 94         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1294+ D5AE 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1295+ D5B1                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1295+ D5B1 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1295+ D5B3 C2 BE D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1296+ D5B6              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
1297+ D5B6 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
1298+ D5B8 26 00            ld          h,0
1299+ D5BA 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
1300+ D5BB C3 C5 D5         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1301+ D5BE              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1302+ D5BE 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1303+ D5C0 26 00            ld          h,0
1304+ D5C2                  ClearCarryFlag
1304+ D5C2 B7          >                        or a
1305+ D5C3 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1306+ D5C5              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1307+ D5C5 EB               ex          de,hl
1308+ D5C6 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1309+ D5C9 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1310+ D5CC              EyeProcessYPoint:
1311+ D5CC ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
1312+ D5D0 79               ld          a,c
1313+ D5D1 32 CD 7E         ld          (varQ),a
1314+ D5D4 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1315+ D5D7 CD FD 94         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1316+ D5DA 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1317+ D5DD                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1317+ D5DD CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1317+ D5DF C2 EA D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1318+ D5E2              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
1319+ D5E2 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1320+ D5E4                  ClearCarryFlag
1320+ D5E4 B7          >                        or a
1321+ D5E5 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1322+ D5E7 C3 EF D5         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1323+ D5EA              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1324+ D5EA 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1325+ D5EC 26 00            ld          h,0
1326+ D5EE 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1327+ D5EF              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1328+ D5EF EB               ex          de,hl
1329+ D5F0 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1330+ D5F3 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1331+ D5F6 C9               ret
1332+ D5F7
1333+ D5F7
1334+ D5F7
1335+ D5F7              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1336+ D5F7              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1337+ D5F7              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1338+ D5F7              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1339+ D5F7              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1340+ D5F7              ; which can be simplified as:
1341+ D5F7              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1342+ D5F7              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1343+ D5F7              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1344+ D5F7              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1345+ D5F7              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1346+ D5F7              ;      Roll calculations:
1347+ D5F7              ;
1348+ D5F7              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1349+ D5F7              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1350+ D5F7              ;      Pitch calculations:
1351+ D5F7              ;
1352+ D5F7              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1353+ D5F7              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1354+ D5F7
1355+ D5F7
1356+ D5F7              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1357+ D5F7                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D5F7
   2++D5F7              ; Full version
   3++D5F7              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D5F7              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D5F7              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D5F7              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D5F7
   8++D5F7
   9++D5F7              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  10++D5F7 ~                                    push    bc
  11++D5F7 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  12++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  13++D5F7 ~                                    ld      b,a
  14++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c
  15++D5F7 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  16++D5F7 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  17++D5F7 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  18++D5F7 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  19++D5F7 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  20++D5F7 ~                                    add     hl,de
  21++D5F7 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  22++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  23++D5F7 ~                                    pop     bc
  24++D5F7 ~                                    ret
  25++D5F7 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  26++D5F7 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  27++D5F7 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  28++D5F7 ~                                    or      a
  29++D5F7 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  30++D5F7 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  31++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  32++D5F7 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  33++D5F7 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  34++D5F7 ~                                    pop     bc
  35++D5F7 ~                                    ret
  36++D5F7 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  37++D5F7 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  38++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  39++D5F7 ~                                    pop     bc
  40++D5F7 ~                                    ret
  41++D5F7                                      ENDM
  42++D5F7
  43++D5F7
  44++D5F7              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  44++D5F7 C5          >                        push    bc
  44++D5F8 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  44++D5F9 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  44++D5FC 47          >                        ld      b,a
  44++D5FD 79          >                        ld      a,c
  44++D5FE A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  44++D5FF FA 10 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  44++D602             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  44++D602 ED 5B CE 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  44++D606 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D609 19          >                        add     hl,de
  44++D60A 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  44++D60D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  44++D60E C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D60F C9          >                        ret
  44++D610             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  44++D610 ED 5B CE 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  44++D614 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D617 B7          >                        or      a
  44++D618 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  44++D61A 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  44++D61C 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  44++D61D 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  44++D620 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  44++D622 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D623 C9          >                        ret
  44++D624             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  44++D624 AF          >                    xor a
  44++D625 95          >                    sub l
  44++D626 6F          >                    ld l,a
  44++D627 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  44++D628 94          >                    sub h
  44++D629 67          >                    ld h,a
  44++D62A 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  44++D62D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  44++D62E C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D62F C9          >                        ret
  45++D630
  46++D630              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  46++D630 C5          >                        push    bc
  46++D631 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  46++D632 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  46++D635 47          >                        ld      b,a
  46++D636 79          >                        ld      a,c
  46++D637 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  46++D638 FA 49 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  46++D63B             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  46++D63B ED 5B CE 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  46++D63F 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D642 19          >                        add     hl,de
  46++D643 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  46++D646 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  46++D647 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D648 C9          >                        ret
  46++D649             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  46++D649 ED 5B CE 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  46++D64D 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D650 B7          >                        or      a
  46++D651 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  46++D653 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D655 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  46++D656 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  46++D659 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  46++D65B C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D65C C9          >                        ret
  46++D65D             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  46++D65D AF          >                    xor a
  46++D65E 95          >                    sub l
  46++D65F 6F          >                    ld l,a
  46++D660 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  46++D661 94          >                    sub h
  46++D662 67          >                    ld h,a
  46++D663 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  46++D666 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  46++D667 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D668 C9          >                        ret
  47++D669
  48++D669              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  48++D669 C5          >                        push    bc
  48++D66A 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  48++D66B 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  48++D66E 47          >                        ld      b,a
  48++D66F 79          >                        ld      a,c
  48++D670 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  48++D671 FA 82 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  48++D674             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  48++D674 ED 5B CE 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  48++D678 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D67B 19          >                        add     hl,de
  48++D67C 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  48++D67F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  48++D680 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D681 C9          >                        ret
  48++D682             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  48++D682 ED 5B CE 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  48++D686 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D689 B7          >                        or      a
  48++D68A ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  48++D68C 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  48++D68E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  48++D68F 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D692 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  48++D694 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D695 C9          >                        ret
  48++D696             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  48++D696 AF          >                    xor a
  48++D697 95          >                    sub l
  48++D698 6F          >                    ld l,a
  48++D699 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  48++D69A 94          >                    sub h
  48++D69B 67          >                    ld h,a
  48++D69C 22 CE 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  48++D69F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  48++D6A0 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D6A1 C9          >                        ret
  49++D6A2
  50++D6A2              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  51++D6A2 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  52++D6A5              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  53++D6A5              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  54++D6A5              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  55++D6A5
  56++D6A5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  57++D6A5              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  58++D6A5 3A E7 7D     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  59++D6A8 21 DB 7D                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  60++D6AB B6                                   or      (hl)
  61++D6AC CA 78 D8                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  62++D6AF              ; If the xsgn,ysng or zsng are not 0 or $80 then we use 24 bit routines
  63++D6AF              ; else we can just continue to use 16 bit
  64++D6AF 3A 22 C0     .CheckFor24Bit:         ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  65++D6B2 21 25 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKysgn
  66++D6B5 B6                                   or      (hl)
  67++D6B6 21 28 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKzsgn
  68++D6B9 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69++D6BA E6 7F                                and     $7F
  70++D6BC C2 A8 D8                             jp      nz,ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
  71++D6BF                                      ;break
  72++D6BF              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  73++D6BF 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  74++D6C0 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  75++D6C3 CD 80 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  76++D6C6 32 CF 7D                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  77++D6C9 22 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  78++D6CC              ; A = Flip sign
  79++D6CC 3A E8 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  80++D6CF 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  81++D6D2 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  82++D6D3              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  83++D6D3 CD 30 D6                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  84++D6D6              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  85++D6D6 32 A4 D6                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  86++D6D9 22 A2 D6                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  87++D6DC              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  88++D6DC 3A DB 7D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  89++D6DF 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90++D6E0 CD 80 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  91++D6E3 32 CF 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  92++D6E6 22 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),hl
  93++D6E9              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
  94++D6E9 3A A4 D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
  95++D6EC 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D6ED 3A DC 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)
  97++D6F0 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
  98++D6F1              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
  99++D6F1 CD 69 D6                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 100++D6F4 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 101++D6F7 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 102++D6FA              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 103++D6FA 3A DB 7D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 104++D6FD 5F                                   ld      e,a
 105++D6FE CD 80 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 106++D701 32 CF 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 107++D704 22 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 108++D707              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
