 109++D707 3A A4 D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 110++D70A 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 111++D70D 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 112++D70E 3A DC 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 113++D711 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 114++D712 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 115++D713 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 116++D716 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 117++D717 F2 26 D7                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 118++D71A 2A CE 7D                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 119++D71D ED 5B A2 D6                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 120++D721 B7                                   or      a
 121++D722 19                                   add     hl,de
 122++D723 C3 40 D7                             jp      .MV44
 123++D726 2A A2 D6     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 124++D729 ED 5B CE 7D                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 125++D72D B7                                   or      a
 126++D72E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 127++D730 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 128++D732                                      NegHL
 128++D732 AF          >                    xor a
 128++D733 95          >                    sub l
 128++D734 6F          >                    ld l,a
 128++D735 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 128++D736 94          >                    sub h
 128++D737 67          >                    ld h,a
 129++D738 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and Univs are sign + 23 bit xpos
 130++D73B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 131++D73D 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 132++D740              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 133++D740 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 134++D743 3A E7 7D                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 135++D746 5F                                   ld      e,a
 136++D747 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 137++D74A CD 80 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 138++D74D 32 CF 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 139++D750 22 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),hl
 140++D753 3A E9 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 141++D756 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++D757 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 143++D75A AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 144++D75B CD F7 D5                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 145++D75E 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 146++D761 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 147++D764                                      ;break
 148++D764                                      ; if its not a Univ then apply to local orientation
 149++D764                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY   ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 149++D764             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 149++D764 3A E6 7D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 149++D767 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 149++D76A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 149++D76A 2A 37 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 149++D76D 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 149++D770             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 149++D770 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 149++D773 32 CD 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 149++D776 3A 36 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 149++D779 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 149++D77B CD 05 90    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 149++D77E ED 53 37 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 149++D782             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 149++D782 2A 35 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 149++D785 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 149++D788 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 149++D78B CD 05 90    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 149++D78E ED 53 35 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 150++D792                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY   ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 150++D792             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 150++D792 3A E6 7D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 150++D795 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 150++D798             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 150++D798 2A 2B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 150++D79B 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 150++D79E             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 150++D79E 3A 29 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 150++D7A1 32 CD 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 150++D7A4 3A 2A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 150++D7A7 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 150++D7A9 CD 05 90    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 150++D7AC ED 53 2B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 150++D7B0             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 150++D7B0 2A 29 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 150++D7B3 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 150++D7B6 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 150++D7B9 CD 05 90    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 150++D7BC ED 53 29 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 151++D7C0                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY   ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 151++D7C0             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 151++D7C0 3A E6 7D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 151++D7C3 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 151++D7C6             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 151++D7C6 2A 31 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 151++D7C9 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 151++D7CC             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 151++D7CC 3A 2F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 151++D7CF 32 CD 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 151++D7D2 3A 30 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 151++D7D5 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 151++D7D7 CD 05 90    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 151++D7DA ED 53 31 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 151++D7DE             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 151++D7DE 2A 2F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 151++D7E1 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 151++D7E4 3A 32 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 151++D7E7 CD 05 90    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 151++D7EA ED 53 2F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 152++D7EE                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY    ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:
 152++D7EE             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 152++D7EE 3A D9 7D    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 152++D7F1 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 152++D7F4             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 152++D7F4 2A 37 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 152++D7F7 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 152++D7FA             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 152++D7FA 3A 39 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 152++D7FD 32 CD 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 152++D800 3A 3A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 152++D803 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 152++D805 CD 05 90    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 152++D808 ED 53 37 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 152++D80C             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 152++D80C 2A 39 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 152++D80F 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 152++D812 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 152++D815 CD 05 90    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 152++D818 ED 53 39 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 153++D81C                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY    ; ApplyMyPitchToSidev:
 153++D81C             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 153++D81C 3A D9 7D    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 153++D81F 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 153++D822             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 153++D822 2A 2B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 153++D825 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 153++D828             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 153++D828 3A 2D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 153++D82B 32 CD 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 153++D82E 3A 2E C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 153++D831 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 153++D833 CD 05 90    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 153++D836 ED 53 2B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 153++D83A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 153++D83A 2A 2D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 153++D83D 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 153++D840 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 153++D843 CD 05 90    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 153++D846 ED 53 2D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 154++D84A                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY    ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 154++D84A             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 154++D84A 3A D9 7D    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 154++D84D 32 CD 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 154++D850             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 154++D850 2A 31 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 154++D853 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 154++D856             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 154++D856 3A 33 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 154++D859 32 CD 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 154++D85C 3A 34 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 154++D85F EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 154++D861 CD 05 90    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 154++D864 ED 53 31 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 154++D868             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 154++D868 2A 33 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 154++D86B 22 CE 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 154++D86E 3A 32 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 154++D871 CD 05 90    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 154++D874 ED 53 33 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 155++D878 3A C7 7E     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 156++D87B 16 00                                ld      d,0
 157++D87D 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 158++D87E 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 159++D881 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 160++D884 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 161++D885 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 162++D887 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 163++D88A 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 164++D88D 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 165++D890 C9                                   ret
 166++D891
 167++D891              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 168++D891              ; 24 bit version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 169++D891              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
 170++D891              ; Minsky Roll       Minsky Pitch
 171++D891              ;  y -= alpha * x    y -= beta * z
 172++D891              ;  x += alpha * y    z += beta * y
 173++D891              ; or once combined
 174++D891              ;   1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 175++D891              ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 176++D891              ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 177++D891              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 178++D891              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 179++D891              ; Based on non optimised version of Planet pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 180++D891              ; Now at least rolls the correct direction
 181++D891 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulX               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 182++D895 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulY               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 183++D899 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulZ               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 184++D89D 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulZ                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 185++D8A1 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulY                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 186++D8A5 00 00 00     UnivK2                      DS 3
 187++D8A8
 188++D8A8 3A E6 7D     ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit: 	ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 189++D8AB A7           .CheckForRoll:              and		a
 190++D8AC C4 D4 D8     							call	nz,Univ_Roll
 191++D8AF 3A D9 7D     .CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
 192++D8B2 A7           							and		a
 193++D8B3 C4 3A D9     							call	nz,Univ_Pitch
 194++D8B6 3A C7 7E     .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 195++D8B9              							ReturnIfAIsZero
 195++D8B9 A7          >                        and     a
 195++D8BA C8          >                        ret     z
 196++D8BB 0E 00        							ld      c,0                         ;
 197++D8BD 67           							ld      h,a                         ;
 198++D8BE 06 80        							ld      b,$80                       ;
 199++D8C0 ED 5B 27 C0  							ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 200++D8C4 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 201++D8C7 6F           							ld      l,a                         ; .
 202++D8C8 CD 10 01     							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 203++D8CB ED 53 27 C0  							ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 204++D8CF 7D           							ld      a,l
 205++D8D0 32 26 C0     							ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
 206++D8D3 C9           							ret
 207++D8D4              ; Performs minsky rotation
 208++D8D4              ; Joystick left          Joystick right
 209++D8D4              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 210++D8D4              ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
 211++D8D4              ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
 212++D8D4              ;
 213++D8D4              ; Joystick down          Joystick up
 214++D8D4              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 215++D8D4              ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
 216++D8D4              ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
 217++D8D4              ;
 218++D8D4              ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 219++D8D4              ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 220++D8D4              ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
 221++D8D4 3A E6 7D     Univ_Roll:				    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 222++D8D7 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 223++D8D9 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 224++D8DA 3A 23 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 225++D8DD 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 226++D8DE 2A 24 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 227++D8E1 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 228++D8E4 7D           							ld		a,l
 229++D8E5 32 95 D8     							ld		(UnivAlphaMulY),a			; save result
 230++D8E8 ED 53 96 D8  							ld		(UnivAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
 231++D8EC 3A E6 7D     							ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 232++D8EF E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 233++D8F1 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 234++D8F2 3A 20 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 235++D8F5 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 236++D8F6 2A 21 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)               ; .
 237++D8F9 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 238++D8FC 7D           							ld		a,l
 239++D8FD 32 91 D8     							ld		(UnivAlphaMulX),a			; save result
 240++D900 ED 53 92 D8  							ld		(UnivAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
 241++D904 3A E6 7D     							ld		a,(ALPHA)
 242++D907 E6 80        							and		$80
 243++D909 CA 23 D9     							jp		z,.RollingRight
 244++D90C DD 21 20 C0  .RollingLeft:				ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 245++D910 FD 21 95 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulY
 246++D914 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 247++D917 DD 21 23 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKylo
 248++D91B FD 21 91 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulX
 249++D91F CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 250++D922 C9           							ret
 251++D923 DD 21 20 C0  .RollingRight:				ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 252++D927 FD 21 95 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulY
 253++D92B CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 254++D92E DD 21 23 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKylo
 255++D932 FD 21 91 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulX
 256++D936 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 257++D939 C9           							ret
 258++D93A
 259++D93A 3A D9 7D     Univ_Pitch:				    ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 260++D93D E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 261++D93F 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 262++D940 3A 23 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 263++D943 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 264++D944 2A 24 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 265++D947 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 266++D94A 7D           							ld		a,l
 267++D94B 32 A1 D8     							ld		(UnivBetaMulY),a			; save result
 268++D94E ED 53 A2 D8  							ld		(UnivBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 269++D952 3A D9 7D     							ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 270++D955 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 271++D957 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 272++D958 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 273++D95B 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 274++D95C 2A 27 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)               ; .
 275++D95F CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 276++D962 7D           							ld		a,l
 277++D963 32 9D D8     							ld		(UnivBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 278++D966 ED 53 9E D8  							ld		(UnivBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 279++D96A 3A D9 7D     							ld		a,(BETA)
 280++D96D E6 80        							and		$80
 281++D96F CA 89 D9     							jp		z,.Climbing
 282++D972 DD 21 23 C0  .Diving:					ld		ix,UBnKylo
 283++D976 FD 21 9D D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulZ
 284++D97A CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 285++D97D DD 21 26 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 286++D981 FD 21 A1 D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulY
 287++D985 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 288++D988 C9           							ret
 289++D989 DD 21 23 C0  .Climbing:		     		ld		ix,UBnKylo
 290++D98D FD 21 9D D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulZ
 291++D991 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 292++D994 DD 21 26 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 293++D998 FD 21 A1 D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulY
 294++D99C CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 295++D99F C9           							ret

1358+ D9A0                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D9A0
   2++D9A0              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D9A0              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D9A0              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D9A0              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D9A0 ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D9A0 ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D9A0 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D9A0 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D9A0 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D9A0                                      ENDM
  20++D9A0
  21++D9A0              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D9A0 ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D9A0 ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D9A0 ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D9A0 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D9A0 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D9A0 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D9A0                                      ENDM
  37++D9A0
  38++D9A0
  39++D9A0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D9A0              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D9A0              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D9A0 3A 49 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  43++D9A3 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  44++D9A5 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes
  45++D9A7                                      SplitAndDampenZ
  45++D9A7 47          >                        ld      b,a
  45++D9A8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
  45++D9AA CA EC D9    >                        jp      z,.ProcessRoll
  45++D9AD 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  45++D9AE E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  45++D9B0 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  45++D9B1 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D9B4 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  45++D9B5 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  45++D9B7 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  45++D9B8 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D9BB B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  45++D9BC 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  46++D9BF                                      ;ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  47++D9BF 21 2F C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  48++D9C2 22 B2 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  49++D9C5 21 35 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  50++D9C8 22 B4 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  51++D9CB CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  52++D9CE 21 31 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  53++D9D1 22 B2 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  54++D9D4 21 37 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  55++D9D7 22 B4 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  56++D9DA CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  57++D9DD 21 33 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D9E0 22 B2 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D9E3 21 39 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D9E6 22 B4 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D9E9 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  62++D9EC 3A 48 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  63++D9EF FE FF                                cp      $FF
  64++D9F1 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis
  65++D9F3                                      SplitAndDampenX
  65++D9F3 47          >                        ld      b,a
  65++D9F4 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  65++D9F6 A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D9F7 C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D9F8 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D9F9 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D9FB 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D9FC 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D9FF 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++DA00 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++DA02 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  65++DA03 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  65++DA06 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++DA07 32 48 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  66++DA0A 21 2F C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  67++DA0D 22 B2 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++DA10 21 29 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++DA13 22 B4 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++DA16 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++DA19 21 31 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++DA1C 22 B2 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++DA1F 21 2B C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++DA22 22 B4 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++DA25 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++DA28 21 33 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++DA2B 22 B2 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++DA2E 21 2D C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++DA31 22 B4 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++DA34 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++DA37 C9                                   ret
  82++DA38
  83++DA38
  84++DA38
  85++DA38              ; Roate around axis
  86++DA38              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++DA38              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++DA38              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++DA38              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++DA38              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++DA38              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++DA38              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++DA38              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++DA38              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++DA38 2A B2 7D     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++DA3B 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++DA3C 23                                   inc     hl
  98++DA3D 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++DA3E EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++DA3F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++DA40 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++DA42 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++DA44 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++DA45 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++DA47 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++DA49 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++DA4A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++DA4C 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++DA4D B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++DA4E CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++DA51              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++DA51 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++DA52 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++DA53 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a
 115++DA56 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++DA57 32 CF 7E                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++DA5A              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++DA5A 2A B4 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++DA5D 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++DA5E 23                                   inc     hl
 121++DA5F 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++DA60 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++DA61 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++DA63 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++DA65 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++DA66 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++DA68 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++DA69                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++DA69 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++DA6B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++DA6D                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++DA6D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++DA6F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++DA71                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++DA71 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++DA73 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++DA75                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++DA75 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++DA77 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++DA79 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++DA7C FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++DA7E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++DA80 B2                                   or      d
 136++DA81 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++DA82              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++DA82              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++DA82              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++DA82              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++DA82 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++DA83                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++DA83              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++DA83 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++DA86 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++DA87              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++DA87              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++DA87 2A B4 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++DA8A 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++DA8B 23                                   inc     hl
 151++DA8C 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++DA8D EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++DA8E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++DA8F E6 80                                and     $80
 155++DA91 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++DA93 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++DA94 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++DA96 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++DA98 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++DA99 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++DA9B 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++DA9C B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++DA9D CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15
 164++DAA0              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++DAA0 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++DAA1 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++DAA2 32 CD 7D                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++DAA5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++DAA6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++DAA8 32 E9 7E                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++DAAB              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++DAAB 2A B2 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++DAAE              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++DAAE 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++DAAF 23                                   inc     hl
 176++DAB0 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++DAB1 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++DAB2 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++DAB4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++DAB6 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++DAB7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++DAB9 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++DABA                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++DABA CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++DABC CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++DABE                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++DABE CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++DAC0 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++DAC2                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++DAC2 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++DAC4 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++DAC6                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++DAC6 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++DAC8 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++DACA 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++DACD FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++DACF E6 80                                and     $80
 190++DAD1 B2                                   or      d
 191++DAD2 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++DAD3              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++DAD3              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++DAD3              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++DAD3 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++DAD4              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++DAD4 CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++DAD7              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++DAD7 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++DAD8 2A B4 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++DADB 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++DADC 23                                   inc     hl
 203++DADD 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++DADE              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++DADE D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++DADF 2A B2 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++DAE2 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++DAE3 23                                   inc     hl
 209++DAE4 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++DAE5 C9                                   ret
 211++DAE6
 212++DAE6
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm

   1++DB61
   2++DB61
   3++DB61              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   4++DB61 00           DrawLinesCounter		db	0
   5++DB62              ; Initial tests look OK
   6++DB62              LL155:;
   7++DB62              ClearLine:                                  ; CLEAR LINEstr visited by EE31 when XX3 heap ready to draw/erase lines in XX19 heap.
   8++DB62                    ;break                                                                             ; ObjectInFront:

  15++DB70 4E           .DrawLinesLoop:         ld    c,(hl)                          ; (XX19),Y c = varX1
  16++DB71 23                                   inc   hl
  17++DB72 46                                   ld    b,(hl)                          ; bc = point1 Y,X
  18++DB73 23                                   inc   hl
  19++DB74 5E                                   ld    e,(hl)                          ; c = varX1
  20++DB75 23                                   inc   hl
  21++DB76 56                                   ld    d,(hl)                          ; de = point2 Y,X
  22++DB77 23                                   inc   hl
  23++DB78 E5 FD E5                             push  hl,,iy
  24++DB7B 60                                   ld    h,b
  25++DB7C 69                                   ld    l,c
  26++DB7D                ;  call    l2_draw_any_line                ; call version of LOIN that used BCDE
  27++DB7D FD 7D                                ld	a,iyl							; get colour back before calling line draw
  28++DB7F                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  28++DB7F ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  29++DB83 CD 0E FF                             call  LineHLtoDE
  30++DB86 FD E1 E1                             pop   hl,,iy
  31++DB89 FD 25                                dec   iyh
  32++DB8B 20 E3                                jr	nz, .DrawLinesLoop
  33++DB8D C9                                   ret                                     ; --- Wireframe end  \ LL118-1
  34++DB8E
  35++DB8E
  36++DB8E 3E 65        DrawLinesLateClipping:  ld	a,$65 ; DEBUG
  37++DB90 FD 6F                                ld    iyl,a					      ; set ixl to colour (assuming we come in here with a = colour to draw)
  38++DB92 3A EA C3                             ld	a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)			; get number of lines
  39++DB95                                      ReturnIfAIsZero   				; No lines then bail out.
  39++DB95 A7          >                        and     a
  39++DB96 C8          >                        ret     z
  40++DB97 FD 67                                ld	iyh,a			                  ; number of lines still to draw
  41++DB99 21 30 C2                             ld	hl,UbnkLineArray
  42++DB9C                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  42++DB9C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  43++DBA0 3E BF                                ld    a,$BF
  44++DBA2 32 B5 E2                             ld    (line_gfx_colour),a
  45++DBA5 11 D4 F5     LateDrawLinesLoop:      ld    de,x1
  46++DBA8                                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  46++DBA8 ED A0       >                        ldi
  46++DBAA ED A0       >                        ldi
  46++DBAC ED A0       >                        ldi
  46++DBAE ED A0       >                        ldi
  47++DBB0                                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  47++DBB0 ED A0       >                        ldi
  47++DBB2 ED A0       >                        ldi
  47++DBB4 ED A0       >                        ldi
  47++DBB6 ED A0       >                        ldi
  48++DBB8 E5 FD E5                             push  hl,,iy
  49++DBBB                                      //call  l2_draw_clipped_line
  50++DBBB                                      //call  l2_draw_elite_line
  51++DBBB CD 67 FC                             call    l2_draw_6502_line
  52++DBBE DA E4 DB                             jp      c,LateNoLineToDraw
  53++DBC1
  54++DBC1 E5 C5 D5 FD  PreLate:                push    hl,,bc,,de,,iy
  54++DBC5 E5
  55++DBC6 3A D4 F5                             ld      a,(x1)
  56++DBC9 4F                                   ld      c,a
  57++DBCA 3A D6 F5                             ld      a,(y1)
  58++DBCD 47                                   ld      b,a
  59++DBCE 3A D8 F5                             ld      a,(x2)
  60++DBD1 5F                                   ld      e,a
  61++DBD2 3A DA F5                             ld      a,(y2)
  62++DBD5 57                                   ld      d,a
  63++DBD6                                      ; bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color)
  64++DBD6 3E D5                                ld	    a, $D5 ; colour
  65++DBD8                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  65++DBD8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  66++DBDC CD A7 FC     LateLine:               call    l2_draw_elite_line; l2_draw_diagonal
  67++DBDF FD E1 D1 C1                          pop     hl,,bc,,de,,iy
  67++DBE3 E1
  68++DBE4
  69++DBE4
  70++DBE4 FD E1 E1     LateNoLineToDraw:       pop   hl,,iy
  71++DBE7 FD 25                                dec   iyh
  72++DBE9 20 BA                                jr	nz, LateDrawLinesLoop
  73++DBEB C9                                   ret                                     ; --- Wireframe end  \ LL118-1
# file closed: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm

1362+ DBEC
1363+ DBEC              ; DIot seem to lawyas have Y = 0???
1364+ DBEC              ProcessDot:            ; break
1365+ DBEC CD F2 CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1366+ DBEF CD 66 7A                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1367+ DBF2 CD AA CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1368+ DBF5 CD 77 CE                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1369+ DBF8 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
1370+ DBFB 22 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),hl
1371+ DBFE 22 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),hl
1372+ DC01 22 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),hl
1373+ DC04 AF                                   xor     a
1374+ DC05 CD C8 79                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1375+ DC08 CD 1B CD                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1376+ DC0B CD 98 CD                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1377+ DC0E FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1378+ DC12 CD A0 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye

1383+ DC16 3A FF C3     PlotAllNodes:           ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1384+ DC19 4F           .GetActualVertexCount:  ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1385+ DC1A 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1386+ DC1B 16 06                                ld      d,6
1387+ DC1D CD 2D 95                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1388+ DC20 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1389+ DC21 FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1390+ DC25 FD 5E 00     .PlotLoop:              ld      e,(iy)
1391+ DC28 FD 56 01                             ld      d,(iy+1)
1392+ DC2B FD 6E 02                             ld      l,(iy+2)
1393+ DC2E FD 66 03                             ld      h,(iy+3)
1394+ DC31 C5 FD E5                             push    bc,,iy

1396+ DC37 FD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,iy
1397+ DC3A FD 23                                inc     iy
1398+ DC3C FD 23                                inc     iy
1399+ DC3E FD 23                                inc     iy
1400+ DC40 FD 23                                inc     iy
1401+ DC42 10 E1                                djnz    .PlotLoop
1402+ DC44 C9                                   ret
1403+ DC45
1404+ DC45 7A           PlotAtDEHL:             ld      a,d
1405+ DC46 A7                                   and     a
1406+ DC47 C0                                   ret     nz
1407+ DC48 7C                                   ld      a,h
1408+ DC49 A7                                   and     a
1409+ DC4A C0                                   ret     nz
1410+ DC4B 7D                                   ld      a,l
1411+ DC4C E6 80                                and     $80
1412+ DC4E C0                                   ret     nz
1413+ DC4F                                      MMUSelectLayer2
1413+ DC4F ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1414+ DC53 45                                   ld      b,l

1416+ DC55 3E 88                                ld      a,$88
1417+ DC57 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
1418+ DC5A C9                                   ret
1419+ DC5B
1420+ DC5B
1421+ DC5B              ; .....................................................
1422+ DC5B              ; Process Nodes does the following:
1423+ DC5B              ; for each node:
1424+ DC5B              ;     see if node >
1425+ DC5B 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1426+ DC5C 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1427+ DC5E 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1428+ DC60 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1429+ DC61              ProcessNodes:           ZeroA
1429+ DC61 AF          >                        xor a
1430+ DC62 32 EA C3                             ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1431+ DC65 CD F2 CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1432+ DC68 CD 66 7A                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1433+ DC6B CD AA CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1434+ DC6E CD 77 CE                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1435+ DC71 21 11 C4                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1436+ DC74 3A FF C3                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1437+ DC77 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1438+ DC78 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1439+ DC79 16 06                                ld      d,6
1440+ DC7B CD 2D 95                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1441+ DC7E 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1442+ DC7F FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1443+ DC83              LL48:
1444+ DC83 C5           PointLoop:              push    bc                                  ; save counters
1445+ DC84 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1446+ DC85 FD E5                                push    iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1447+ DC87 78                                   ld      a,b
1448+ DC88                                      ;break
1449+ DC88 CD 21 D5                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1450+ DC8B 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1451+ DC8E CD C8 79                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1452+ DC91 CD 1B CD                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1453+ DC94 CD 98 CD                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1454+ DC97 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1455+ DC99 CD A0 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1456+ DC9C                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1457+ DC9C                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1458+ DC9C FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push    iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1459+ DC9E E1                                   pop     hl
1460+ DC9F 3E 04                                ld      a,4
1461+ DCA1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1462+ DCA3 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1463+ DCA4 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; and put it in iy again
1464+ DCA6 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1465+ DCA7 3E 06                                ld      a,6
1466+ DCA9 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1467+ DCAB C1                                   pop     bc                                  ; get counter back
1468+ DCAC 10 D5                                djnz    PointLoop
1469+ DCAE              ; ......................................................
1470+ DCAE                                      ClearCarryFlag
1470+ DCAE B7          >                        or a
1471+ DCAF C9                                   ret
1472+ DCB0              ; ...........................................................
1473+ DCB0 CD A5 D1     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1474+ DCB3 3A 54 C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1475+ DCB6 E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1476+ DCB8 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit
1477+ DCB9                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible
1477+ DCB9 CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1477+ DCBB C2 FC DC    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud
1478+ DCBE              ;............................................................
1479+ DCBE              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
1479+ DCBE CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1479+ DCC0 C8          >                        ret		z
1480+ DCC1                                      JumpOnABitClear ShipIsDotBitNbr, .CarryOnWithDraw   ; if not dot do normal draw
1480+ DCC1 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1480+ DCC3 CA EA DC    >                        jp      z,.CarryOnWithDraw
1481+ DCC6              ;............................................................
1482+ DCC6 CD EC DB     .itsJustADot:           call    ProcessDot
1483+ DCC9                                      SetMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsDotBitNbr ; set is a dot flag
1483+ DCC9 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1483+ DCCC CB DE       >                        set     ShipIsDotBitNbr,(hl)
1484+ DCCE ED 4B F0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkNodeArray)          ; if its at dot range get X
1485+ DCD2 ED 5B F2 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1486+ DCD6 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1487+ DCD7 B2                                   or      d                           ;
1488+ DCD8 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1489+ DCD9 7B                                   ld      a,e
1490+ DCDA E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1491+ DCDC C0                                   ret     nz
1492+ DCDD 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1493+ DCDE 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1494+ DCE0 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1495+ DCE2                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1495+ DCE2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1496+ DCE6 CD F8 E2                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1497+ DCE9 C9                                   ret
1498+ DCEA              ;............................................................
1499+ DCEA CD 61 DC     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1500+ DCED                                     ; break
1501+ DCED                                  IFDEF PLOTPOINTSONLY
1502+ DCED ~                                    ld      a,$F6
1503+ DCED ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1504+ DCED ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1505+ DCED                                  ELSE
1506+ DCED 3E E3                                ld      a,$E3
1507+ DCEF 32 B5 E2                             ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1508+ DCF2 CD EC D1                             call    CullV2
1509+ DCF5 CD A4 DE                             call    PrepLines                       ; With late clipping this just moves the data to the line array which is now x2 size
1510+ DCF8 CD 8E DB                             call    DrawLinesLateClipping
1511+ DCFB                                  ENDIF
1512+ DCFB                                  IFDEF OVERLAYNODES
1513+ DCFB ~                                    ld      a,$CF
1514+ DCFB ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1515+ DCFB ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1516+ DCFB                                  ENDIF
1517+ DCFB                                  IFDEF FLIPBUFFERSTEST
1518+ DCFB ~                                    DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Enabled"
1519+ DCFB ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1520+ DCFB ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1521+ DCFB                                  ELSE
1522+ DCFB                                      DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Disabled"
1523+ DCFB                                  ENDIF
1524+ DCFB C9                                   ret
1525+ DCFC              ;............................................................
1526+ DCFC CD 61 DC     .ExplodingCloud:        call    ProcessNodes
1527+ DCFF                                      ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm, ShipKilledBitNbr ; acknowledge ship exploding
1527+ DCFF 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1527+ DD02 CB A6       >                        res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
1528+ DD04 3A 5F C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1529+ DD07 C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1530+ DD09 DA CB DD                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1531+ DD0C 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; .
1532+ DD0F              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1532+ DD0F 3A 54 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1532+ DD12 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1532+ DD14 C8          >                        ret		z
1533+ DD15              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1533+ DD15 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1533+ DD17 C2 C6 DC    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1534+ DD1A 2A 26 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1535+ DD1D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1536+ DD1E                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1536+ DD1E FE 20       >                        cp      32
1536+ DD20 DA 28 DD    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1537+ DD23 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1538+ DD25 C3 33 DD                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1539+ DD28              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1539+ DD28 CB 25       >			   sla l
1539+ DD2A CB 14       >			   rl  h
1540+ DD2C                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1540+ DD2C CB 25       >			   sla l
1540+ DD2E CB 14       >			   rl  h
1541+ DD30                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1541+ DD30 37          >                        scf
1542+ DD31 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1543+ DD33 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1544+ DD35 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1545+ DD36 3A 5F C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1546+ DD39                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1547+ DD39 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1548+ DD39 ~                                    ld      b,h
1549+ DD39 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1550+ DD39 ~                                    ld      d,a
1551+ DD39 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1552+ DD39                      ELSE
1553+ DD39 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1554+ DD3A 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1555+ DD3C CD 71 94                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1556+ DD3F 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1557+ DD40                      ENDIF
1558+ DD40                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1558+ DD40 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1558+ DD42 DA 4A DD    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1559+ DD45 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1560+ DD47 C3 56 DD                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1561+ DD4A              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1561+ DD4A CB 23       >			   sla e
1561+ DD4C CB 12       >			   rl  d
1562+ DD4E                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1562+ DD4E CB 23       >			   sla e
1562+ DD50 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1563+ DD52                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1563+ DD52 CB 23       >			   sla e
1563+ DD54 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1564+ DD56 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1565+ DD57 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1566+ DD5A DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1567+ DD5C 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1568+ DD5F ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1569+ DD61 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1570+ DD63 CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1571+ DD65 21 D7 DD                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1572+ DD68 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1573+ DD6A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1574+ DD6B FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1575+ DD6D 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1576+ DD70                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1576+ DD70 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1576+ DD72 CA 77 DD    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1576+ DD75 ED 44       >                        neg
1576+ DD77             >.DoneABSa:
1577+ DD77 CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1578+ DD79 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1579+ DD7B CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1580+ DD7D F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1581+ DD7F DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1582+ DD81 3A FE C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1583+ DD84 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1584+ DD85 21 F0 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1585+ DD88 C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1586+ DD8A DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1587+ DD8C 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1588+ DD8D 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1589+ DD8E 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1590+ DD8F 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1591+ DD90 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1592+ DD91 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1593+ DD92 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1594+ DD93 DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1595+ DD95 FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1596+ DD97                                          ;break
1597+ DD97 D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1598+ DD99 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1599+ DD9A DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1600+ DD9C CD DF DD                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1601+ DD9F 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1602+ DDA0                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1602+ DDA0 A7          >                        and     a
1602+ DDA1 C2 BC DD    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1603+ DDA4 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1604+ DDA5 E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1605+ DDA6 E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1606+ DDA7 D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1607+ DDA8 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1608+ DDAA CD DF DD                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1609+ DDAD D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1610+ DDAE 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1611+ DDAF                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1611+ DDAF A7          >                        and     a
1611+ DDB0 C2 BC DD    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1612+ DDB3 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1613+ DDB4 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1614+ DDB5                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1614+ DDB5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1615+ DDB9 CD 00 E3                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1616+ DDBC C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1617+ DDBE FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1618+ DDC0 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1619+ DDC2 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1620+ DDC4 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1621+ DDC6 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1622+ DDC8 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1623+ DDCA C9                                   ret
1624+ DDCB              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1625+ DDCB 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1626+ DDCE CD 97 83                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1627+ DDD1                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1627+ DDD1 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1627+ DDD4 CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1628+ DDD6 C9                                   ret
1629+ DDD7
1630+ DDD7
1631+ DDD7 FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1631+ DDDB 6C 48 24 25
1632+ DDDF                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1633+ DDDF
1634+ DDDF              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1635+ DDDF              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1636+ DDDF              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1637+ DDDF              ; uses registers hl, de
1638+ DDDF E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1639+ DDE0 CD 68 84                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1640+ DDE3 E1                                   pop     hl
1641+ DDE4 17                                   rla                                 ;
1642+ DDE5 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1643+ DDE7 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1644+ DDE8 ED 30                                mul
1645+ DDEA 5A                                   ld  e,d
1646+ DDEB 16 00                                ld  d,0
1647+ DDED                                      ClearCarryFlag
1647+ DDED B7          >                        or a
1648+ DDEE ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1649+ DDF0 C9                                   ret
1650+ DDF1 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1651+ DDF2 ED 30                                mul
1652+ DDF4 5A                                   ld  e,d
1653+ DDF5 16 00                                ld  d,0
1654+ DDF7                                      ClearCarryFlag
1654+ DDF7 B7          >                        or a
1655+ DDF8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1656+ DDFA C9                                   ret
