 551+ C529
 552+ C529              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
 553+ C529
 554+ C529
 555+ C529
 556+ C529
 557+ C529              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
 558+ C529              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
 559+ C529              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
 560+ C529              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
 561+ C529              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
 562+ C529              ; which can be simplified as:
 563+ C529              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 564+ C529              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
 565+ C529              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
 566+ C529              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
 567+ C529              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
 568+ C529              ;      Roll calculations:
 569+ C529              ;
 570+ C529              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 571+ C529              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 572+ C529              ;      Pitch calculations:
 573+ C529              ;
 574+ C529              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
 575+ C529              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
 576+ C529
 577+ C529
 578+ C529                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/SunApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++C529
   2++C529              ; Full version
   3++C529              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++C529              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++C529              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++C529              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++C529
   8++C529
   9++C529
  10++C529              ; SunrollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  11++C529              ;  1. K2 = y - alpha * x
  12++C529              ;  2. z = z + beta * K2
  13++C529              ;  3. y = K2 - beta * z
  14++C529              ;  4. x = x + alpha * y
  15++C529              ;.... or
  16++C529              ;  2. z = z + (beta * (y - alpha * x))
  17++C529              ;  3. y = (y - alpha * x) - (beta * z)
  18++C529              ;  4. x = x + (alpha * y)
  19++C529
  20++C529
  21++C529              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  22++C529              ; Sun version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
  23++C529              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
  24++C529              ; Minsky Roll       Minsky Pitch
  25++C529              ;  y -= alpha * x    y -= beta * z
  26++C529              ;  x += alpha * y    z += beta * y
  27++C529              ; or once combined
  28++C529              ;   1. K2 = y - alpha * x
  29++C529              ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
  30++C529              ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
  31++C529              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
  32++C529              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  33++C529              ; Based on non optimised version of Sun pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
  34++C529              ; Now at least rolls the correct direction
  35++C529 00 00 00 00  SunAlphaMulX                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  36++C52D 00 00 00 00  SunAlphaMulY                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  37++C531 00 00 00 00  SunAlphaMulZ                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  38++C535 00 00 00 00  SunBetaMulZ                 DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  39++C539 00 00 00 00  SunBetaMulY                 DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  40++C53D 00 00 00     SunK2                       DS 3
  41++C540
  42++C540 3A E6 7D     SunApplyMyRollAndPitch: 	ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
  43++C543 A7           .CheckForRoll:              and		a
  44++C544 C4 6C C5     							call	nz,Sun_Roll
  45++C547 3A D9 7D     .CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
  46++C54A A7           							and		a
  47++C54B C4 D2 C5     							call	nz,Sun_Pitch
  48++C54E 3A C7 7E     .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
  49++C551              							ReturnIfAIsZero
  49++C551 A7          >                        and     a
  49++C552 C8          >                        ret     z
  50++C553 0E 00        							ld      c,0                         ;
  51++C555 67           							ld      h,a                         ;
  52++C556 06 80        							ld      b,$80                       ;
  53++C558 ED 5B 17 C0  							ld      de,(SBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
  54++C55C 3A 16 C0     							ld      a,(SBnKzlo)                 ; .
  55++C55F 6F           							ld      l,a                         ; .
  56++C560 CD 10 01     							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
  57++C563 ED 53 17 C0  							ld      (SBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
  58++C567 7D           							ld      a,l
  59++C568 32 16 C0     							ld      (SBnKzlo),a                ;
  60++C56B C9           							ret
  61++C56C              ; Performs minsky rotation
  62++C56C              ; Joystick left          Joystick right
  63++C56C              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
  64++C56C              ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
  65++C56C              ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
  66++C56C              ;
  67++C56C              ; Joystick down          Joystick up
  68++C56C              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
  69++C56C              ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
  70++C56C              ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
  71++C56C              ;
  72++C56C              ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
  73++C56C              ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
  74++C56C              ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
  75++C56C 3A E6 7D     Sun_Roll:				    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  76++C56F E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  77++C571 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  78++C572 3A 13 C0     							ld      a,(SBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  79++C575 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  80++C576 2A 14 C0     							ld      hl,(SBnKyhi)               ; .
  81++C579 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  82++C57C 7D           							ld		a,l
  83++C57D 32 2D C5     							ld		(SunAlphaMulY),a			; save result
  84++C580 ED 53 2E C5  							ld		(SunAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
  85++C584 3A E6 7D     							ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  86++C587 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  87++C589 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  88++C58A 3A 10 C0     							ld      a,(SBnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  89++C58D 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  90++C58E 2A 11 C0     							ld      hl,(SBnKxhi)               ; .
  91++C591 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  92++C594 7D           							ld		a,l
  93++C595 32 29 C5     							ld		(SunAlphaMulX),a			; save result
  94++C598 ED 53 2A C5  							ld		(SunAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
  95++C59C 3A E6 7D     							ld		a,(ALPHA)
  96++C59F E6 80        							and		$80
  97++C5A1 CA BB C5     							jp		z,.RollingRight
  98++C5A4 DD 21 10 C0  .RollingLeft:				ld		ix,SBnKxlo
  99++C5A8 FD 21 2D C5  							ld		iy,SunAlphaMulY
 100++C5AC CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 101++C5AF DD 21 13 C0  							ld		ix,SBnKylo
 102++C5B3 FD 21 29 C5  							ld		iy,SunAlphaMulX
 103++C5B7 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 104++C5BA C9           							ret
 105++C5BB DD 21 10 C0  .RollingRight:				ld		ix,SBnKxlo
 106++C5BF FD 21 2D C5  							ld		iy,SunAlphaMulY
 107++C5C3 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 108++C5C6 DD 21 13 C0  							ld		ix,SBnKylo
 109++C5CA FD 21 29 C5  							ld		iy,SunAlphaMulX
 110++C5CE CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 111++C5D1 C9           							ret
 112++C5D2
 113++C5D2 3A D9 7D     Sun_Pitch:				    ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 114++C5D5 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 115++C5D7 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 116++C5D8 3A 13 C0     							ld      a,(SBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 117++C5DB 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 118++C5DC 2A 14 C0     							ld      hl,(SBnKyhi)               ; .
 119++C5DF CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 120++C5E2 7D           							ld		a,l
 121++C5E3 32 39 C5     							ld		(SunBetaMulY),a			; save result
 122++C5E6 ED 53 3A C5  							ld		(SunBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 123++C5EA 3A D9 7D     							ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 124++C5ED E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 125++C5EF 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 126++C5F0 3A 16 C0     							ld      a,(SBnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 127++C5F3 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 128++C5F4 2A 17 C0     							ld      hl,(SBnKzhi)               ; .
 129++C5F7 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 130++C5FA 7D           							ld		a,l
 131++C5FB 32 35 C5     							ld		(SunBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 132++C5FE ED 53 36 C5  							ld		(SunBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 133++C602 3A D9 7D     							ld		a,(BETA)
 134++C605 E6 80        							and		$80
 135++C607 CA 21 C6     							jp		z,.Climbing
 136++C60A DD 21 13 C0  .Diving:					ld		ix,SBnKylo
 137++C60E FD 21 35 C5  							ld		iy,SunBetaMulZ
 138++C612 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 139++C615 DD 21 16 C0  							ld		ix,SBnKzlo
 140++C619 FD 21 39 C5  							ld		iy,SunBetaMulY
 141++C61D CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 142++C620 C9           							ret
 143++C621 DD 21 13 C0  .Climbing:		     		ld		ix,SBnKylo
 144++C625 FD 21 35 C5  							ld		iy,SunBetaMulZ
 145++C629 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 146++C62C DD 21 16 C0  							ld		ix,SBnKzlo
 147++C630 FD 21 39 C5  							ld		iy,SunBetaMulY
 148++C634 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 149++C637 C9           							ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Sun/SunApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm

 581+ C638 00           SunOnScreen             DB 0
 582+ C639 00 00        cLineArrayPtr            DW 0
 583+ C63B 00           LineCount               DB 0

 586+ C63E 00           MaxYOffSet              DB 0
 587+ C63F 00 00        SunScrnX                DW  0       ; signed
 588+ C641 00 00        SunScrnY                DW  0       ; signed
 589+ C643 00           SunRadius               DB  0       ; unsigned
 590+ C644              ; draw circle
 591+ C644
 592+ C644              ;
 593+ C644              ;DIVD3B2 K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 594+ C644
 595+ C644 00 00 00 00  SunVarK                 DS 4
 596+ C648 00 00 00     SunVarP                 DS 3
 597+ C64B 00           SunVarQ                 DS 1
 598+ C64C 00           SunVarR                 DS 1
 599+ C64D 00           SunVarS                 DS 1
 600+ C64E 00           SunVarT                 DS 1
 601+ C64F
 602+ C64F              ; Optimisation
 603+ C64F              ; if a <> 0
 604+ C64F              ;       divide AH by CD
 605+ C64F              ; if h <> 0
 606+ C64F              ;      if c <> 0 return 0
 607+ C64F              ;      else
 608+ C64F              ;        divide HL by DE
 609+ C64F              ; if l <>0
 610+ C64F              ;      if c or d <> 0 return 0
 611+ C64F              ;      else
 612+ C64F              ;        divide l by e
 613+ C64F              ;
 614+ C64F 47           SunAHLequAHLDivCDE:     ld      b,a                         ; save a reg
 615+ C650 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; check for divide by zero
 616+ C651 B2                                   or      d                           ; .
 617+ C652 B3                                   or      e                           ; .
 618+ C653                                      JumpIfZero      .divideByZero       ; .
 618+ C653 CA 6C C6    >                        jp	z,.divideByZero
 619+ C656 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; get a back
 620+ C657                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideAHLbyCDE
 620+ C657 A7          >                        and     a
 620+ C658 C2 73 C6    >                        jp	    nz,.divideAHLbyCDE
 621+ C65B 7C           .AIsZero:               ld      a,h
 622+ C65C                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideHLbyDE
 622+ C65C A7          >                        and     a
 622+ C65D C2 7A C6    >                        jp	    nz,.divideHLbyDE
 623+ C660 7D           .HIsZero:               ld      a,l
 624+ C661                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideLbyE
 624+ C661 A7          >                        and     a
 624+ C662 C2 89 C6    >                        jp	    nz,.divideLbyE
 625+ C665              .resultIsZero:          ZeroA
 625+ C665 AF          >                        xor a
 626+ C666 67                                   ld      h,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 627+ C667 6F                                   ld      l,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 628+ C668 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 629+ C66A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 629+ C66A B7          >                        or a
 630+ C66B C9                                   ret
 631+ C66C 3E FF        .divideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 632+ C66E 67                                   ld      h,a
 633+ C66F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 634+ C670 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 635+ C672                                      SetCarryFlag
 635+ C672 37          >                        scf
 636+ C673              ; AHL = ahl/cde, this could be a genuine 24 bit divide
 637+ C673              ; if AHL is large and cde small then the value will be big so will be off screen so we can risk 16 bit divide
 638+ C673 CD 5E 8F     .divideAHLbyCDE:        call    Div24by24
 639+ C676 EB                                   ex      hl,de                         ; ahl is result
 640+ C677 79                                   ld      a,c                           ; ahl is result
 641+ C678                                      ClearCarryFlag
 641+ C678 B7          >                        or a
 642+ C679
 643+ C679 C9                                   ret
 644+ C67A              ; AHL = 0hl/0de as A is zero
 645+ C67A 79           .divideHLbyDE:          ld      a,c                         ;'if c = 0 then result must be zero
 646+ C67B                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 646+ C67B A7          >                        and     a
 646+ C67C C2 65 C6    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 647+ C67F 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 648+ C681 CD 89 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                   ; BC = HL/DE
 649+ C684 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 650+ C686                                      ZeroA                               ; so we can set A to Zero
 650+ C686 AF          >                        xor a
 651+ C687                                      ClearCarryFlag
 651+ C687 B7          >                        or a
 652+ C688 C9                                   ret
 653+ C689              ; AHL = 00l/00e as A and H are zero
 654+ C689 79           .divideLbyE:            ld      a,c                         ; if d = 0 then result must be zero
 655+ C68A B2                                   or      d
 656+ C68B                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 656+ C68B A7          >                        and     a
 656+ C68C C2 65 C6    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 657+ C68F 4B                                   ld      c,e
 658+ C690 5D                                   ld      e,l
 659+ C691 CD 4B 95                             call    E_Div_C
 660+ C694 6F                                   ld      l,a
 661+ C695                                      ZeroA
 661+ C695 AF          >                        xor a
 662+ C696 67                                   ld      h,a
 663+ C697                                      ClearCarryFlag
 663+ C697 B7          >                        or a
 664+ C698 C9                                   ret

 666+ C699
 667+ C699              ; Needs tuning for registers vs memroy
 668+ C699 22 48 C6     SunKEquAHLDivCDE:       ld      (SunVarP),hl
 669+ C69C 32 4A C6                             ld      (SunVarP+2),a
 670+ C69F ED 53 4B C6                          ld      (SunVarQ),de
 671+ C6A3 79                                   ld      a,c
 672+ C6A4 32 4D C6                             ld      (SunVarS),a
 673+ C6A7 3A 48 C6     SunDivD3B:              ld      a,(SunVarP)                 ; Ensure P is at least 1
 674+ C6AA F6 01                                or      1
 675+ C6AC 32 48 C6                             ld      (SunVarP),a
 676+ C6AF 3A 4A C6                             ld      a,(SunVarP+2)               ; T = Sign xor Sign
 677+ C6B2 21 4D C6                             ld      hl,SunVarS
 678+ C6B5 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 679+ C6B6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 680+ C6B8 32 4E C6                             ld      (SunVarT),a
 681+ C6BB 06 00                                ld      b,0                         ; b = y counter
 682+ C6BD 3A 4A C6                             ld      a,(SunVarP+2)               ; a = abs high byte of p
 683+ C6C0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 684+ C6C2 2A 48 C6                             ld      hl,(SunVarP)                ; shift P left
 685+ C6C5              .SunDVL9:               JumpIfAGTENusng   64, .SunDV14      ; if high p > 64 then go to DV14
 685+ C6C5 FE 40       >                        cp     64
 685+ C6C7 D2 D4 C6    >                        jp		nc,.SunDV14
 686+ C6CA                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ;
 686+ C6CA CB 25       >			   sla l
 686+ C6CC CB 14       >			   rl  h
 687+ C6CE CB 17                                rl      a                           ;
 688+ C6D0 04                                   inc     b                           ; increase shift count
 689+ C6D1 C3 C5 C6                             jp      .SunDVL9
 690+ C6D4 22 48 C6     .SunDV14:               ld      (SunVarP),hl                ; save off var P
 691+ C6D7 32 4A C6                             ld      (SunVarP+2),a
 692+ C6DA 3A 4D C6                             ld      a,(SunVarS)                 ; a= ABS varS
 693+ C6DD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 694+ C6DF 2A 4B C6                             ld      hl,(SunVarQ)                ; HL = vars Q & R
 695+ C6E2 05           .SunDVL6:               dec     b                           ; reduce b counter by 1
 696+ C6E3                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; varQRA  shift left
 696+ C6E3 CB 25       >			   sla l
 696+ C6E5 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 697+ C6E7 CB 17                                rl      a                           ;
 698+ C6E9 F2 E2 C6                             jp      p, .SunDVL6                 ; keep shifting until bit 7 of a is set
 699+ C6EC 22 4B C6                             ld      (SunVarQ),hl                ; save QR
 700+ C6EF 32 4D C6     .SunDV9:                ld      (SunVarS),a                 ; save S
 701+ C6F2                                      ;ld      a,h
 702+ C6F2                                      ;ld      (varQ),a
 703+ C6F2 4F                                   ld      c,a
 704+ C6F3 3A 4A C6                             ld      a,(SunVarP+2)
 705+ C6F6 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save shift counter in b
 706+ C6F7 CD FD 94                             call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC
 707+ C6FA                                      ;call    RequAmul256divQ
 708+ C6FA 79                                   ld      a, c
 709+ C6FB 32 CE 7E                             ld      (varR),a
 710+ C6FE C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve shift counter
 711+ C6FF 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; set K to 0
 712+ C702 22 44 C6                             ld      (SunVarK),hl                ; .
 713+ C705 22 46 C6                             ld      (SunVarK+2),hl              ; .
 714+ C708 CB 78                                bit     7,b                         ; is counter positive
 715+ C70A 28 32                                jr      z,.SunDV12                  ; .
 716+ C70C 3A CE 7E                             ld      a,(varR)                    ;
 717+ C70F CB 27        .SunDVL8:               sla     a                           ; Shift K by 1 left
 718+ C711 21 45 C6                             ld      hl,SunVarK+1                ; .
 719+ C714 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 720+ C716 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 721+ C717 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 722+ C719 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 723+ C71A CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 724+ C71C 04                                   inc     b
 725+ C71D 20 F0                                jr      nz,.SunDVL8                 ; loop until K is shifted
 726+ C71F 32 44 C6                             ld      (SunVarK),a
 727+ C722 3A 47 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarK+3)
 728+ C725 21 4E C6                             ld      hl,SunVarT
 729+ C728 B6                                   or      (hl)
 730+ C729 32 47 C6                             ld      (SunVarK+3),a
 731+ C72C C9                                   ret
 732+ C72D 3A CE 7E     .SunDV13:               ld      a,(varR)                    ; when we get here, shift is zero
 733+ C730 32 44 C6                             ld      (SunVarK),a
 734+ C733 3A 47 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarK+3)
 735+ C736 21 4E C6                             ld      hl,SunVarT
 736+ C739 B6                                   or      (hl)
 737+ C73A 32 47 C6                             ld      (SunVarK+3),a
 738+ C73D C9                                   ret
 739+ C73E 78           .SunDV12:               ld      a,b
 740+ C73F A7                                   and     a
 741+ C740 28 EB                                jr      z,.SunDV13
 742+ C742 3A CE 7E                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; it probably is already R so need to test
 743+ C745 CB 2F        .SunDVL10:              sra     a                           ; Shift K by 1 left
 744+ C747 05                                   dec     b
 745+ C748 20 FB                                jr      nz,.SunDVL10

 751+ C754
 752+ C754
 753+ C754 47           SunProcessVertex:       ld      b,a                         ; save sign byte
 754+ C755 ED 5B 16 C0  .SunProjectToEye:       ld      de,(SBnKzlo)                ; X Pos = X / Z
 755+ C759 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)                ; CDE = z
 756+ C75C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; save sign
 757+ C75E                                      ClearSignBitA
 757+ C75E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 758+ C760                                      ; Addeed as it neds to be AHL/0CD to force * 256 and get correct screen position on scaling
 759+ C760              ;                        ld      c,a                         ;
 760+ C760 5A                                   ld      e,d
 761+ C761 57                                   ld      d,a
 762+ C762 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 763+ C764                                      ; added above to correct positioning as in reality its X/(Z/256)
 764+ C764 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; restore sign byte
 765+ C765 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; save sign
 766+ C767                                      ClearSignBitA
 766+ C767 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 767+ C769 CD 4F C6                             call SunAHLequAHLDivCDE             ; AHL = AHL/CDE unsigned
 768+ C76C              .CheckPosOnScreenX:     JumpIfAIsNotZero .IsOffScreen         ; if A has a value then its way too large regardless of sign
 768+ C76C A7          >                        and     a
 768+ C76D C2 8A C7    >                        jp	    nz,.IsOffScreen
 769+ C770                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet h, .IsOffScreen      ; or bit 7 set of h
 769+ C770 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 769+ C771 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 769+ C773 C2 8A C7    >                        jp      nz,.IsOffScreen
 770+ C776 7C                                   ld      a,h
 771+ C777                                      ReturnIfAGTEusng 4                  ; if a > 1024 then its way too large regardless of sign
 771+ C777 FE 04       >                        cp    4
 771+ C779 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 772+ C77A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now deal with the sign
 773+ C77C FD AD                                xor     iyl
 774+ C77E                                      SignBitOnlyA                        ; a= resultant sign
 774+ C77E E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 775+ C780 28 06                                jr      z,.calculatedVert           ; result is positive so we don't 2's compliment it
 776+ C782              .XIsNegative:           NegHL                               ; make 2's c as negative
 776+ C782 AF          >                    xor a
 776+ C783 95          >                    sub l
 776+ C784 6F          >                    ld l,a
 776+ C785 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 776+ C786 94          >                    sub h
 776+ C787 67          >                    ld h,a
 777+ C788              .calculatedVert:        ClearCarryFlag
 777+ C788 B7          >                        or a
 778+ C789 C9                                   ret
 779+ C78A 21 FF 7F     .IsOffScreen:           ld      hl,$7FFF
 780+ C78D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 781+ C78F FD AD                                xor     iyl
 782+ C791                                      SignBitOnlyA
 782+ C791 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 783+ C793 28 02                                jr      z,.calculatedOffScreen
 784+ C795 23                                   inc     hl                          ; set hl to $8001 i.e. -32768
 785+ C796 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 786+ C797              .calculatedOffScreen:   SetCarryFlag
 786+ C797 37          >                        scf
 787+ C798 C9                                   ret

 789+ C799
 790+ C799              ; .........................................................................................................................
 791+ C799              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 792+ C799 ED 4B 16 C0  SunCalculateRadius:     ld      bc,(SBnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 793+ C79D 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)                ;
 794+ C7A0 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 795+ C7A1 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 796+ C7A4 CD 29 94                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 797+ C7A7 B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 798+ C7A8                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 798+ C7A8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 798+ C7A9 CA AE C7    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 799+ C7AC 1E F8        .MaxRadius:             ld      e,248                       ;set radius to 248 as maxed out
 800+ C7AE 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 801+ C7AF F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 802+ C7B1 32 43 C6                             ld      (SunRadius),a               ; save a copy of radius now for later
 803+ C7B4 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 804+ C7B5 C9                                   ret

 809+ C7BC CD 54 C7                             call    SunProcessVertex

 812+ C7C5 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKylo)

 817+ C7CF                                 ; could probabyl set a variable say "varGood", default as 1 then set to 0 if we end up with a good calulation?? may not need it as we draw here
 818+ C7CF CD 40 C5     SunUpdateAndRender:     call    SunApplyMyRollAndPitch
 819+ C7D2 3A 18 C0     .CheckDrawable:         ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
 820+ C7D5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 48,  SunUpdateCompass ; at a distance over 48 its too far away
 820+ C7D5 FE 30       >                        cp     48
 820+ C7D7 D2 B6 C7    >                        jp		nc,SunUpdateCompass
 821+ C7DA 21 17 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKzhi                  ; if the two high bytes are zero then its too close
 822+ C7DD B6                                   or      (hl)
 823+ C7DE                                      JumpIfAIsZero       SunUpdateCompass
 823+ C7DE A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 823+ C7DF CA B6 C7    >                        jp	    z, SunUpdateCompass
 824+ C7E2 3A 12 C0     .calculateX:            ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 825+ C7E5 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxlo)
 826+ C7E8 CD 54 C7                             call    SunProcessVertex            ; now returns carry set for failure
 827+ C7EB 22 19 C0                             ld      (SunCompassX),hl
 828+ C7EE D8                                   ret     c
 829+ C7EF 1E 80        .calculatedX:           ld      e,ScreenCenterX
 830+ C7F1 16 00                                ld      d,0
 831+ C7F3                                      ClearCarryFlag
 831+ C7F3 B7          >                        or a
 832+ C7F4 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
 833+ C7F6                                      ;call    HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn       ; correct to center of screen
 834+ C7F6 22 3F C6                             ld      (SunScrnX),hl               ; save projected X Position, 2's compliment
 835+ C7F9 3A 15 C0     .calculateY:            ld      a,(SBnKysgn)
 836+ C7FC 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKylo)
 837+ C7FF CD 54 C7                             call    SunProcessVertex            ; now returns carry set for failure
 838+ C802 22 1B C0                             ld      (SunCompassY),hl
 839+ C805 D8                                   ret     c
 840+ C806 1E 60        .calculatedY:           ld      e,ScreenCenterY
 841+ C808 16 00                                ld      d,0
 842+ C80A EB                                   ex      de,hl
 843+ C80B                                      ClearCarryFlag
 843+ C80B B7          >                        or a
 844+ C80C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 845+ C80E                                      ;call    HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn       ; correct to center of screen
 846+ C80E 22 41 C6                             ld      (SunScrnY),hl               ; save projected Y Position, 2's compliment
 847+ C811              ; .........................................................................................................................
 848+ C811 CD 99 C7                             call    SunCalculateRadius
 849+ C814              ; .........................................................................................................................
 850+ C814 2A 3F C6     .CheckIfSunOnScreen:    ld      hl,(SunScrnX)               ; get x pixel position
 851+ C817 FD 26 00                             ld      iyh,0                       ; iyh holds draw status, 0= OK
 852+ C81A 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; e still holds radius
 853+ C81C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 854+ C81D                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckXNegative
 854+ C81D 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 854+ C81E E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 854+ C820 C2 36 C8    >                        jp      nz,.CheckXNegative
 855+ C823 7C           .CheckXPositive:        ld      a,h
 856+ C824                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero its definitly on screen
 856+ C824 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 856+ C825 CA 3F C8    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 857+ C828 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 858+ C82A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 858+ C82A B7          >                        or a
 859+ C82B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 860+ C82D FA 3F C8                             jp      m   ,.XOnScreen             ; if result was negative then it spans screen
 861+ C830 7C                                   ld      a,h
 862+ C831                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero then its partially on screen at least
 862+ C831 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 862+ C832 CA 3F C8    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 863+ C835 C9                                   ret                                 ; None of the X coordinates are on screen
 864+ C836 16 00        .CheckXNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 865+ C838                                      ClearCarryFlag
 865+ C838 B7          >                        or a
 866+ C839 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 867+ C83B F2 3F C8                             jp      p,.XOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 868+ C83E C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 869+ C83F              ; .........................................................................................................................
 870+ C83F 2A 41 C6     .XOnScreen:             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now Check Y coordinate
 871+ C842                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckYNegative
 871+ C842 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 871+ C843 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 871+ C845 C2 66 C8    >                        jp      nz,.CheckYNegative
 872+ C848 7C           .CheckYPositive:        ld      a,h
 873+ C849                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .PosYCheck2
 873+ C849 A7          >                        and     a
 873+ C84A C2 53 C8    >                        jp	    nz,.PosYCheck2
 874+ C84D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 875+ C84E E6 80                                and     %10000000
 876+ C850 CA 6F C8                             jp      z,YOnScreen                ; at least 1 row is on screen as > 128
 877+ C853 16 00        .PosYCheck2:            ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 878+ C855                                      ClearCarryFlag
 878+ C855 B7          >                        or a
 879+ C856 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 880+ C858 FA 6F C8                             jp      m,YOnScreen                ; so if its -ve then it spans screen
 881+ C85B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; if h > 0 then off screen so did not span
 882+ C85C                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 882+ C85C A7          >                        and     a
 882+ C85D C0          >                        ret     nz
 883+ C85E 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; if l > 128 then off screen so did not span
 884+ C85F E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; .
 885+ C861                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 885+ C861 A7          >                        and     a
 885+ C862 C0          >                        ret     nz
 886+ C863 C3 6F C8                             jp      YOnScreen                  ; so Y at least spans
 887+ C866 16 00        .CheckYNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 888+ C868                                      ClearCarryFlag
 888+ C868 B7          >                        or a
 889+ C869 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 890+ C86B F2 6F C8                             jp      p,YOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 891+ C86E C9                                   ret                                 ; else never gets above 0 so return
 892+ C86F              ; .........................................................................................................................
 893+ C86F 21 91 C0     YOnScreen:             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; we load start and end as 0
 894+ C872 11 00 01                             ld		de, SunLineArraySize        ; just if we get a 0,0 genuine we will not plot it
 895+ C875 3E 00                                ld		a,0
 896+ C877 CD 68 7D                             call	memfill_dma
 897+ C87A              ; .........................................................................................................................
 898+ C87A 11 00 00     .SetRaggedEdgeMax:      ld      de,0
 899+ C87D 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; get readius
 900+ C880 FE 60                                cp      96                          ; if > 96 then roll carry flag into e
 901+ C882                                      FlipCarryFlag
 901+ C882 3F          >                        ccf
 902+ C883 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; if > 40 then roll carry flag into e
 903+ C885 FE 28                                cp      40
 904+ C887                                      FlipCarryFlag
 904+ C887 3F          >                        ccf
 905+ C888 CB 13                                rl      e
 906+ C88A FE 10                                cp      16                          ; if > 16 then roll carry flag into e
 907+ C88C                                      FlipCarryFlag
 907+ C88C 3F          >                        ccf
 908+ C88D CB 13                                rl     e
 909+ C88F 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; a = ragged size from %00000111 to %00000000
 910+ C890 32 3C C6                             ld      (RaggedSize),a
 911+ C893              ; .........................................................................................................................
 912+ C893 21 91 C0     .SkipSetK:              ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; prep line array details ready for filling
 913+ C896 22 91 C1                             ld      (LineArrayPtr),hl
 914+ C899 AF                                   xor     a
 915+ C89A 32 3B C6                             ld      (LineCount),a
 916+ C89D              ; .........................................................................................................................
 917+ C89D 2A 41 C6     .GetMinY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now calculate start Y position
 918+ C8A0 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
 919+ C8A3 5F                                   ld      e,a
 920+ C8A4 16 00                                ld      d,0
 921+ C8A6                                      ClearCarryFlag
 921+ C8A6 B7          >                        or a
 922+ C8A7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 923+ C8A9 F2 AF C8                             jp      p,.DoneMinY
 924+ C8AC 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; if its negative then we start with 0 as it can only go up screen after radius
 925+ C8AF              .DoneMinY:              ReturnIfRegNotZero h                ; if h > 0 then off the screen
 925+ C8AF 7C          >                        ld      a, h
 925+ C8B0 A7          >                        and     a
 925+ C8B1 C0          >                        ret     nz
 926+ C8B2 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; check if l > 127
 927+ C8B3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 928+ C8B5 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if bit is set then > 128
 929+ C8B6 7D           .SetMinY:               ld      a,l
 930+ C8B7 32 3D C6                             ld      (MinYOffset),a              ; so now we have Y top of screen
 931+ C8BA 2A 41 C6     .GetMaxY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; get hl = Y + radius, note if we got here then this can never be a negative result but can go from -ve hl to +ve result
 932+ C8BD 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; hl = hl + radius
 933+ C8C0 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; .
 934+ C8C2 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 935+ C8C3                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; .
 935+ C8C3 B7          >                        or a
 936+ C8C4 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; .
 937+ C8C6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 938+ C8C7 A7                                   and     a
 939+ C8C8 28 06                                jr      z,.YHiOK
 940+ C8CA 21 7F 00     .YHiGTE127:             ld      hl,127
 941+ C8CD C3 D9 C8                             jp      .SetMaxY
 942+ C8D0 7D           .YHiOK:                 ld      a,l                         ; clamp at 127
 943+ C8D1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 944+ C8D3 CA D9 C8                             jp      z,.SetMaxY
 945+ C8D6 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127
 946+ C8D9 7D           .SetMaxY                ld      a,l
 947+ C8DA 32 3E C6                             ld      (MaxYOffSet),a              ; so now we have min and max Y coordinates and SunScrnX & Y holds center
 948+ C8DD CD E4 C8                             call    SunDrawCircle
 949+ C8E0 CD D9 C1                             call    SunDraw
 950+ C8E3 C9                                   ret
 951+ C8E4                                      ; b8 04 00 02 00 00 60 01 00 gives a 0.5 so we have the cal wrong as its +-1 so should be * result of divide by 128
 952+ C8E4              ;.. Now we caluclate the circle of the star
 953+ C8E4              ;.. its from MinY down the screen to MaxY center ProjX,ProjY.
 954+ C8E4              ;.. We can use the circle draw logic gtom Bressenham's algorithm
 955+ C8E4              ; so now there are the following conditions to consider
 956+ C8E4              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius <= ABS (Y center)             => Don't draw
 957+ C8E4              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius > ABS (Y center)+1            => Draw bottom half only
 958+ C8E4              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius <= y center - 127             => Don't draw
 959+ C8E4              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius > y center - 127              => Draw top half only
 960+ C8E4              ; y min >= 0  y center > y min     we don't need to worry about radius  => Draw both halves
 961+ C8E4              ; x center + radius < 0                                                 => Don't draw
 962+ C8E4              ; x center - radius > 255                                               => Don't draw
 963+ C8E4              ; we won't consider x more here as the driver is the y coordinate but we will check if x is vaiable
 964+ C8E4              ; x point = max (x point, 0)   on left
 965+ C8E4              ; x point = min (x point, 255) on right
 966+ C8E4
 967+ C8E4              SetIYPlusOffset:        MACRO   reg
 968+ C8E4 ~                                    push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
 969+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 970+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      a,reg
 971+ C8E4 ~                                    add     hl,a
 972+ C8E4 ~                                    add     hl,a
 973+ C8E4 ~                                    push    hl
 974+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     iy
 975+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     hl
 976+ C8E4                                      ENDM
 977+ C8E4
 978+ C8E4              SetIYMinusOffset:       MACRO   reg
 979+ C8E4 ~                                    push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
 980+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 981+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      a,reg
 982+ C8E4 ~                                    add     a,a
 983+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      e,a
 984+ C8E4 ~                                    ld      d,0
 985+ C8E4 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
 986+ C8E4 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
 987+ C8E4 ~                                    push    hl
 988+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     iy
 989+ C8E4 ~                                    pop     de,,hl
 990+ C8E4                                      ENDM
 991+ C8E4
 992+ C8E4
 993+ C8E4              ;;;-SunDrawCircle:          ld      a,(SunRadius)
 994+ C8E4              ;;;-.CheckRadius:           ReturnIfAIsZero                         ; elimiate zero or single pixel
 995+ C8E4              ;;;-                        JumpIfAEqNusng  1, SunCircleSinglePixel
 996+ C8E4              ;;;-                       ; JumpIfAGTENusng 127, SunFullScreen      ; if its covering whole then just make it yellow
 997+ C8E4              ;;;-; already done .MakeCentreX2C:         MemSignedTo2C SunScrnX                   ; convert 16 bit signed to 2's compliment
 998+ C8E4              ;;;-; already done .MakeCentreY2C:         MemSignedTo2C SunScrnY                   ; .
 999+ C8E4              ;;;-.BoundsCheck            ld      hl,(SunScrnY)
1000+ C8E4              ;;;-                        push    hl
1001+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,(SunRadius)
1002+ C8E4              ;;;-                        add     hl,a
1003+ C8E4              ;;;-                        bit     7,h
1004+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ret     nz                              ; if Y + radius is negative then off the screen
1005+ C8E4              ;;;-                        pop     hl
1006+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      d,0
1007+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      e,a
1008+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ClearCarryFlag
1009+ C8E4              ;;;-                        sbc     hl,de
1010+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,h
1011+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ReturnIfAGTENusng  1                     ; really shoudl be signed TODO
1012+ C8E4              ;;;-
1013+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      hl,(SunScrnX)
1014+ C8E4              ;;;-                        push    hl
1015+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,(SunRadius)
1016+ C8E4              ;;;-                        add     hl,a
1017+ C8E4              ;;;-                        bit     7,h
1018+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ret     nz                              ; if Y + radius is negative then off the screen
1019+ C8E4              ;;;-                        pop     hl
1020+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      d,0
1021+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      e,a
1022+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ClearCarryFlag
1023+ C8E4              ;;;-                        sbc     hl,de
1024+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ld      a,h
1025+ C8E4              ;;;-
1026+ C8E4              ;;;-                        ReturnIfAGTENusng 1                      ; really shoudl be signed TODO
1027+ C8E4              SunDrawCircle
1028+ C8E4                                      ; ** BNOTE Ptuichj abnd roll has a bug as piitch increases z axis value
1029+ C8E4              .PrepCircleData:       ; ld      ixl,0
1030+ C8E4                                     ; ld		(.Plot1+1),bc			        ; save origin into DE reg in code
1031+ C8E4 3A 43 C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
1032+ C8E7 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a							; ixh = radius
1033+ C8E9 DD 2E 00                             ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = delta (y)
1034+ C8EC 26 00        .calcd:	                ld		h,0                             ; de = radius * 2
1035+ C8EE 6F                                   ld		l,a                             ; .
1036+ C8EF 29                                   add		hl,hl							; .
1037+ C8F0 EB                                   ex		de,hl							; .
1038+ C8F1 21 03 00                             ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
1039+ C8F4 A7                                   and		a                               ; .
1040+ C8F5 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; .
1041+ C8F7 44                                   ld		b,h                             ; bc = 3 - (r * 2) : d = 3 - 2r
1042+ C8F8 4D                                   ld		c,l								; .
1043+ C8F9 21 01 00     .calcdelta:             ld		hl,1                            ; set hl to 1
1044+ C8FC 16 00                                ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl
1045+ C8FE DD 5D                                ld		e,ixl                           ;
1046+ C900                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1046+ C900 B7          >                        or a
1047+ C901 ED 52                                sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - ixl
1048+ C903 11 01 00     .Setde1:                ld		de,1                            ; del = 1
1049+ C906 DD 7C        .CircleLoop:            ld		a,ixh                           ; if x = y then exit
1050+ C908 DD BD                                cp		ixl                             ;
1051+ C90A D8                                   ret		c                               ;
1052+ C90B D9           .ProcessLoop:	        exx                                     ; save out registers
1053+ C90C              ; Process CY+Y CX+X & CY+Y CX-X..................................
1054+ C90C 2A 41 C6     .Plot1:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1055+ C90F DD 7C        .Get1YRow:              ld      a,ixh
1056+ C911 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y (note is add hl ,a usginedf only??)
1057+ C913              .Check1YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTopPixelPair
1057+ C913 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1057+ C914 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1057+ C915 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1057+ C917 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1057+ C918 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1057+ C91A 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ;
1058+ C91C              .Write1YCoord:          SetIYPlusOffset ixh                     ; IY = IY + ixh
1058+ C91C E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1058+ C91F E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1058+ C920 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1058+ C922 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C924 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C926 E5          >                        push    hl
1058+ C927 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1058+ C929 E1          >                        pop     hl
1059+ C92A                                      IYEquRowN l                             ; IY = SBnkLineArray + (2 * l) - set up iy as target address
1059+ C92A 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1059+ C92B 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1059+ C92E ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1059+ C930 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1059+ C932 E5          >                        push    hl
1059+ C933 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1060+ C935 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1061+ C937 CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1062+ C93A C3 3D C9                             jp      .Plot2
1063+ C93D              .NoTopPixelPair:        ;break
1064+ C93D              ; Process CY-Y CX+X & CY-Y CX-X..................................
1065+ C93D 2A 41 C6     .Plot2:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1066+ C940 16 00        .Get2YRow:              ld      d,0
1067+ C942 DD 5C                                ld      e,ixh
1068+ C944                                      ClearCarryFlag
1068+ C944 B7          >                        or a
1069+ C945 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1070+ C947              .Check2YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottomPixelPair
1070+ C947 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1070+ C948 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1070+ C949 20 2B       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1070+ C94B 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1070+ C94C E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1070+ C94E 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ;
1071+ C950                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixh
1071+ C950 D5 E5 FD E5 >                        push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
1071+ C954 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1071+ C955 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1071+ C957 87          >                        add     a,a
1071+ C958 5F          >                        ld      e,a
1071+ C959 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
1071+ C95B             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1071+ C95B B7          >                        or a
1071+ C95C ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1071+ C95E E5          >                        push    hl
1071+ C95F FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1071+ C961 E1 D1       >                        pop     de,,hl
1072+ C963              .Write2YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1072+ C963 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1072+ C964 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1072+ C967 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1072+ C969 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1072+ C96B E5          >                        push    hl
1072+ C96C FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1073+ C96E DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1074+ C970 CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1075+ C973 C3 76 C9                             jp      .Plot3
1076+ C976              .NoBottomPixelPair:     ;break
1077+ C976              ; Process CY+X CX+Y & CY+X CX-Y..................................
1078+ C976 2A 41 C6     .Plot3:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1079+ C979 DD 7D        .Get3YRow:              ld      a,ixl
1080+ C97B ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y
1081+ C97D              .Check3YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTop3PixelPair
1081+ C97D 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1081+ C97E A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1081+ C97F 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1081+ C981 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1081+ C982 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1081+ C984 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ;
1082+ C986                                      SetIYPlusOffset ixl
1082+ C986 E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1082+ C989 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1082+ C98A DD 7D       >                        ld      a,ixl
1082+ C98C ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1082+ C98E ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1082+ C990 E5          >                        push    hl
1082+ C991 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1082+ C993 E1          >                        pop     hl
1083+ C994              .Write3YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1083+ C994 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1083+ C995 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1083+ C998 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1083+ C99A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1083+ C99C E5          >                        push    hl
1083+ C99D FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1084+ C99F DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
1085+ C9A1 CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1086+ C9A4 C3 A7 C9                             jp      .Plot4
1087+ C9A7              .NoTop3PixelPair:       ;break
1088+ C9A7              ; Process CY-X CX+Y & CY-X CX-Y..................................
1089+ C9A7 2A 41 C6     .Plot4:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1090+ C9AA 16 00        .Get4YRow:              ld      d,0
1091+ C9AC DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl
1092+ C9AE                                      ClearCarryFlag
1092+ C9AE B7          >                        or a
1093+ C9AF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1094+ C9B1              .Check4YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottom4PixelPair
1094+ C9B1 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1094+ C9B2 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1094+ C9B3 20 28       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottom4PixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1094+ C9B5 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1094+ C9B6 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1094+ C9B8 20 23       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottom4PixelPair                   ;
1095+ C9BA                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixl
1095+ C9BA D5 E5 FD E5 >                        push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
1095+ C9BE E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1095+ C9BF DD 7D       >                        ld      a,ixl
1095+ C9C1 87          >                        add     a,a
1095+ C9C2 5F          >                        ld      e,a
1095+ C9C3 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
1095+ C9C5             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1095+ C9C5 B7          >                        or a
1095+ C9C6 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1095+ C9C8 E5          >                        push    hl
1095+ C9C9 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1095+ C9CB E1 D1       >                        pop     de,,hl
1096+ C9CD              .Write4YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1096+ C9CD 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1096+ C9CE 21 91 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1096+ C9D1 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1096+ C9D3 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1096+ C9D5 E5          >                        push    hl
1096+ C9D6 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1097+ C9D8 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
1098+ C9DA CD 0A CA                             call    ProcessXRowA
1099+ C9DD              .NoBottom4PixelPair:
1100+ C9DD              ; Completed one iteration........................................
1101+ C9DD D9                                   exx
1102+ C9DE CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	    bit     7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
1103+ C9E0 28 03                                jr z,   .draw_circle_1
1104+ C9E2 19                                   add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
1105+ C9E3 18 05                                jr      .draw_circle_2		;
1106+ C9E5 09           .draw_circle_1:		    add     hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
1107+ C9E6 03                                   inc     bc
1108+ C9E7 03                                   inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
1109+ C9E8 DD 25                                dec     ixh				; Y=Y-1
1110+ C9EA 03           .draw_circle_2:		    inc bc				    ; D2=D2+2
1111+ C9EB 03                                   inc bc
1112+ C9EC 13                                   inc de				    ; D1=D1+2
1113+ C9ED 13                                   inc de
1114+ C9EE DD 2C                                inc ixl				    ; X=X+1
1115+ C9F0 C3 06 C9                             jp      .CircleLoop
1116+ C9F3 2A 3F C6     SunCircleSinglePixel:     ld      hl,(SunScrnX)
1117+ C9F6 7C                                   ld      a,h
1118+ C9F7 A7                                   and     a
1119+ C9F8 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1120+ C9F9 4D                                   ld      c,l
1121+ C9FA 2A 41 C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)
1122+ C9FD 7C                                   ld      a,h
1123+ C9FE A7                                   and     a
1124+ C9FF C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1125+ CA00 7D                                   ld      a,l
1126+ CA01 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
1127+ CA03 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if l > 127 then no pixel
1128+ CA04 47                                   ld      b,a
1129+ CA05 7B                                   ld		a,e
1130+ CA06 CD 08 E3                             call	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
1131+ CA09 C9                                   ret
1132+ CA0A
1133+ CA0A              ProcessXRowA:           ;break
1134+ CA0A 2A 3F C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; get X Center
1135+ CA0D F5                                   push    af                              ; save A (curent offset +/- value
1136+ CA0E ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Hl = HL + offset
1137+ CA10 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; is HL negative?, if so then set C to 0
1138+ CA11 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;
1139+ CA13 20 14                                jr      nz,.XCoordNegative              ; We can have this for non X + Radius i.e. the equater
1140+ CA15 A7                                   and     a                               ; if H <> 0? (why by here must be +ve), set c to $FF
1141+ CA16 20 16                                jr      nz,.XCoordMaxed                 ; .
1142+ CA18 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ; else set c to l and do the -ve offset
1143+ CA19 C5           .AddFuzz:               push    bc
1144+ CA1A CD 68 84                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1145+ CA1D C1                                   pop     bc
1146+ CA1E 21 3C C6                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1147+ CA21 A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1148+ CA22 81                                   add     c                               ;
1149+ CA23 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;
1150+ CA24 38 08                                jr      c,.XCoordMaxed                  ; has fuzz caused a carry, if so > 255 to make 255
1151+ CA26 C3 30 CA                             jp      .ProcessSubtract                ;
1152+ CA29 0E 00        .XCoordNegative:        ld      c,0                             ; if it was negative then 0
1153+ CA2B C3 30 CA                             jp      .ProcessSubtract
1154+ CA2E 0E FF        .XCoordMaxed:           ld      c,255                           ; if it was +ve then 255
1155+ CA30 F1           .ProcessSubtract:       pop     af                              ; get offset back
1156+ CA31 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; but goes into DE as its a subtract
1157+ CA32 16 00                                ld      d,0
1158+ CA34 2A 3F C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; so do subtract
1159+ CA37                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1159+ CA37 B7          >                        or a
1160+ CA38 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1161+ CA3A FA 57 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1162+ CA3D E5 C5        .AddFuzzSubtract:       push    hl,,bc
1163+ CA3F CD 68 84                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1164+ CA42 C1                                   pop     bc
1165+ CA43 21 3C C6                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1166+ CA46 A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1167+ CA47 5F                                   ld      e,a
1168+ CA48 E1                                   pop     hl
1169+ CA49 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1170+ CA4B FA 57 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1171+ CA4E 7C                                   ld      a,h
1172+ CA4F A7                                   and     a
1173+ CA50 C2 5C CA                             jp      nz,.XCordLeftMaxed
1174+ CA53 45                                   ld      b,l
1175+ CA54 C3 5E CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1176+ CA57 06 00        .XCoordLeftNegative:    ld      b,0
1177+ CA59 C3 5E CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1178+ CA5C 06 FF        .XCordLeftMaxed:        ld      b,255
1179+ CA5E 78           .CompletedXCoords:      ld      a,b
1180+ CA5F FD 77 00     .RowSaveIY1             ld      (iy+0),a                        ; iy holds current line array index
1181+ CA62 79                                   ld      a,c
1182+ CA63 FD 77 01     .RowSaveIY3             ld      (iy+1),a
1183+ CA66 C9                                   ret
1184+ CA67
1185+ CA67              ; .....................................................
1186+ CA67              ; if the universe object is a planet or sun then do that instead
1187+ CA67              ;;TODOProcessPlanet:          cp      129
1188+ CA67              ;;TODO                        jr      nz, .ItsAPlanet
1189+ CA67              ;;TODO.ItsAStar:              ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
1190+ CA67              ;;TODO                        cp      48                               ; if z > 48 (it must be positive to enter this routine)
1191+ CA67
1192+ CA67
1193+ CA67              ; Square Root using tables
1194+ CA67              ; DE = number to find
1195+ CA67 21 87 CC     SunLookupSqrtDE:        ld      hl,SunSquareRootTable
1196+ CA6A 7A           .LookupCorseJump:       ld      a,d
1197+ CA6B ED 31                                add     hl,a
1198+ CA6D ED 31                                add     hl,a
1199+ CA6F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1200+ CA70 23                                   inc     hl
1201+ CA71 66                                   ld      h,(hl)
1202+ CA72 6F                                   ld      l,a
1203+ CA73 7E           .FineSearchLoop:        ld      a,(hl)
1204+ CA74                                      JumpIfAEqNusng  e, .FoundByte
1204+ CA74 BB          >                        cp     e
1204+ CA75 CA 81 CA    >                        jp      z,.FoundByte
1205+ CA78                                      JumpIfAGTENusng e, .PreviousByte
1205+ CA78 BB          >                        cp     e
1205+ CA79 D2 84 CA    >                        jp		nc,.PreviousByte
1206+ CA7C 23           .NotFound:              inc     hl
1207+ CA7D 23                                   inc     hl
1208+ CA7E C3 73 CA                             jp      .FineSearchLoop
1209+ CA81 23           .FoundByte:             inc     hl
1210+ CA82 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1211+ CA83 C9                                   ret
1212+ CA84 2B           .PreviousByte:          dec     hl
1213+ CA85 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1214+ CA86 C9                                   ret

1704+ D033
1705+ D033
1706+ D033
1707+ D033              SunBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfSun
1708+ D033
1709+ D033

1104  D033                                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankSunData," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-SunBankAddr), " - BankSunData"
1105  D033                                  ASSERT $-SunBankAddr <8912, Bank code leaks over 8K boundary

   1+ C000
   2+ C000              ;- DEBUG CODE
   3+ C000                                      IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
   4+ C000 ~            TestBLINE:              ld  a,$FF
   5+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKFlag),a
   6+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,5
   7+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKSTP),a
   8+ C000 ~                                    ZeroA
   9+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKCNT),a
  10+ C000 ~            .DebugLoop:             ld  ix,(DataPointer)
  11+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+0)
  12+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  13+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+1)
  14+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  15+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewXPos),hl
  16+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+2)
  17+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  18+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+3)
  19+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  20+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewYPos),hl
  21+ C000 ~                                    call    BLINE
  22+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,(DataPointCounter)
  23+ C000 ~                                    inc     a
  24+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,DataPointSize
  25+ C000 ~                                    cp      (hl)
  26+ C000 ~                                    ret     z
  27+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointCounter),a
  28+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,(DataPointer)
  29+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,4
  30+ C000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointer),hl
  32+ C000 ~                                    jp      .DebugLoop
  33+ C000 ~
  34+ C000 ~            DataPoints:             DW  10,10, 20,60, 30,20, 40,50, 100,90, 150, 30
  35+ C000 ~            DataPointSize           DB  6
  36+ C000 ~            DataPointCounter        DB  0
  37+ C000 ~            DataPointer:            DW  DataPoints
  38+ C000                                      ENDIF

  56+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  57+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  58+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  59+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
  60+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
  61+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
  62+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  63+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  64+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  65+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  66+ C000
  67+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  68+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  69+ C000 50 6C 61 6E  StartOfPlanet:     DB "Planet Data....."

  69+ C008 61 74 61 2E
  69+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E

  96+ C110 00          >P_XX12p2      DB 0    ; The line's gradient * 256 (so 1.0 = 256)
  96+ C111 00          >P_XX12p3      DB 0    ; The direction of slope ; + LT to BR; - TR to BL
  96+ C112 00          >P_XX12p4      DB 0
  96+ C113 00          >P_XX12p5      DB 0
  96+ C114             >P_Delta_x     EQU P_XX12p2
  96+ C114             >P_Delta_y     EQU P_XX12p4
  96+ C114 00          >P_Tvar        DB 0    ; The gradient of slope ; 0 if it's a shallow slope (DX > DY) ; &FF if it's a steep slope (DY > DX) Returns:  XX15        m         x1 as an 8-bit coordinate XX15+2               y1 as an 8-bit coordinate
  96+ C115 00          >P_Qvar        DB 0
  96+ C116 00          >P_Rvar        DB 0    ; general purpose for calcs  Paired with S must be done this way round for SUBHeightFromY1 etc to work
  96+ C117 00          >P_Svar        DB 0    ; sign variable
  96+ C118             >P_SRvarPair   EQU P_Rvar
  96+ C118 00          >P_Xreg        DB 0
  96+ C119 00          >P_Yreg        DB 0
  96+ C11A             >P_YXregPair   EQU P_Xreg
  97+ C11A
  98+ C11A
  99+ C11A              P_BnK_Data_len               EQU $ - P_BnKDataBlock
 100+ C11A
 101+ C11A
 102+ C11A                                          ClippingCodeLL28Macro P
 102+ C11A 21 B2 F1    >P_LL28_6502:         ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
 102+ C11D 4E          >                            ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
 102+ C11E B9          >                            cp      c
 102+ C11F             >                            FlipCarryFlag
 102+ C11F 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C120 DA 48 C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL2_6502    ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
 102+ C123 06 FE       >                            ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
 102+ C125 CB 27       >P_LL31_6502:          sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
 102+ C127 DA 3C C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
 102+ C12A             >                            FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
 102+ C12A 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C12B             >                            JumpIfALTNusng c, P_LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
 102+ C12B B9          >                        cp      c
 102+ C12C DA 31 C1    >                        jp		c, P_LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
 102+ C12F             >                                                                ; BCC P%+4
 102+ C12F 91          >                            sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 102+ C130             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 102+ C130 B7          >                        or a
 102+ C131             >P_LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:  FlipCarryFlag
 102+ C131 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C132 CB 10       >                            rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
 102+ C134 DA 25 C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
