 330+ C62A 2A E5 C0                             ld			hl,(P_BnKXScaled)
 331+ C62D ED 5B E7 C0                          ld			de,(P_BnKYScaled)
 332+ C631 78           .SetABSbc:              ld			a,b
 333+ C632 DD 67                                ld			ixh,a
 334+ C634 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 335+ C636 47                                   ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
 336+ C637 7C           .SetABShl:              ld			a,h
 337+ C638 DD 6F                                ld			ixl,a
 338+ C63A E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 339+ C63C 67                                   ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
 340+ C63D 7A           .SetABSde:              ld			a,d
 341+ C63E FD 67                                ld			iyh,a
 342+ C640 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 343+ C642 57                                   ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
 344+ C643 78           .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:   ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
 345+ C644 B4                                   or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
 346+ C645 B2                                   or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
 347+ C646 28 0F                                jr          z,.ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
 348+ C648                                      ShiftHLRight1
 348+ C648 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348+ C64A CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349+ C64C                                      ShiftDERight1
 349+ C64C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 349+ C64E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 350+ C650                                      ShiftBCRight1
 350+ C650 CB 38       >			   srl b
 350+ C652 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 351+ C654 C3 43 C6                             jp          .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
 352+ C657              ; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
 353+ C657 DD 7C        .ScaleNodeDone:          ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
 354+ C659 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 355+ C65B B0                                   or			b
 356+ C65C 47                                   ld			b,a
 357+ C65D DD 7D        .SignforHL:              ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
 358+ C65F E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 359+ C661 B4                                   or			h
 360+ C662 67                                   ld			h,a
 361+ C663 FD 7C        .SignforDE:              ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
 362+ C665 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 363+ C667 B2                                   or			d
 364+ C668 57                                   ld			d,a
 365+ C669 ED 43 E9 C0  .SignsDoneSaveResult:	ld			(P_BnKZScaled),bc
 366+ C66D 22 E5 C0                             ld			(P_BnKXScaled),hl
 367+ C670 ED 53 E7 C0                          ld			(P_BnKYScaled),de
 368+ C674 78                                   ld			a,b
 369+ C675 32 CC 7E                             ld			(varU),a
 370+ C678 79                                   ld			a,c
 371+ C679 32 E9 7E                             ld			(varT),a
 372+ C67C C9                                   ret
 373+ C67D
 374+ C67D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 375+ C67D                                      include "./Universe/Planet/CopyPlanetXX12ScaledToPlanetXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Planet/CopyPlanetXX12ScaledToPlanetXX18.asm
   1++C67D              CopyPSXX12ScaledToPXX18:
   2++C67D              CopyResultToPDrawCam:
   3++C67D                      ldCopyByte P_XX12         ,P_XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++C67D 3A EB C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12)
   3++C680 32 5E C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18),a
   4++C683                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+1       ,P_XX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++C683 3A EC C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+1)
   4++C686 32 60 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+2),a
   5++C689                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+2       ,P_XX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++C689 3A ED C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+2)
   5++C68C 32 61 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+3),a
   6++C68F                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+3       ,P_XX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++C68F 3A EE C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+3)
   6++C692 32 63 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+5),a
   7++C695                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+4       ,P_XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++C695 3A EF C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+4)
   7++C698 32 64 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+6),a
   8++C69B                      ldCopyByte P_XX12+5       ,P_XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++C69B 3A F0 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_XX12+5)
   8++C69E 32 66 C0    >                        ld       (P_XX18+8),a

# file opened: ././Universe/Planet/CopyPlanetPosToPlanetXX15.asm
   1++C6A2              PlanetCopyPosToXX15:    ldCopyByte  P_BnKxhi         ,P_BnKXScaled        ; xlo
   1++C6A2 3A 11 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKxhi)
   1++C6A5 32 E5 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKXScaled),a
   2++C6A8                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKxsgn        ,P_BnKXScaledSign    ; xsg
   2++C6A8 3A 12 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKxsgn)
   2++C6AB 32 E6 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKXScaledSign),a
   3++C6AE                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKyhi         ,P_BnKYScaled        ; xlo
   3++C6AE 3A 14 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKyhi)
   3++C6B1 32 E7 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKYScaled),a
   4++C6B4                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKysgn        ,P_BnKYScaledSign    ; xsg
   4++C6B4 3A 15 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKysgn)
   4++C6B7 32 E8 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKYScaledSign),a
   5++C6BA                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKzhi         ,P_BnKZScaled        ; xlo
   5++C6BA 3A 17 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKzhi)
   5++C6BD 32 E9 C0    >                        ld       (P_BnKZScaled),a
   6++C6C0                                      ldCopyByte  P_BnKzsgn        ,P_BnKZScaledSign    ; xsg
   6++C6C0 3A 18 C0    >                        ld       a,(P_BnKzsgn)

 377+ C6C7
 378+ C6C7              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
 379+ C6C7                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Planet/PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Planet/PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++C6C7
   2++C6C7              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3++C6C7              ; Planet version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
   4++C6C7              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
   5++C6C7 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulX            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   6++C6CB 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulY            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   7++C6CF 00 00 00 00  PlanetAlphaMulZ            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   8++C6D3 00 00 00 00  PlanetBetaMulZ             DB $00,$00, $00, $00
   9++C6D7 00 00 00 00  PlanetBetaMulY             DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  10++C6DB 00 00 00     PlanetK2                   DS 3
  11++C6DE
  12++C6DE              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  13++C6DE              ; Sun version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
  14++C6DE              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
  15++C6DE
  16++C6DE              ; Gets values backwards, is it 24 bit safe?
  17++C6DE
  18++C6DE 3A E6 7D     PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch: 	ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
  19++C6E1 A7           .CheckForRoll:              and		a
  20++C6E2 C4 0A C7     							call	nz,Planet_Roll
  21++C6E5 3A D9 7D     .CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
  22++C6E8 A7           							and		a
  23++C6E9 C4 70 C7     							call	nz,Planet_Pitch
  24++C6EC 3A C7 7E     .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
  25++C6EF              							ReturnIfAIsZero
  25++C6EF A7          >                        and     a
  25++C6F0 C8          >                        ret     z
  26++C6F1 0E 00        							ld      c,0                         ;
  27++C6F3 67           							ld      h,a                         ;
  28++C6F4 06 80        							ld      b,$80                       ;
  29++C6F6 ED 5B 17 C0  							ld      de,(P_BnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
  30++C6FA 3A 16 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ; .
  31++C6FD 6F           							ld      l,a                         ; .
  32++C6FE CD 10 01     							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
  33++C701 ED 53 17 C0  							ld      (P_BnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
  34++C705 7D           							ld      a,l
  35++C706 32 16 C0     							ld      (P_BnKzlo),a                ;
  36++C709 C9           							ret
  37++C70A
  38++C70A              ; Performs minsky rotation
  39++C70A              ; Joystick left          Joystick right
  40++C70A              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
  41++C70A              ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
  42++C70A              ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
  43++C70A              ;
  44++C70A              ; Joystick down          Joystick up
  45++C70A              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
  46++C70A              ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
  47++C70A              ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
  48++C70A              ;
  49++C70A              ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
  50++C70A              ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
  51++C70A              ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
  52++C70A 3A E6 7D     Planet_Roll:				ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  53++C70D E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  54++C70F 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  55++C710 3A 13 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  56++C713 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  57++C714 2A 14 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKyhi)               ; .
  58++C717 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  59++C71A 7D           							ld		a,l
  60++C71B 32 CB C6     							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulY),a			; save result
  61++C71E ED 53 CC C6  							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
  62++C722 3A E6 7D     							ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  63++C725 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  64++C727 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  65++C728 3A 10 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  66++C72B 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  67++C72C 2A 11 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKxhi)               ; .
  68++C72F CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  69++C732 7D           							ld		a,l
  70++C733 32 C7 C6     							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulX),a			; save result
  71++C736 ED 53 C8 C6  							ld		(PlanetAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
  72++C73A 3A E6 7D     							ld		a,(ALPHA)
  73++C73D E6 80        							and		$80
  74++C73F CA 59 C7     							jp		z,.RollingRight
  75++C742 DD 21 10 C0  .RollingLeft:				ld		ix,P_BnKxlo
  76++C746 FD 21 CB C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulY
  77++C74A CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  78++C74D DD 21 13 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKylo
  79++C751 FD 21 C7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulX
  80++C755 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  81++C758 C9           							ret
  82++C759 DD 21 10 C0  .RollingRight:				ld		ix,P_BnKxlo
  83++C75D FD 21 CB C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulY
  84++C761 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  85++C764 DD 21 13 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKylo
  86++C768 FD 21 C7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetAlphaMulX
  87++C76C CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  88++C76F C9           							ret
  89++C770
  90++C770 3A D9 7D     Planet_Pitch:				ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
  91++C773 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
  92++C775 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
  93++C776 3A 13 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  94++C779 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
  95++C77A 2A 14 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKyhi)               ; .
  96++C77D CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  97++C780 7D           							ld		a,l
  98++C781 32 D7 C6     							ld		(PlanetBetaMulY),a			; save result
  99++C784 ED 53 D8 C6  							ld		(PlanetBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 100++C788 3A D9 7D     							ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 101++C78B E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 102++C78D 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 103++C78E 3A 16 C0     							ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 104++C791 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 105++C792 2A 17 C0     							ld      hl,(P_BnKzhi)               ; .
 106++C795 CD 17 91     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 107++C798 7D           							ld		a,l
 108++C799 32 D3 C6     							ld		(PlanetBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 109++C79C ED 53 D4 C6  							ld		(PlanetBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 110++C7A0 3A D9 7D     							ld		a,(BETA)
 111++C7A3 E6 80        							and		$80
 112++C7A5 CA BF C7     							jp		z,.Climbing
 113++C7A8 DD 21 13 C0  .Diving:					ld		ix,P_BnKylo
 114++C7AC FD 21 D3 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulZ
 115++C7B0 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 116++C7B3 DD 21 16 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKzlo
 117++C7B7 FD 21 D7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulY
 118++C7BB CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 119++C7BE C9           							ret
 120++C7BF DD 21 13 C0  .Climbing:		     		ld		ix,P_BnKylo
 121++C7C3 FD 21 D3 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulZ
 122++C7C7 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 123++C7CA DD 21 16 C0  							ld		ix,P_BnKzlo
 124++C7CE FD 21 D7 C6  							ld		iy,PlanetBetaMulY
 125++C7D2 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 126++C7D5 C9           							ret

 474+ C84A
 475+ C84A              ; Drawing planets Subroutine: PL2 (Flight) Remove the planet or sun from the screen
 476+ C84A              ;                             PLANET (Flight) Draw the planet or sun
 477+ C84A              ;                             PL9 (Part 1 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet, with either an equator and meridian, or a crater
 478+ C84A              ;                             PL9 (Part 2 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet's equator and meridian
 479+ C84A              ;                             PL9 (Part 3 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet's crater
 480+ C84A              ;                             PLS1 (Flight)  Calculate (Y A) = nosev_x / z
 481+ C84A              ;                             PLS2 (Flight) Draw a half-ellipse
 482+ C84A              ;                             PLS22 (Flight) Draw an ellipse or half-ellipse
 483+ C84A
 484+ C84A
 485+ C84A              ; Drawing circles Subroutine: CIRCLE (Flight) Draw a circle for the planet
 486+ C84A              ;                             CIRCLE2 (Flight) Draw a circle (for the planet or chart)
 487+ C84A              ;                             WPLS2 (Flight) Remove the planet from the screen
 488+ C84A              ;                             WP1 (Flight) Reset the ball line heap
 489+ C84A              ; Drawing planets PL21 (Flight) Return from a planet/sun-drawing routine with a failure flag
 490+ C84A              ;                 PLS3 (Flight) Calculate (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z
 491+ C84A              ;                 PLS4 (Flight) Calculate CNT2 = arctan(P / A) / 4
 492+ C84A              ;                 PLS5 (Flight) Calculate roofv_x / z and roofv_y / z
 493+ C84A              ;                 PLS6 (Flight) Calculate (X K) = (A P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 494+ C84A              ; SPS1 (Flight) Calculate the vector to the planet and store it in XX15
 495+ C84A              ; MV40 rate planet by our pitch
 496+ C84A              ;
 497+ C84A              ;look at PL9
 498+ C84A
 499+ C84A
 500+ C84A              ; Optimisation
 501+ C84A              ; if a <> 0
 502+ C84A              ;       divide AH by CD
 503+ C84A              ; if h <> 0
 504+ C84A              ;      if c <> 0 return 0
 505+ C84A              ;      else
 506+ C84A              ;        divide HL by DE
 507+ C84A              ; if l <>0
 508+ C84A              ;      if c or d <> 0 return 0
 509+ C84A              ;      else
 510+ C84A              ;        divide l by e
 511+ C84A              ;
 512+ C84A 47           PlanetAHLequAHLDivCDE:  ld      b,a                         ; save a reg
 513+ C84B 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; check for divide by zero
 514+ C84C B2                                   or      d                           ; .
 515+ C84D B3                                   or      e                           ; .
 516+ C84E                                      JumpIfZero      .divideByZero       ; .
 516+ C84E CA 67 C8    >                        jp	z,.divideByZero
 517+ C851 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; get a back
 518+ C852                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideAHLbyCDE
 518+ C852 A7          >                        and     a
 518+ C853 C2 6F C8    >                        jp	    nz,.divideAHLbyCDE
 519+ C856 7C           .AIsZero:               ld      a,h
 520+ C857                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideHLbyDE
 520+ C857 A7          >                        and     a
 520+ C858 C2 76 C8    >                        jp	    nz,.divideHLbyDE
 521+ C85B 7D           .HIsZero:               ld      a,l
 522+ C85C                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideLbyE
 522+ C85C A7          >                        and     a
 522+ C85D C2 85 C8    >                        jp	    nz,.divideLbyE
 523+ C860              .resultIsZero:          ZeroA
 523+ C860 AF          >                        xor a
 524+ C861 67                                   ld      h,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 525+ C862 6F                                   ld      l,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 526+ C863 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 527+ C865                                      ClearCarryFlag
 527+ C865 B7          >                        or a
 528+ C866 C9                                   ret
 529+ C867 3E FF        .divideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 530+ C869 67                                   ld      h,a
 531+ C86A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 532+ C86B 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 533+ C86D                                      SetCarryFlag
 533+ C86D 37          >                        scf
 534+ C86E C9                                   ret
 535+ C86F              ; AHL = ahl/cde, this could be a genuine 24 bit divide
 536+ C86F              ; if AHL is large and cde small then the value will be big so will be off screen so we can risk 16 bit divide
 537+ C86F CD 5E 8F     .divideAHLbyCDE:        call    Div24by24
 538+ C872 EB                                   ex      hl,de                         ; ahl is result
 539+ C873 79                                   ld      a,c                           ; ahl is result
 540+ C874                                      ClearCarryFlag
 540+ C874 B7          >                        or a
 541+ C875 C9                                   ret
 542+ C876              ; AHL = 0hl/0de as A is zero
 543+ C876 79           .divideHLbyDE:          ld      a,c                         ;'if c = 0 then result must be zero
 544+ C877                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 544+ C877 A7          >                        and     a
 544+ C878 C2 60 C8    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 545+ C87B 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 546+ C87D CD 89 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                   ; BC = HL/DE
 547+ C880 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 548+ C882                                      ZeroA                               ; so we can set A to Zero
 548+ C882 AF          >                        xor a
 549+ C883                                      ClearCarryFlag
 549+ C883 B7          >                        or a
 550+ C884 C9                                   ret
 551+ C885              ; AHL = 00l/00e as A and H are zero
 552+ C885 79           .divideLbyE:            ld      a,c                         ; if d = 0 then result must be zero
 553+ C886 B2                                   or      d
 554+ C887                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 554+ C887 A7          >                        and     a
 554+ C888 C2 60 C8    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 555+ C88B 4B                                   ld      c,e
 556+ C88C 5D                                   ld      e,l
 557+ C88D CD 4B 95                             call    E_Div_C
 558+ C890 6F                                   ld      l,a
 559+ C891                                      ZeroA
 559+ C891 AF          >                        xor a
 560+ C892 67                                   ld      h,a
 561+ C893                                      ClearCarryFlag
 561+ C893 B7          >                        or a
 562+ C894 C9                                   ret
 563+ C895
 564+ C895              ; Project XY to screen location
 565+ C895 DD 26 00     ProjectPlanet:          ld      ixh,0
 566+ C898 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxlo)
 567+ C89B 3A 12 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 568+ C89E CD B3 C8                             call    PlanetProcessVertex         ; hl = PixelCentreY + (Y / Z)*-1 (as its 0 = top of screen)
 569+ C8A1 22 FA C0                             ld      (P_centreX),hl
 570+ C8A4 DD 24                                inc     ixh
 571+ C8A6 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKylo)
 572+ C8A9 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)
 573+ C8AC CD B3 C8                             call    PlanetProcessVertex         ; hl = PixelCentreY + (Y / Z)*-1 (as its 0 = top of screen)
 574+ C8AF 22 00 C1                             ld      (P_centreY),hl
 575+ C8B2 C9                                   ret
 576+ C8B3
 577+ C8B3              ; PlanetProcessVertex AHL = X or Y position (sign in A)
 578+ C8B3              ;                     fetches z as this used in both calcs
 579+ C8B3 47           PlanetProcessVertex:    ld      b,a                         ; save sign/high byte
 580+ C8B4 ED 5B 16 C0  .PlanetProjectToEye:    ld      de,(P_BnKzlo)               ; B H L   = X or Y
 581+ C8B8 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)               ; IYH D E = z
 582+ C8BB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; save sign
 583+ C8BD                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A D E   = | z |
 583+ C8BD E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 584+ C8BF                                      ; Addeed as it neds to be AHL/0CD to force * 256 and get correct screen position on scaling
 585+ C8BF 5A                                   ld      e,d                         ; C D E   = A D E * 256, i.e. 0 A D
 586+ C8C0 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 587+ C8C1 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ; .
 588+ C8C3                                      ; added above to correct positioning as in reality its X/(Z/256) to get +-256 rather than +- 1
 589+ C8C3 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; copy X or Y sign into iyl
 590+ C8C4 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; .
 591+ C8C6                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A H L = |X| (or |Y|)
 591+ C8C6 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 592+ C8C8 CD 4A C8                             call PlanetAHLequAHLDivCDE          ; AHL = AHL/CDE unsigned
 593+ C8CB DA 2A C9                             jp      c,.IsOffScreen              ; carry flag indicates failure
 594+ C8CE              .CheckPosOnScreen:      JumpIfAIsNotZero .IsOffScreen       ; if A has a value then its way too large regardless of sign
 594+ C8CE A7          >                        and     a
 594+ C8CF C2 2A C9    >                        jp	    nz,.IsOffScreen
 595+ C8D2                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet h, .IsOffScreen   ; or bit 7 set of h
 595+ C8D2 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 595+ C8D3 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 595+ C8D5 C2 2A C9    >                        jp      nz,.IsOffScreen
 596+ C8D8 DD 7C        .CheckXorY:             ld      a,ixh
 597+ C8DA                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ProcessYCoord
 597+ C8DA A7          >                        and     a
 597+ C8DB C2 01 C9    >                        jp	    nz,.ProcessYCoord
 598+ C8DE              ; Handle X Coord offset
 599+ C8DE FD 7C        .ProcessXCoord:         ld      a,iyh                       ; determine if its + or - value of AHL/CDE
 600+ C8E0 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 601+ C8E2 E6 80                                and     $80
 602+ C8E4 CA ED C8                             jp      z,.ProcessXPositive
 603+ C8E7              .ProcessXNegative:      macronegate16hl
 603+ C8E7 AF          >					xor 	a
 603+ C8E8 95          >					sub 	l
 603+ C8E9 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 603+ C8EA 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 603+ C8EB 94          >					sub 	h
 603+ C8EC 67          >					ld 		h,a
 604+ C8ED 11 80 00     .ProcessXPositive:      ld      de,ScreenCenterX
 605+ C8F0                                      ClearCarryFlag
 605+ C8F0 B7          >                        or a
 606+ C8F1 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; now X position is CenterX+ (X / Z) in 2's c
 607+ C8F3 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ; set de to | hl for +/- 1024 check
 608+ C8F5 F2 22 C9                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 609+ C8F8                                      macronegate16de                     ; .
 609+ C8F8 AF          >					xor 	a
 609+ C8F9 93          >                    sub 	e
 609+ C8FA 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 609+ C8FB 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 609+ C8FC 92          >                    sub 	d
 609+ C8FD 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 610+ C8FE C3 22 C9                             jp      .CheckBoundaries            ; .
 611+ C901              ; Handle Y Coord offset
 612+ C901 FD 7C        .ProcessYCoord:         ld      a,iyh
 613+ C903 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 614+ C905 E6 80                                and     $80
 615+ C907 CA 10 C9                             jp      z,.ProcessYPositive
 616+ C90A              .ProcessYNegative:      macronegate16hl
 616+ C90A AF          >					xor 	a
 616+ C90B 95          >					sub 	l
 616+ C90C 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 616+ C90D 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 616+ C90E 94          >					sub 	h
 616+ C90F 67          >					ld 		h,a
 617+ C910 11 60 00     .ProcessYPositive:      ld      de,ScreenCenterY            ; set hl to center Y and de to 2s'c Y/Z
 618+ C913 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 619+ C914                                      ClearCarryFlag
 619+ C914 B7          >                        or a
 620+ C915 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now HL  position is CenterY - (Y / Z) in 2's c
 621+ C917 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ;
 622+ C919 F2 22 C9                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 623+ C91C                                      macronegate16de                     ; load DE with | result to simplify +-1024 check|
 623+ C91C AF          >					xor 	a
 623+ C91D 93          >                    sub 	e
 623+ C91E 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 623+ C91F 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 623+ C920 92          >                    sub 	d
 623+ C921 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 624+ C922 7A           .CheckBoundaries:       ld      a,d
 625+ C923                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 4, .IsOffScreen     ; if |position| > 1024 then way to large
 625+ C923 FE 04       >                        cp     4
 625+ C925 D2 2A C9    >                        jp		nc,.IsOffScreen
 626+ C928              .calculatedVert:        ClearCarryFlag
 626+ C928 B7          >                        or a
 627+ C929 C9                                   ret
 628+ C92A 21 FF 7F     .IsOffScreen:           ld      hl,$7FFF
 629+ C92D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 630+ C92F FD AD                                xor     iyl
 631+ C931                                      SignBitOnlyA
 631+ C931 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 632+ C933 28 02                                jr      z,.calculatedOffScreen
 633+ C935 23                                   inc     hl                          ; set hl to $8001 i.e. -32768
 634+ C936 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 635+ C937              .calculatedOffScreen:   SetCarryFlag
 635+ C937 37          >                        scf
 636+ C938 C9                                   ret
 637+ C939
 638+ C939
 639+ C939              ; .........................................................................................................................
 640+ C939              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 641+ C939              ; calculates 24576/z, maxes at 248
 642+ C939 ED 4B 16 C0  PlanetCalculateRadius:  ld      bc,(P_BnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 643+ C93D 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ;
 644+ C940 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 645+ C941 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 646+ C944 CD 29 94                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 647+ C947 B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 648+ C948                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 648+ C948 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 648+ C949 CA 4F C9    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 649+ C94C 21 F8 00     .MaxRadius:             ld      hl,248                      ; set radius to 248 as maxed out
 650+ C94F 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 651+ C950 F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 652+ C952                                      DISPLAY "DONE - Eliiminate the check to see if planet radius is > 255 as its already fixed in Planet Calculate Radius"
 653+ C952                                      ;ld      l,a                        ;
 654+ C952                                      ;ld      (P_Radius),hl              ; save a copy of radius now for later
 655+ C952 32 D9 C0                             ld      (P_Radius),a
 656+ C955 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 657+ C956 16 08        .CalculateStep:         ld      d,8
 658+ C958                                      JumpIfALTNusng 8, .DoneStepCalc
 658+ C958 FE 08       >                        cp      8
 658+ C95A DA 66 C9    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 659+ C95D CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 660+ C95F                                      JumpIfALTNusng 60, .DoneStepCalc
 660+ C95F FE 3C       >                        cp      60
 660+ C961 DA 66 C9    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 661+ C964 CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 662+ C966 7A           .DoneStepCalc:          ld      a,d
 663+ C967 32 8F C0                             ld      (P_BnKSTP),a
 664+ C96A C9                                   ret
 665+ C96B
 666+ C96B              ; Shorter version when sun does not need to be processed to screen
 667+ C96B 3A 12 C0     PlanetUpdateCompass:    ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 668+ C96E 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxlo)
 669+ C971 CD B3 C8                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 670+ C974 22 19 C0                             ld      (P_CompassX),hl
 671+ C977 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)
 672+ C97A 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKylo)
 673+ C97D CD B3 C8                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 674+ C980 22 1B C0                             ld      (P_CompassY),hl
 675+ C983 C9                                   ret
 676+ C984
 677+ C984                                 ; could probabyl set a variable say "varGood", default as 1 then set to 0 if we end up with a good calulation?? may not need it as we draw here
 678+ C984 CD DE C6     PlanetUpdateAndRender:  call    PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch    ; not needed for solid as yet
 679+ C987 3A 18 C0     .DrawSolidPlanet:       ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 680+ C98A A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 681+ C98B FA DA C9                             jp      m,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; if its negative then behind so exit
 682+ C98E              .TooFarAway:            JumpIfAGTENusng   48,.SkipDrawPlanet  ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 682+ C98E FE 30       >                        cp     48
 682+ C990 D2 DA C9    >                        jp		nc,.SkipDrawPlanet
 683+ C993 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 684+ C996 B6                                   or      (hl)                         ; .
 685+ C997 CA DA C9                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; .
 686+ C99A              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 687+ C99A CD 95 C8     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet                ; Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 688+ C99D CD 39 C9     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 689+ C9A0                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 690+ C9A0                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 691+ C9A0 2A FA C0                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 692+ C9A3 ED 5B 00 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 693+ C9A7 3A D9 C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 694+ C9AA A7                                   and     a
 695+ C9AB CA DA C9                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; skip 0 size
 696+ C9AE 4F                                   ld      c,a
 697+ C9AF 3A E2 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour1)
 698+ C9B2 47                                   ld      b,a
 699+ C9B3                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 699+ C9B3 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 700+ C9B7 CD 91 EE                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 701+ C9BA                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng P_Radius, 5, .SkipDrawPlanet
 701+ C9BA 3A D9 C0    >                        ld      a,(P_Radius)
 701+ C9BD FE 05       >                        cp      5
 701+ C9BF DA DA C9    >                        jp	  c,.SkipDrawPlanet
 702+ C9C2 FE 05                                cp      5               ; radius < 3 means no atmosphere
 703+ C9C4 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; as a holds radius from Jump Macro
 704+ C9C5 CA DA C9                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet
 705+ C9C8 2A FA C0                             ld      hl,(P_centreX) ; just to test putting a rim there
 706+ C9CB ED 5B 00 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 707+ C9CF 3A E3 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour2)
 708+ C9D2 47                                   ld      b,a
 709+ C9D3                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 709+ C9D3 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 710+ C9D7 CD 95 EC                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 711+ C9DA CD 6B C9     .SkipDrawPlanet:        call    PlanetUpdateCompass
 712+ C9DD C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 713+ C9DE              ;
 714+ C9DE              ; (PLS4)
 715+ C9DE              ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / side_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 716+ C9DE              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 717+ C9DE              ;CalcNoseSideArcTanPI:   ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ + 1)   ; P = - nosevz hi
 718+ C9DE              ;                        xor     $80
 719+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varP),a
 720+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatSidevZ + 1)
 721+ C9DE              ;                        jp      CalcArcTanPiPA
 722+ C9DE              ;;  CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 723+ C9DE              ;CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI:   ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ + 1)   ; P = - nosevz hi
 724+ C9DE              ;                        xor     $80
 725+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varP),a
 726+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ + 1)
 727+ C9DE              ;; CNT2 = arctan(P / A) / 4
 728+ C9DE              ;CalcArcTanPiPA:         ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A
 729+ C9DE              ;                        call    ARCTAN                      ; A = arctan(P / Q)
 730+ C9DE              ;                        ld      c,a                         ; save a
 731+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ+1)
 732+ C9DE              ;                        and     $80
 733+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,c                         ; restore a as it doesn't affect flags doing an ld
 734+ C9DE              ;                        jp      m,.SkipFlipSign             ; If nosev_z_hi is negativeleave the angle in A as a positive
 735+ C9DE              ;; Adds 128 to the result (rather than makes it negative)
 736+ C9DE              ;.FlipSign:              xor     $80                         ; If we get here then nosev_z_hi is positive, so flip bit 7 of the angle in A, which is the same as adding 128
 737+ C9DE              ;.SkipFlipSign:          srl     a                           ; Set CNT2 = A / 4
 738+ C9DE              ;                        srl     a                           ; .
 739+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a                ; .
 740+ C9DE              ;                        ret
 741+ C9DE
 742+ C9DE              ; (PSL1)
 743+ C9DE              ; XX16 K2) = nosev_x / z
 744+ C9DE              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 745+ C9DE              ;CalcNoseXDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevX)
 746+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 747+ C9DE              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 748+ C9DE              ;CalcNoseYDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevY)
 749+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 750+ C9DE              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 751+ C9DE              ;CalcRoofXDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 752+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 753+ C9DE              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 754+ C9DE              ;CalcRoofYDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 755+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 756+ C9DE              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 757+ C9DE              ;CalcSideXDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevX)
 758+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 759+ C9DE              ;                        jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 760+ C9DE              ;CalcSideYDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevY)
 761+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 762+ C9DE              ; (PLS1) (Y A) = nosev_x / z where B = Y (also stores in regY), K+3 = sign of calculation
 763+ C9DE              ; stores result in BC now as well
 764+ C9DE              ; does not do increment of X as its not needed when directly loading verticies of rotation
 765+ C9DE              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 766+ C9DE              ;CalcRotMatDivide:
 767+ C9DE              ;.LoadDEtoQRS:           ld      a,e                         ; Q
 768+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varQ),a                    ;
 769+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,d                         ;
 770+ C9DE              ;                        and     $7F                         ;
 771+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varR),a                    ;
 772+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,d                         ;
 773+ C9DE              ;                        and     $80                         ;
 774+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varS),a                    ;
 775+ C9DE              ;.LoadHLtoP012:          ld      a,l                         ; set A P+1 P to (signnoseX) (|noseX|)
 776+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varP),a                    ; set P to nosevX lo
 777+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,h                         ; set P_1 to |nosevX hi|
 778+ C9DE              ;                        ld      b,h                         ; .
 779+ C9DE              ;                        and     $7F                         ; .
 780+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varP+1),a                  ; .
 781+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,b                         ; set a to sign nosevX
 782+ C9DE              ;                        and     $80
 783+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varP+2),a
 784+ C9DE              ;                        call    DVID3B                      ; call DVI3B2 variane where z is in de as 16 bit and needs expanding to 32
 785+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,(varK+1)                  ; get second byte into b
 786+ C9DE              ;                        ld      b,a                         ; and also check to see if its
 787+ C9DE              ;                        and     a                           ; zero

 789+ C9DE              ;                        ld      c,a                         ; so now BC = result too
 790+ C9DE              ;                        jp      z,.Skip254
 791+ C9DE              ;.Force254Result:        ld      a,254                       ; if 2nd byte is non zero set a to 254 as our max 1 byte value to return
 792+ C9DE              ;                        ld      c,a
 793+ C9DE              ;.Skip254:               push    af
 794+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,c                         ; if a is 0 then force sign to be +ve
 795+ C9DE              ;                        and     a
 796+ C9DE              ;                        jp      nz,.DoNotForceSign
 797+ C9DE              ;.ForceSignPositive:     ld      (regY),a
 798+ C9DE              ;                        ld      b,a
 799+ C9DE              ;                        pop     af
 800+ C9DE              ;                        ret
 801+ C9DE              ;.DoNotForceSign:        ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; set b to sign (which was Y in 6502)
 802+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (regY),a
 803+ C9DE              ;                        ld      b,a                         ; bc also is result as c was a copy of a
 804+ C9DE              ;                        pop     af                          ; so c doesn't need to be pushed to stack
 805+ C9DE              ;                        ret
 806+ C9DE
 807+ C9DE              ; (PLS3)
 808+ C9DE              ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 809+ C9DE              ; Not needed as we don't rotate planets and suns
 810+ C9DE              ;Cacl222MulRoofXDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 811+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 812+ C9DE              ;                        jp      Calc222MulHLDivDE
 813+ C9DE              ;; (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_y / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 814+ C9DE              ;Cacl222MulRoofYDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 815+ C9DE              ;                        ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 816+ C9DE              ;; Optimise, move result at the end into HL instead of YA (we can ignore P)
 817+ C9DE              ;Calc222MulHLDivDE:      call    CalcRotMatDivide            ; calculate (Y A) = nosev_x(orY) / z
 818+ C9DE              ;                        ld      d,a                         ; P = |roofv_x / z|
 819+ C9DE              ;                        ld      e,222                       ; LDA #222               \ Set Q = 222, the offset to the crater
 820+ C9DE              ;                        ; Not needed                        ; STA Q
 821+ C9DE              ;                        ; Not needed                        ; STX U                  \ Store the vector index X in U for retrieval after the  call to MULTU
 822+ C9DE              ;                        mul     de                          ; call MULTU (unsigned multiply) de = 222 * |roofv_x / z|
 823+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDY K+3                \ If the sign of the result in K+3 is positive, skip to
 824+ C9DE              ;                        and     a
 825+ C9DE              ;                        jp      p,.PL12                     ; BPL PL12               \ PL12 to return with Y = 0
 826+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,$FF                       ; LDY #&FF               \ Set Y = &FF to be a negative high byte
 827+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (regY),a                    ; .
 828+ C9DE              ;                        ld      b,a                         ; .
 829+ C9DE              ;                        macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise the result should be negative, so negate
 830+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,e                         ; now we have Y A P (with Y in b also)
 831+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varP),a                    ; .
 832+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,d                         ; .
 833+ C9DE              ;                        and     a
 834+ C9DE              ;                        jp      z,.ForcePositive            ; if A is 0, special case to make +ve
 835+ C9DE              ;                        ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 836+ C9DE              ;.ForcePositive:         ZeroA                               ; set regY and b to 0
 837+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (regY),a
 838+ C9DE              ;                        ld      b,a
 839+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,d                         ; get d back into a again
 840+ C9DE              ;                        ret
 841+ C9DE              ;.PL12:                  ZeroA                               ; set Y A P to be 0 D E from mul
 842+ C9DE              ;                        ld      b,a
 843+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (regY),a
 844+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,e
 845+ C9DE              ;                        ld      (varP),a
 846+ C9DE              ;                        ld      a,d
 847+ C9DE              ;                        ret
 848+ C9DE
 849+ C9DE
 850+ C9DE              ; K3(1 0) = (Y A) + K3(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 851+ C9DE 6F           CalcCraterCenterX:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 852+ C9DF 3A B7 7D                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 853+ C9E2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 854+ C9E3 ED 5B F4 7E                          ld      de,(varK3)                  ; de = K3 [ 1 0 ]
 855+ C9E7                                      ClearCarryFlag
 855+ C9E7 B7          >                        or a
 856+ C9E8 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
 857+ C9EA 22 F4 7E                             ld      (varK3),hl                  ; K3[1 0] = hl + de
 858+ C9ED C9                                   ret
 859+ C9EE
 860+ C9EE              ; K4(1 0) = (Y A) - K4(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 861+ C9EE 6F           CalcCraterCenterY:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 862+ C9EF 3A B7 7D                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 863+ C9F2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 864+ C9F3 ED 5B FA 7E                          ld      de,(varK4)                  ; de = K4 [ 1 0 ]
 865+ C9F7                                      ClearCarryFlag
 865+ C9F7 B7          >                        or a
 866+ C9F8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 867+ C9FA 22 FA 7E                             ld      (varK4),hl                  ; K4[1 0] = hl + de
 868+ C9FD C9                                   ret
 869+ C9FE
 870+ C9FE CB 7C        TwosCompToLeadingSign:  bit     7,h
 871+ CA00 C8                                   ret     z
 872+ CA01                                      macronegate16hl
 872+ CA01 AF          >					xor 	a
 872+ CA02 95          >					sub 	l
 872+ CA03 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 872+ CA04 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 872+ CA05 94          >					sub 	h
 872+ CA06 67          >					ld 		h,a
 873+ CA07 7C                                   ld      a,h
 874+ CA08 F6 80                                or      $80
 875+ CA0A 67                                   ld      h,a
 876+ CA0B C9                                   ret
 877+ CA0C
 878+ CA0C CB 7C        LeadingSignToTwosComp:  bit     7,h
 879+ CA0E C8                                   ret     z
 880+ CA0F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 881+ CA10 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 882+ CA12 67                                   ld      h,a
 883+ CA13                                      macronegate16hl
 883+ CA13 AF          >					xor 	a
 883+ CA14 95          >					sub 	l
 883+ CA15 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 883+ CA16 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 883+ CA17 94          >					sub 	h
 883+ CA18 67          >					ld 		h,a
 884+ CA19 C9                                   ret
 885+ CA1A
 886+ CA1A              ;-- bc = bc * P_radius where bc = S.Fraction ,e.g nosex/nosey
 887+ CA1A 3A D9 C0     P_BCmulRadius:          ld      a,(P_Radius)                ; we probably don't have radius already
 888+ CA1D 57           P_BCmulRadiusInA:       ld      d,a                         ; d = radius already in a
 889+ CA1E 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; e = c (as we only hold 0.8 in bc, i.e. fractional +/- > 0)
 890+ CA1F ED 30                                mul     de                          ; mulitply raidus by c which will be fractional  generating a 8.X value)
 891+ CA21 4A                                   ld      c,d                         ; we only want the whole number, preserving sign in b
 892+ CA22 C9                                   ret
 893+ CA23
 894+ CA23                 ; DEFINE  PlanetDebugLocal 1
 895+ CA23              PlanetDraw:             IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
 896+ CA23 ~                                            call    TestBLINE
 897+ CA23                                      ENDIF
 898+ CA23                                      IFDEF TESTMERIDIAN
 899+ CA23 ~                                            call    TestMeridian
 900+ CA23                                      ENDIF
 901+ CA23                                      IFDEF PlanetDebugLocal
 902+ CA23 ~                                            ZeroA
 903+ CA23 ~                                            ; x 500, y 50, z 2000: 500/7,50/7 =>71,7 => 199,71 Yes
 904+ CA23 ~                                            ; radius becomes 24576/2000 = 12 (13 is good enough yes)
 905+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a
 906+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKysgn),a
 907+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a
 908+ CA23 ~                                            ld      hl, 0
 909+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKxlo),hl

 913+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzlo),hl

 916+ CA23 ~                                            ld      de,0

 922+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ),bc
 923+ CA23 ~                                            ld      hl,18432
 924+ CA23 ~                                            ld      bc,$9800
 925+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevX),hl
 926+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevY),de

 928+ CA23 ~            ;                                ld      hl, 230

 942+ CA23 ~            .DebugMeridian1:                xor     a
 943+ CA23 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
 944+ CA23 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 944+ CA23 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 944+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl

 945+ CA23 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 945+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
 946+ CA23 ~                                            call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 947+ CA23 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 947+ CA23 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius

 956+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
 957+ CA23 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreY)
 957+ CA23 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 957+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
 958+ CA23 ~                                            call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 959+ CA23 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 959+ CA23 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 959+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
 960+ CA23 ~                                            call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
 960+ CA23 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 960+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
 961+ CA23 ~                                            call    CalcSideXDivSideZ
 961+ CA23 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 961+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
 962+ CA23 ~                                            call    CalcSideYDivSideZ
 962+ CA23 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 962+ CA23 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
 963+ CA23 ~
 964+ CA23 ~                                            call    DrawMeridian
 965+ CA23 ~
 966+ CA23 ~
 967+ CA23 ~
 968+ CA23                                      ENDIF
 969+ CA23 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 970+ CA26 A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 971+ CA27 F8                                   ret     m                           ; if its negative then behind so exit
 972+ CA28              .TooFarAway:            ReturnIfAGTEusng   48               ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 972+ CA28 FE 30       >                        cp    48
 972+ CA2A D0          >                        ret	 nc
 973+ CA2B 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 974+ CA2E B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 975+ CA2F C8                                   ret     z                           ; .
 976+ CA30              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 977+ CA30 CD 95 C8     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet               ;  Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 978+ CA33 D8                                   ret     c                           ; If the C flag is set by PROJ then the planet/sun is  not visible on-screen, so return
 979+ CA34 CD 39 C9     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 980+ CA37                              IFDEF   PLANETSARESOLID
 981+ CA37                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 982+ CA37                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 983+ CA37 2A FA C0                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 984+ CA3A ED 5B 00 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 985+ CA3E 3A D9 C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 986+ CA41 4F                                   ld      c,a
 987+ CA42 06 CF                                ld      b,$CF
 988+ CA44                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 988+ CA44 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 989+ CA48 CD 91 EE                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 990+ CA4B C9                                   ret
 991+ CA4C
 992+ CA4C                              ELSE
 993+ CA4C ~
 994+ CA4C ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: calculate STP step based on planet size"
 995+ CA4C ~            ; Note we don't to the planet type check as hitting here its always a planet
 996+ CA4C ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:set color green"
 997+ CA4C ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:draw circle (do we draw solid??)"
 998+ CA4C ~                                    ld      hl, (P_centreX)
 999+ CA4C ~                                    ld      de,(P_centreY)
1000+ CA4C ~                                    ld      a,(P_Radius)
1001+ CA4C ~                                    ld      c,a
1002+ CA4C ~                                    ld      b,$FF
1003+ CA4C ~                                    MMUSelectLayer2
1004+ CA4C ~                                    call    l2_draw_clipped_circle

1006+ CA4C ~                                    ;ret     c                           ; circle failure means exit
